 2165: do_econnreset_after_sync_send(Config, Addr) ->
 2166:     %% First confirm everything works with option turned off.
 2167:     ?P("test with option switched off (default)"),
 2168:     {ok, L}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{active, false}, {ip, Addr}]),
 2169:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2170:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 2171: 			   [{active,          false},
 2172: 			    {show_econnreset, false},
 2173: 			    {ip,              Addr}]) of
 2174:                  {ok, CSock} ->
 2175:                      CSock;
 2176:             {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2177:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2178:         end,
 2179:     {ok, S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2180:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2181:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2182:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 2183:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2184:     %% _ = inet:setopts(Client, [{debug, true}]),
 2185:     %% {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, "Whatever"),
 2186:     ok = ecr_ass_send(Config, Client, closed),
 2187:     %% _ = inet:setopts(Client, [{debug, false}]),
 2188: 
 2189:     %% Now test with option switched on.
 2190:     ?P("test with option explicitly switched on"),
 2191:     {ok, L1}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{active, false}, {ip, Addr}]),
 2192:     {ok, Port1} = inet:port(L1),
 2193:     Client1 =
 2194:         case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port1,
 2195:                       [{active,          false},
 2196:                        {show_econnreset, true},
 2197:                        {ip,              Addr}]) of
 2198:             {ok, CSock1} ->
 2199:                 CSock1;
 2200:             {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason1} ->
 2201:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason1))
 2202:         end,            
 2203:     {ok, S1} = gen_tcp:accept(L1),
 2204:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L1),
 2205:     ok = inet:setopts(S1, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2206:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S1),
 2207:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2208:     %% {error, econnreset} = gen_tcp:send(Client1, "Whatever"),
 2209:     ok = ecr_ass_send(Config, Client1, econnreset),
 2210:     ?P("done"),
 2211:     ok.

 2214: ecr_ass_send(Config, Sock, Expected) ->
 2215:     case os:type() of
 2216: 	{win32, nt} ->
 2217: 	    case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 2218: 		true ->
 2219: 		    do_ecr_ass_send(Sock, Expected, 2);
 2220: 		false ->
 2221: 		    do_ecr_ass_send(Sock, Expected, 1)
 2222: 	    end;
 2223: 	_ ->
 2224: 	    do_ecr_ass_send(Sock, Expected, 1)
 2225:     end.
 2226: 
 2227: do_ecr_ass_send(Sock, Expected, N) when (N > 0) ->
 2228:     case gen_tcp:send(Sock, "Whatever") of
 2229: 	{error, Expected} ->
 2230: 	    ?P("[~w] expected send result", [N]),
 2231: 	    ok;
 2232: 	{error, Unexpected} ->
 2233: 	    ?P("[~w] unexpected send error: "
 2234: 	       "~n   Expected:   ~p"
 2235: 	       "~n   Unexpected: ~p", [N, Expected, Unexpected]),
 2236: 	    do_ecr_ass_send(Sock, Expected, N-1);
 2237: 	ok ->
 2238: 	    ?P("[~w] unexpected send success", [N]),
 2239: 	    do_ecr_ass_send(Sock, Expected, N-1)
 2240:     end;
 2241: do_ecr_ass_send(_Sock, _Expected, _) ->
 2242:     error.

 2245: econnreset_after_async_send_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2246:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2247:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2248:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2249:                             Addr;
 2250:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2251:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2252:                     end
 2253:            end,
 2254:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_econnreset_after_async_send_active(Config, Addr) end,
 2255:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2256:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2257: 
 2258: do_econnreset_after_async_send_active(Config, Addr) ->
 2259:     {OS, _}         = os:type(),
 2260:     IsSocketBackend = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 2261:     CPayload        = craasa_mk_payload(),
 2262:     SPayload        = "Whatever",
 2263: 
 2264:     %% First confirm everything works with option turned off.
 2265:     ?P("pre 1 (default)"),
 2266:     {Client1, Server1} = craasa_pre(Config, Addr, default),
 2267: 
 2268:     ?P("populate 1 (default)"),
 2269:     {ok, Sender1} = craasa_populate(OS, IsSocketBackend, default,
 2270:                                     Client1, Server1, CPayload, SPayload),
 2271:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2272:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2273: 
 2274:     ?P("[server] set linger true:0"),
 2275:     ok = inet:setopts(Server1, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2276:     ?P("[server] close socket"),
 2277:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server1),
 2278:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2279:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2280: 
 2281:     ?P("verify 1 (default)"),
 2282:     craasa_verify(default, Client1, SPayload),
 2283: 
 2284:     ?P("cleanup 1 (default)"),
 2285:     craasa_cleanup(Client1, Sender1),
 2286: 
 2287:     %% Now test with option switched on.
 2288:     ?P("pre 2 (true)"),
 2289:     {Client2, Server2} = craasa_pre(Config, Addr, true),
 2290: 
 2291:     ?P("populate 2 (true)"),
 2292:     {ok, Sender2} = craasa_populate(OS, IsSocketBackend, true,
 2293:                                     Client2, Server2, CPayload, SPayload),
 2294:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2295:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2296: 
 2297:     ?P("[server] set linger true:0"),
 2298:     ok = inet:setopts(Server2, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2299:     ?P("[server] close socket"),
 2300:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server2),
 2301:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2302:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2303: 
 2304:     ?P("verify 2 (true)"),
 2305:     craasa_verify(true, Client2, SPayload),
 2306: 
 2307:     ?P("cleanup 2 (true)"),
 2308:     craasa_cleanup(Client2, Sender2),
 2309: 
 2310:     ?P("done"),
 2311:     ok.
 2312: 
 2313: craasa_mk_payload() ->
 2314:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1024 * 1024, $.)).
 2315: 
 2316: craasa_pre(Config, Addr, EConnReset)
 2317:   when is_boolean(EConnReset) orelse (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2318:     ?P("create listen socket (server) with active = false"),
 2319:     {ok, L}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{active, false},
 2320:                                      {recbuf, 4096},
 2321:                                      {ip,     Addr}]),
 2322:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2323:     ?P("[client] create connect socket with show_econnreset: ~p", [EConnReset]),
 2324:     Opts = if (EConnReset =:= default) -> [];
 2325:               is_boolean(EConnReset)   -> [{show_econnreset, EConnReset}]
 2326:            end,
 2327:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 2328:                            [{ip, Addr}, {sndbuf, 4096}] ++ Opts) of
 2329:                  {ok, CSock} ->
 2330:                      CSock;
 2331:             {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2332:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2333:         end,
 2334:     ?P("create accept socket (server)"),
 2335:     {ok, S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2336:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 2337:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2338:     {Client, S}.
 2339: 
 2340: craasa_populate(OS, _ISB, _EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload)
 2341:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 2342:     ?P("send payload (~w bytes) from client to server", [byte_size(CPayload)]),
 2343:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Client, CPayload),
 2344:     ?P("verify client socket queue size"),
 2345:     case erlang:port_info(Client, queue_size) of
 2346: 	{queue_size, N} when N > 0 -> ok;
 2347: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 -> ok;
 2348: 	{queue_size, 0} = T -> ct:fail(T)
 2349:     end,
 2350:     ?P("[server] send something"),
 2351:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2352:     {ok, undefined};
 2353: craasa_populate(OS, ISB,
 2354: 		EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload) ->
 2355:     ExpectedSendRes = if (EConnReset =:= default) -> closed;
 2356:                          (EConnReset =:= true)    -> econnreset
 2357:                       end,
 2358:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 2359:                                 craasa_populate_sender(
 2360: 				  if (OS =:= win32) andalso ISB -> 2;
 2361: 				     true                       -> 1
 2362: 				  end,
 2363: 				  Client,
 2364: 				  ExpectedSendRes,
 2365: 				  CPayload)
 2366:                         end),
 2367:     receive
 2368:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} when (Reason =/= normal) ->
 2369:             {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 2370:     after 2000 ->
 2371:             ?P("[server] send something"),
 2372:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2373:             {ok, Sender}
 2374:     end.
 2375: 
 2376: craasa_populate_sender(N, Client, ExpectedSendReason, Payload) when (N > 0) ->
 2377:     ?P("[socket, ~w] send payload (expect failure ~p)",
 2378:        [N, ExpectedSendReason]), 
 2379:     case gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload) of
 2380:         {error, ExpectedSendReason} ->
 2381:             ?P("[socket, ~w] expected payload send failure", [N]), 
 2382:             exit(normal);
 2383:         {error, UnexpectedSendReason} ->
 2384:             ?P("[socket, ~w] unexpected payload send failure: "
 2385: 	       "~n   ~p", [N, UnexpectedSendReason]), 
 2386: 	    craasa_populate_sender(N-1,
 2387: 				   Client, ExpectedSendReason, Payload);
 2388: 	ok ->
 2389:             ?P("[socket, ~w] unexpected payload send success", [N]), 
 2390: 	    craasa_populate_sender(N-1,
 2391: 				   Client, ExpectedSendReason, Payload)
 2392:     end;
 2393: craasa_populate_sender(_, _, _, _) ->
 2394:     exit(failed_sending_payload).
 2395: 
 2396: craasa_cleanup(Client, Sender) ->
 2397:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Client)),
 2398:     craasa_cleanup(Sender).
 2399: 
 2400: craasa_cleanup(Sender) when is_pid(Sender) ->
 2401:     exit(Sender, kill),
 2402:     receive
 2403:         {'EXIT', Sender, _} ->
 2404:             ok
 2405:     after 0 ->
 2406:             ok
 2407:     end;
 2408: craasa_cleanup(_) ->
 2409:     ok.
 2410: 
 2411: craasa_verify(default, Client, Payload) ->
 2412:     ?P("[verify-default] client await server data"),
 2413:     receive
 2414: 	{tcp, Client, Payload} ->
 2415:             ?P("[verify-default] "
 2416:                "client received expected server data - "
 2417:                "now await socket closed"),
 2418: 	    receive
 2419: 		{tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2420:                     ?P("[verify-default] "
 2421:                        "received client socket closed"),
 2422: 		    ok;
 2423: 		Other1 ->
 2424:                     ?P("[verify-default] "
 2425:                        "awaiting client socket closed - received upexpected: "
 2426:                        "~n      ~p", [Other1]),
 2427: 		    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Other1})
 2428: 	    end;
 2429: 	Other2 ->
 2430:             ?P("[verify-default] "
 2431:                "awaiting client socket data - received upexpected: "
 2432:                "~n      ~p", [Other2]),
 2433: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp, Other2})
 2434:     end;
 2435: craasa_verify(true, Client, Payload) ->
 2436:     ?P("[verify-true] client await server data"),
 2437:     receive
 2438: 	{tcp, Client, Payload} ->
 2439:             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2440:                "client received expected server data - now await socket error"),
 2441: 	    receive
 2442: 		{tcp_error, Client, econnreset} ->
 2443:                     ?P("[verify-true] "
 2444:                        "client received expected socket error - "
 2445:                        "now await socket closed"),
 2446: 		    receive
 2447: 			{tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2448:                             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2449:                                "client received expected socket closed"),
 2450: 			    ok;
 2451: 			Other1 ->
 2452:                             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2453:                                "client awaiting socket closed - "
 2454:                                "received upexpected: "
 2455:                                "~n      ~p", [Other1]),
 2456: 			    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Other1})
 2457: 		    end;
 2458: 		Other2 ->
 2459:                     ?P("[verify-true] "
 2460:                        "client awaiting socket error - received upexpected: "
 2461:                        "~n      ~p", [Other2]),
 2462: 		    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_error, Other2})
 2463: 	    end;
 2464: 	Other3 ->
 2465:             ?P("[verify-true] "
 2466:                "client awaiting socket data - received upexpected: "
 2467:                "~n      ~p", [Other3]),
 2468: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp, Other3})
 2469:     end.

 2474: econnreset_after_async_send_active_once(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2475:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2476:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2477:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2478:                             Addr;
 2479:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2480:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2481:                     end
 2482:            end,
 2483:     TC   = fun(Addr) ->
 2484:                    do_econnreset_after_async_send_active_once(Config, Addr)
 2485:            end,
 2486:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2487:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2488: 
 2489: do_econnreset_after_async_send_active_once(Config, Addr) ->
 2490:     ?P("[ctrl] pre"),
 2491:     {Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload} = craasao_pre(Config, Addr),
 2492: 
 2493:     {OS, _} = os:type(),
 2494:     ISB     = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 2495: 
 2496:     ?P("[ctrl] populate"),
 2497:     {ok, Sender} = craasao_populate(OS, ISB,
 2498: 				    Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload),
 2499: 
 2500:     ?P("[ctrl] set server socket option linger: {true, 0}"),
 2501:     ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2502:     ?P("[ctrl] close server socket"),
 2503:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server),
 2504:     ?P("[ctrl] sleep some"),
 2505:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2506: 
 2507:     ?P("[ctrl] verify"),
 2508:     craasao_verify(Client, Sender),
 2509: 
 2510:     ?P("[ctrl] cleanup"),
 2511:     craasao_cleanup(Client),
 2512: 
 2513:     ?P("[ctrl] done"),
 2514:     ok.
 2515: 
 2516: craasao_pre(Config, Addr) ->
 2517:     ?P("[pre] create listen socket with active = false"),
 2518:     {ok, L}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,
 2519:                          [{active, false},
 2520:                           {recbuf, 4096},
 2521:                           {ip,     Addr}]),
 2522:     ?P("[pre] listen socket: "
 2523:        "~n      ~p", [L]),
 2524:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2525:     ?P("[pre] create connect socket (~w)", [Port]),
 2526:     Client     = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 2527:                                [{active,          false},
 2528:                                 {sndbuf,          4096},
 2529:                                 {show_econnreset, true},
 2530:                                 {ip,              Addr}]) of
 2531:                      {ok, CSock} ->
 2532:                          ?P("[pre] connect socket created:"
 2533:                               "~n      ~p", [CSock]),
 2534:                          CSock;
 2535:                      {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2536:                          ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2537:                  end,
 2538:     ?P("[pre] create accept socket"),
 2539:     {ok, Server} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2540:     ?P("[pre] close listen socket"),
 2541:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2542:     {Client, Server, craasao_mk_payload(), "Whatever"}.
 2543: 
 2544: craasao_populate(OS, _ISB, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload)
 2545:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 2546:     ?P("[populate,inet] client send data when"
 2547:        "~n      Client: ~p"
 2548:        "~n      Server: ~p", [Client, Server]),
 2549:     ok      = gen_tcp:send(Client, CPayload),
 2550:     ?P("[populate,inet] verify client socket queue size"),
 2551:     case erlang:port_info(Client, queue_size) of
 2552: 	{queue_size, N} when N > 0 -> ok;
 2553: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 -> ok;
 2554: 	{queue_size, 0} = T -> ct:fail(T)
 2555:     end,
 2556:     ?P("[populate,inet] server send data"),
 2557:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2558:     ?P("[populate,inet] sleep some"),
 2559:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2560:     {ok, undefined};
 2561: craasao_populate(OS, ISB, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload) ->
 2562:     ?P("[populate,socket] entry when"
 2563:        "~n      Client: ~p"
 2564:        "~n      Server: ~p", [Client, Server]),
 2565:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 2566:                                 craasao_populate_sender(
 2567: 				  if ((OS =:= win32) andalso ISB) -> 2;
 2568: 				     true                         -> 1
 2569: 				  end,
 2570: 				  Client, CPayload)
 2571:                         end),
 2572:     receive
 2573:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} ->
 2574: 	    ?P("unexpected sender exit: "
 2575: 	       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 2576:             {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 2577:     after 2000 ->
 2578:             ?P("[populate,socket] send something"),
 2579:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2580:             {ok, Sender}
 2581:     end.
 2582: 
 2583: craasao_populate_sender(N, Client, Payload) when (N > 0) ->
 2584:     ?P("[populate,sender,~w] send payload (expect failure)", [N]),
 2585:     ExpectedSendRes = econnreset,
 2586:     case gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload) of
 2587: 	{error, ExpectedSendRes} ->
 2588: 	    ?P("[populate,sender,~w] expected (payload) send failure", [N]), 
 2589: 	    exit(normal);
 2590: 	{error, BadReason} ->
 2591: 	    ?P("[populate,sender,~w] unexpected (payload) send failure reason:"
 2592: 	       "~n   ~p", [N, BadReason]),
 2593: 	    craasao_populate_sender(N-1, Client, Payload);
 2594: 	ok ->
 2595: 	    ?P("[populate,sender,~w] unexpected send success - "
 2596: 	       "expected failure with ~p", [N, ExpectedSendRes]),
 2597: 	    craasao_populate_sender(N-1, Client, Payload)
 2598:     end;
 2599: craasao_populate_sender(_, _, _) ->
 2600:     exit(send_failure).
 2601: 
 2602: 
 2603: craasao_mk_payload() ->
 2604:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1024 * 1024, $.)).
 2605: 
 2606: craasao_verify(Client, Sender) ->
 2607:     ?P("[verify] begin with"
 2608:        "~n      Client: ~p"
 2609:        "~n      Sender: ~p", [Client, Sender]),
 2610:     is_pid(Sender) andalso
 2611:         craasao_verify_sender(Sender),
 2612:     ?P("[verify] ensure no 'unexpected messages' received"),
 2613:     ok = receive Msg -> {unexpected_msg, Msg} after 0 -> ok end,
 2614:     ?P("[verify] set client socket option active: once"),
 2615:     inet:setopts(Client, [{sys_trace, true}]),
 2616:     ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{active, once}]),
 2617:     ?P("[verify] expect client econnreset"),
 2618:     receive
 2619: 	{tcp_error, Client, econnreset} ->
 2620:             ?P("[verify] received client econnreset -> "
 2621:                "expect client closed message"),
 2622: 	    receive
 2623: 		{tcp_closed, Client} ->
 2624:                     ?P("[verify] "
 2625:                        "received expected client closed message - done"),
 2626: 		    ok;
 2627: 		Other1 ->
 2628:                     ?P("[verify] client received unexpected message "
 2629:                          "(expected closed): "
 2630:                        "~n      ~p", [Other1]),
 2631: 		    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_closed, Other1})
 2632: 	    end;
 2633: 	Other2 ->
 2634:             ?P("[verify] client received unexpected message (expected error): "
 2635:                "~n      Unexpected: ~p"
 2636:                "~n      Flushed:    ~p", [Other2, craasao_flush()]),
 2637: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, tcp_error, Other2})
 2638:     end.
 2639: 
 2640: craasao_flush() ->
 2641:     craasao_flush([]).
 2642: 
 2643: craasao_flush(Acc) ->
 2644:     erlang:yield(),
 2645:     receive Msg    -> craasao_flush([Msg|Acc])
 2646:     after     1000 -> lists:reverse(Acc)
 2647:     end.
 2648: 
 2649: craasao_verify_sender(Sender) when is_pid(Sender) ->
 2650:     ?P("[verify sender] await termination"),
 2651:     receive
 2652:         {'EXIT', Sender, normal} ->
 2653: 	    ?P("[verify sender] expected normal termination received"),
 2654:             ok;
 2655:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} ->
 2656:             ?P("[verify sender] unexpected termination: "
 2657:                "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 2658: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_sender_termination, Sender, Reason})
 2659:     after infinity ->
 2660:             ok
 2661:     end;
 2662: craasao_verify_sender(_) ->
 2663:     ok.
 2664: 
 2665: craasao_cleanup(Client) ->
 2666:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Client)).
 2667: 
 2668: 
 2669: %% --------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2670: 
 2671: econnreset_after_async_send_passive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2672:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2673:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2674:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2675:                             Addr;
 2676:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2677:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2678:                     end
 2679:            end,
 2680:     TC   = fun(Addr) ->
 2681:                    do_econnreset_after_async_send_passive(Config, Addr)
 2682:            end,
 2683:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2684:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2685: 
 2686: do_econnreset_after_async_send_passive(Config, Addr) ->
 2687:     {OS, _}  = os:type(),
 2688:     ISB      = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 2689:     CPayload = craasp_mk_payload(),
 2690:     SPayload = "Whatever",
 2691: 
 2692:     %% First confirm everything works with option turned off.
 2693:     ?P("pre 1 (default)"),
 2694:     {Client1, Server1} = craasp_pre(Config, Addr, default),
 2695: 
 2696:     ?P("populate 1 (default)"),
 2697:     {ok, Sender1} = craasp_populate(OS, ISB, default,
 2698:                                     Client1, Server1, CPayload, SPayload),
 2699: 
 2700:     ?P("close server socket (1)"),
 2701:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server1),
 2702:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2703:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2704: 
 2705:     ?P("verify 1 (default)"),
 2706:     ok = craasp_verify(OS, ISB, Client1, default, SPayload),
 2707: 
 2708:     ?P("cleanup 1 (default)"),
 2709:     craasp_cleanup(Client1, Sender1),
 2710: 
 2711:     %% Now test with option switched on.
 2712:     ?P("pre 2 (true)"),
 2713:     {Client2, Server2} = craasp_pre(Config, Addr, true),
 2714: 
 2715:     ?P("populate 2 (default)"),
 2716:     {ok, Sender2} = craasp_populate(OS, ISB, true,
 2717:                                     Client2, Server2, CPayload, SPayload),
 2718: 
 2719: 
 2720:     ?P("close server socket 2"),
 2721:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server2),
 2722:     ?P("sleep some"),
 2723:     ok = ct:sleep(20),
 2724: 
 2725:     ?P("verify 2 (default)"),
 2726:     ok = craasp_verify(OS, ISB, Client2, true, SPayload),
 2727: 
 2728:     ?P("cleanup 2 (default)"),
 2729:     craasp_cleanup(Client2, Sender2),
 2730: 
 2731:     ?P("done"),
 2732:     ok.
 2733: 
 2734: 
 2735: craasp_pre(Config, Addr, EConnReset)
 2736:   when is_boolean(EConnReset) orelse (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2737:     ?P("create listen socket *** with option switched off (default)"),
 2738:     {ok, L}    = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,
 2739:                          [{active, false}, {recbuf, 4096}, {ip, Addr}]),
 2740:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2741:     ?P("[client] create connect socket with show_econnreset: ~p", [EConnReset]),
 2742:     COpts = [{active, false}, {sndbuf, 4096}] ++
 2743:         if
 2744:             (EConnReset =:= default) -> [];
 2745:             is_boolean(EConnReset)   -> [{show_econnreset, EConnReset}]
 2746:         end,
 2747:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [{ip, Addr} | COpts]) of
 2748:                  {ok, CSock} ->
 2749:                      CSock;
 2750:                  {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2751:                      ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2752:         end,
 2753:     ?P("accept connection"),
 2754:     {ok, Server} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2755:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 2756:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2757:     {Client, Server}.
 2758: 
 2759: craasp_mk_payload() ->
 2760:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(1024 * 1024, $.)).
 2761: 
 2762: craasp_populate(OS, _ISB,
 2763: 		_EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload)
 2764:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 2765:     ?P("[port,server] set linger: true:0"),
 2766:     ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2767:     ?P("[port,server] send some data to client"),
 2768:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2769:     ?P("[port,client] send some data to server"),
 2770:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Client, CPayload),
 2771:     ?P("[port,client] verify (port) queue-size"),
 2772:     case erlang:port_info(Client, queue_size) of
 2773: 	{queue_size, N} when N > 0 -> ok;
 2774: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 -> ok;
 2775: 	{queue_size, 0} = T -> ct:fail(T)
 2776:     end,
 2777:     {ok, undefined};
 2778: craasp_populate(OS, ISB,
 2779: 		EConnReset, Client, Server, CPayload, SPayload) ->
 2780:     ExpectedSendRes = if (EConnReset =:= default) -> closed;
 2781:                          (EConnReset =:= true)    -> econnreset
 2782:                       end,
 2783:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 2784:                                 craasp_populate_sender(
 2785: 				  if (OS =:= win32) andalso ISB -> 2;
 2786: 				     true                       -> 1
 2787: 				  end,
 2788: 				  Client,
 2789: 				  ExpectedSendRes,
 2790: 				  CPayload)
 2791:                         end),
 2792:     receive
 2793: 	{'EXIT', Sender, Reason} when (Reason =/= normal) ->
 2794: 	    ?P("unexpected sender exit: "
 2795: 	       "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 2796: 	    {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 2797:     after 2000 ->
 2798:             ?P("[server] send something"),
 2799:             ok = gen_tcp:send(Server, SPayload),
 2800:             {ok, Sender}
 2801:     end.
 2802:     
 2803: craasp_populate_sender(N, Client, ExpectedSendRes, Payload) when (N > 0) ->
 2804:     ?P("[socket,~w] send payload (expect failure)", [N]), 
 2805:     case gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload) of
 2806: 	{error, ExpectedSendRes} ->
 2807: 	    ?P("[socket,~w] payload send failure (as expected)", [N]), 
 2808: 	    exit(normal);
 2809: 	{error, BadReason} ->
 2810: 	    ?P("[socket,~w] unexpected failure reason:"
 2811: 	       "~n   ~p", [N, BadReason]),
 2812: 	    craasp_populate_sender(N-1, Client, ExpectedSendRes, Payload);
 2813: 	ok ->
 2814: 	    ?P("[socket,~w] unexpected success - expected failure with ~p",
 2815:                [N, ExpectedSendRes]),
 2816: 	    craasp_populate_sender(N-1, Client, ExpectedSendRes, Payload)
 2817:     end;
 2818: craasp_populate_sender(_, _, _, _) ->
 2819:     exit(failed_sending_payload).
 2820: 
 2821: craasp_verify(_OS, _ISB,
 2822: 	      Client, EConnReset, _Payload)
 2823:   when (EConnReset =:= default) orelse is_boolean(EConnReset) ->
 2824:     ?P("[client,~w] attempt receive and expect error (closed)", [EConnReset]),
 2825:     if
 2826:         is_port(Client) ->
 2827:             ?P("   Port Info:     ~p"
 2828:                "~n   Socket Status: ~s",
 2829:                [try erlang:port_info(Client)
 2830:                 catch
 2831:                     _:_:_ ->
 2832:                         "-"
 2833:                 end,
 2834:                 try prim_inet:getstatus(Client) of
 2835:                     {ok, CStatus} -> ?F("~p", [CStatus]);
 2836:                     _             -> "-"
 2837:                 catch
 2838:                     _:_:_ ->
 2839:                         "-"
 2840:                 end]);
 2841:         true ->
 2842:             ?P("   Socket Info: ~p", [inet:info(Client)])
 2843:     end,
 2844:     case gen_tcp:recv(Client, 0) of
 2845:         {error, closed}     when (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2846:             ok;
 2847:         {error, econnreset} when (EConnReset =:= true)    ->
 2848:             ok;
 2849:         {error, Reason} ->
 2850:             {error, {unexpected_error, Reason}};
 2851:         ok ->
 2852:             {error, unexpected_success}
 2853:     end;
 2854: craasp_verify(win32 = _OS, true = _ISB,
 2855: 	      Client, EConnReset, _Payload)
 2856:   when (EConnReset =:= default) orelse is_boolean(EConnReset) ->
 2857:     ?P("[client,~w] attempt receive and expect error (closed): "
 2858:        "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 2859:        "~n   Socket Status: ~s",
 2860:        [EConnReset, inet:info(Client),
 2861: 	try prim_inet:getstatus(Client) of
 2862:             {ok, CStatus} -> ?F("~p", [CStatus]);
 2863:             _             -> "-"
 2864:         catch
 2865:             _:_:_ ->
 2866:                 "-"
 2867:         end]),
 2868:     case gen_tcp:recv(Client, 0) of
 2869:         {error, closed}     when (EConnReset =:= default) ->
 2870:             ok;
 2871:         {error, econnreset} when (EConnReset =:= true)    ->
 2872:             ok;
 2873:         {error, Reason} ->
 2874:             {error, {unexpected_error, Reason}};
 2875:         ok ->
 2876:             {error, unexpected_success}
 2877:     end.
 2878: 
 2879: craasp_cleanup(Client, Sender) ->
 2880:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Client)),
 2881:     craasp_cleanup(Sender).
 2882: 
 2883: craasp_cleanup(Sender) when is_pid(Sender) ->
 2884:     exit(Sender, kill),
 2885:     receive
 2886:         {'EXIT', Sender, _} ->
 2887:             ok
 2888:     after 0 ->
 2889:             ok
 2890:     end;
 2891: craasp_cleanup(_) ->
 2892:     ok.

 2895: 
 2896: %%
 2897: %% Test {linger {true, 0}} aborts a connection
 2898: %%
 2899: 
 2900: linger_zero(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2901:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 2902:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 2903:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 2904:                             Addr;
 2905:                         {error, Reason} ->
 2906:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 2907:                     end
 2908:            end,
 2909:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_linger_zero(Config, Addr) end,
 2910:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 2911:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 2912: 
 2913: do_linger_zero(Config, Addr) ->
 2914:     %% All the econnreset tests will prove that {linger, {true, 0}} aborts
 2915:     %% a connection when the driver queue is empty. We will test here
 2916:     %% that it also works when the driver queue is not empty.
 2917:     ?P("[ctrl] pre"),
 2918:     {OS, ISB, Client, Server} = lz_pre(Config, Addr),
 2919: 
 2920:     ?P("[ctrl] populate when"
 2921:        "~n   OS:     ~p"
 2922:        "~n   ISB:    ~p"
 2923:        "~n   Client: ~p"
 2924:        "~n   Server: ~p", [OS, ISB, Client, Server]),
 2925:     PayloadSize  = 1024 * 1024,
 2926:     {ok, Sender} = lz_populate(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize),
 2927: 
 2928:     ?P("[ctrl] set linger: {true, 0}"),
 2929:     %% ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{debug,  true}]),
 2930:     ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 2931:     %% ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{linger, {true, 1}}]),
 2932:     ?P("[ctrl] read back the linger option"),
 2933:     {ok, [{linger, {true, 0}}]} = inet:getopts(Client, [linger]),
 2934:     %% {ok, [{linger, {true, 1}}]} = inet:getopts(Client, [linger]),
 2935:     %% ok = inet:setopts(Client, [{debug,  false}]),
 2936:     ?P("[ctrl] close client socket"),
 2937:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Client),
 2938:     ?P("[ctrl] sleep some"),
 2939:     ok = ct:sleep(1),
 2940: 
 2941:     ?P("[ctrl] verify"),
 2942:     lz_verify(Client, Server, PayloadSize),
 2943: 
 2944:     ?P("[ctrl] cleanup"), % Just in case
 2945:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Server)),
 2946:     if is_pid(Sender) -> exit(Sender, kill);
 2947:        true           -> ok
 2948:     end,
 2949: 
 2950:     ?P("[ctrl] done"),
 2951:     ok.
 2952: 
 2953: lz_pre(Config, Addr) ->
 2954:     {OS, _} = os:type(),
 2955:     ISB     = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 2956:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 2957:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip,              Addr},
 2958:                                   {active,          false},
 2959:                                   {recbuf,          4096},
 2960:                                   {show_econnreset, true}]),
 2961:     ?P("listen socket created"),
 2962:     %% inet_backend = inet
 2963:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 2964:     ?P("connect (create client socket)"),
 2965:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 2966:                            [{ip,      Addr},
 2967:                             {nodelay, true},
 2968:                             {active,  false},
 2969:                             {sndbuf,  4096}]) of
 2970:                  {ok, CSock} ->
 2971:                      CSock;
 2972:                  {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 2973:                      ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 2974:              end,
 2975:     ?P("accept"),
 2976:     {ok, Server} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 2977:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 2978:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 2979:     {OS, ISB, Client, Server}.
 2980: 
 2981: lz_populate(OS, _ISB, Client, PayloadSize) when is_port(Client) ->
 2982:     ?P("[inet] create payload"),
 2983:     Payload = lz_make_payload(PayloadSize),
 2984:     ?P("[inet] ensure non-empty queue"),
 2985:     lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Client, Payload, OS),
 2986:     {ok, undefined};
 2987: lz_populate(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize) ->
 2988:     ?P("[socket] send payload"),
 2989:     Sender = spawn_link(fun() ->
 2990: 				lz_populate_sender(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize)
 2991: 			end),
 2992:     receive
 2993:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} ->
 2994:             {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 2995:     after 2000 ->
 2996:             {ok, Sender}
 2997:     end.
 2998: 
 2999: lz_populate_sender(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize) ->
 3000:     ?P("[socket,~w,~w] create payload", [OS, ISB]),
 3001:     Payload = lz_make_payload(PayloadSize),
 3002:     if ((OS =:= win32) andalso ISB) ->
 3003: 	    ?P("[socket] send payload (expect one success and then failure)"),
 3004: 	    ok              = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3005: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3006: 	    ?P("[socket] payload send success + failure (as expected)"), 
 3007: 	    exit(normal);
 3008:        true ->
 3009: 	    ?P("[socket] send payload (expect failure)"),
 3010: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3011: 	    ?P("[socket] payload send failed (as expected)"), 
 3012: 	    exit(normal)
 3013:     end.
 3014: 
 3015: 
 3016: lz_verify(Client, Server, PayloadSize)
 3017:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 3018:     ?P("[inet] verify client socket (port) not connected"),
 3019:     undefined = erlang:port_info(Client, connected),
 3020:     ?P("[inet] try (and fail) recv (on accepted socket)"),
 3021:     {error, econnreset} = gen_tcp:recv(Server, PayloadSize),
 3022:     ok;
 3023: lz_verify(_Client, Server, PayloadSize) ->
 3024:     ?P("[socket] try (and fail) recv (on accepted socket)"),
 3025:     {error, econnreset} = gen_tcp:recv(Server, PayloadSize),
 3026:     ok.
 3027: 
 3028: lz_make_payload(PayloadSize) ->
 3029:     list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(PayloadSize, $.)).
 3030: 
 3031: %% THIS DOES NOT WORK FOR 'SOCKET'
 3032: lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, Payload, OS) when is_port(Sock) ->
 3033:     lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, Payload, OS, 1).
 3034: 
 3035: -define(LZ_MAX_SENDS, 3).
 3036: 
 3037: lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, _Payload, _OS, N) when (N > ?LZ_MAX_SENDS) ->
 3038:     ?P("queue size verification failed - port info: "
 3039:        "~n   Socket:      ~p"
 3040:        "~n   Socket info: ~p", [Sock, erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3041:     ct:fail("Queue size verification failed");
 3042: lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, Payload, OS, N) ->
 3043:     ?P("try send payload (~w bytes) ~w (on client socket) when port info:"
 3044:        "~n   ~p", [byte_size(Payload), N, erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3045:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, Payload),
 3046:     ?P("try verify client socket queue size"),
 3047:     case erlang:port_info(Sock, queue_size) of
 3048: 	{queue_size, QSz} when QSz > 0 ->
 3049:             ?P("queue size verification *successful* (~p) - port info: "
 3050:                "~n   ~p", [QSz, erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3051:             ok;
 3052: 	{queue_size, 0} when OS =:= win32 ->
 3053:             ?P("queue size verification *successful* - port info: "
 3054:                "~n   ~p", [erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3055:             ok;
 3056: 	{queue_size, 0} ->
 3057:             ?P("queue size verification failed - port info: "
 3058:                "~n   ~p", [erlang:port_info(Sock)]),
 3059:             lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Sock, Payload, OS, N+1)
 3060:     end.
 3061: 
 3062: 
 3063: linger_zero_sndbuf(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3064:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3065:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3066:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3067:                             Addr;
 3068:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3069:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3070:                     end
 3071:            end,
 3072:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_linger_zero_sndbuf(Config, Addr) end,
 3073:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3074:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3075: 
 3076: do_linger_zero_sndbuf(Config, Addr) ->
 3077:     %% All the econnreset tests will prove that {linger, {true, 0}} aborts
 3078:     %% a connection when the driver queue is empty. We will test here
 3079:     %% that it also works when the driver queue is not empty
 3080:     %% and the linger zero option is set on the listen socket.
 3081:     {OS, ISB, Client, Server} = lzs_pre(Config, Addr),
 3082:     inet:setopts(Client, [{sys_trace, true}]),
 3083: 
 3084:     PayloadSize = 1024 * 1024,
 3085:     {ok, Sender} = lzs_populate(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize),
 3086: 
 3087:     ?P("verify linger: {true, 0}"),
 3088:     {ok, [{linger, {true, 0}}]} = inet:getopts(Server, [linger]),
 3089:     ?P("close client socket"),
 3090:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Server),
 3091:     ok = ct:sleep(1),
 3092: 
 3093:     lzs_verify(Client, Server, PayloadSize),
 3094: 
 3095:     ?P("cleanup"), % Just in case
 3096:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Server)),
 3097:     if is_pid(Sender) -> exit(Sender, kill);
 3098:        true           -> ok
 3099:     end,
 3100: 
 3101:     ?P("done"),
 3102:     ok.
 3103: 
 3104: lzs_pre(Config, Addr) ->
 3105:     {OS, _} = os:type(),
 3106:     ISB     = ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config),
 3107:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 3108:     {ok, Listen} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip,              Addr},
 3109:                                        {active,          false},
 3110:                                        {recbuf,          4096},
 3111:                                        {show_econnreset, true},
 3112:                                        {linger,          {true, 0}}]),
 3113:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Listen),
 3114:     ?P("connect (create client socket)"),
 3115:     Client = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 3116:                            [{ip,      Addr},
 3117:                             {nodelay, true},
 3118:                             {active,  false},
 3119:                             {sndbuf,  4096}]) of
 3120:             {ok, CSock} ->
 3121:                 CSock;
 3122:             {error, eaddrnotavail = CReason} ->
 3123:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(CReason))
 3124:         end,
 3125:     ?P("accept"),
 3126:     {ok, Server} = gen_tcp:accept(Listen),
 3127:     %% On *some* platforms, the linger is inherited,
 3128:     %% but not all so do not assume...
 3129:     ?P("check if linger option was inherited"),
 3130:     case inet:getopts(Server, [linger]) of
 3131: 	{ok, [{linger, {true, 0}}]} ->
 3132: 	    ?P("linger option was inherited"),
 3133: 	    ok;
 3134: 	{ok, [{linger, {true, TO}}]} ->
 3135: 	    ?P("linger option was *not* inherited: TRUE, ~p", [TO]),
 3136: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 3137: 	    ok;
 3138: 	{ok, [{linger, {false, TO}}]} ->
 3139: 	    ?P("linger option was *not* inherited: FALSE, ~p", [TO]),
 3140: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 3141: 	    ok;
 3142: 	{error, SReason} ->
 3143: 	    ?P("FAILED reading linger option: ~p", [SReason]),
 3144: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Server, [{linger, {true, 0}}]),
 3145: 	    ok
 3146:     end,
 3147:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 3148:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Listen),
 3149:     {OS, ISB, Client, Server}.
 3150: 
 3151: lzs_populate(OS, _ISB, Client, PayloadSize) when is_port(Client) ->
 3152:     ?P("[inet] create payload"),
 3153:     Payload = lzs_make_payload(PayloadSize),
 3154:     ?P("[inet] ensure non-empty queue"),
 3155:     lz_ensure_non_empty_queue(Client, Payload, OS),
 3156:     {ok, undefined};
 3157: lzs_populate(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize) ->
 3158:     ?P("[socket] send payload ( = start payload sender)"),
 3159:     Sender = spawn(fun() ->
 3160: 			   lzs_populate_sender(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize)
 3161: 		   end),
 3162:     receive
 3163:         {'EXIT', Sender, Reason} ->
 3164:             {error, {unexpected_exit, Sender, Reason}}
 3165:     after 2000 ->
 3166:             {ok, Sender}
 3167:     end.
 3168: 
 3169: lzs_populate_sender(OS, ISB, Client, PayloadSize) ->
 3170:     ?P("[socket,~w,~w] create payload", [OS, ISB]),
 3171:     Payload = lzs_make_payload(PayloadSize),
 3172:     if ((OS =:= win32) andalso ISB) ->
 3173: 	    ?P("[socket] send payload (expect one success and then failure)"), 
 3174: 	    ok              = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3175: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3176: 	    ?P("[socket] payload send success + failure (as expected)"), 
 3177: 	    exit(normal);
 3178:        true ->
 3179: 	    ?P("[socket] send payload (expect failure)"), 
 3180: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:send(Client, Payload),
 3181: 	    ?P("[socket] payload send failed (as expected)"), 
 3182: 	    exit(normal)
 3183:     end.
 3184:     
 3185: lzs_make_payload(PayloadSize) ->
 3186:     Payload = binary:copy(<<"0123456789ABCDEF">>, 64 * 1024), % 1 MB
 3187:     if (PayloadSize =:= byte_size(Payload)) ->
 3188:             Payload;
 3189:        true ->
 3190:             exit({payload_size, PayloadSize, byte_size(Payload)})
 3191:     end.
 3192: 
 3193: lzs_verify(Client, Server, PayloadSize)
 3194:   when is_port(Client) andalso is_port(Server) ->
 3195:     ?P("[inet] verify client socket (port) not connected"),
 3196:     undefined = erlang:port_info(Server, connected),
 3197:     ?P("[inet] try (and fail) recv (on accepted socket)"),
 3198:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(Client, PayloadSize),
 3199:     ok;
 3200: lzs_verify(Client, _Server, PayloadSize) ->
 3201:     ?P("[socket] try (and fail) recv (on accepted socket)"),
 3202:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(Client, PayloadSize),
 3203:     ok.
 3204:     
 3205: %% Thanks to Luke Gorrie. Tests for a very specific problem with 
 3206: %% corrupt data. The testcase will be killed by the timetrap timeout
 3207: %% if the bug is present.
 3208: http_bad_packet(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3209:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3210:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3211:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3212:                             Addr;
 3213:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3214:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3215:                     end
 3216:            end,
 3217:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_http_bad_packet(Config, Addr) end,
 3218:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3219:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3220: 
 3221: do_http_bad_packet(Config, Addr) ->
 3222:     {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip,        Addr},
 3223:                                  {active,    false},
 3224:                                  binary,
 3225:                                  {reuseaddr, true},
 3226:                                  {packet,    http}]),
 3227:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(L),
 3228:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 3229:                        erlang:yield(),
 3230:                        http_bad_client(Config, Addr, Port)
 3231:                end),
 3232:     case gen_tcp:accept(L) of
 3233:         {ok,S} ->
 3234:             http_worker(S);
 3235:         Err ->
 3236:             exit({accept,Err})
 3237:     end.
 3238: 
 3239: http_worker(S) ->
 3240:     case gen_tcp:recv(S, 0, 30000) of
 3241: 	{ok,{http_error,Error}} ->
 3242: 	     io:format("Http error: ~s\n", [Error]);
 3243: 	{ok,Data} ->
 3244: 	    io:format("Data: ~p\n", [Data]),
 3245: 	    http_worker(S)
 3246:     end.
 3247: 
 3248: http_bad_client(Config, Addr, Port) ->
 3249:     {ok,S} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 3250:                       [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}, binary]),
 3251:     ok = gen_tcp:send(S, "\r\n"),
 3252:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S).
 3253: 
 3254: 
 3255: %% Fill send queue and then start receiving.
 3256: %%
 3257: busy_send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3258:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3259:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3260:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3261:                             Addr;
 3262:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3263:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3264:                     end
 3265:            end,
 3266:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_busy_send(Config, Addr) end,
 3267:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3268:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3269: 
 3270: do_busy_send(Config, Addr) ->
 3271:     OldFlag = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3272:     Master  = self(),
 3273:     Msg     = <<"the quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog~n">>,
 3274:     ?P("[master] start server"),
 3275:     ServerF =
 3276:         fun() ->
 3277:                 ?P("[server] create listen socket"),
 3278:                 case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary,
 3279:                                          {ip,        Addr},
 3280:                                          {active,    false},
 3281:                                          {reuseaddr, true},
 3282:                                          {packet,    0},
 3283:                                          {recbuf,    4096},
 3284:                                          {sndbuf,    4096}]) of
 3285:                     {ok, L} ->
 3286:                         ?P("[server] listen socket created"),
 3287:                         {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 3288:                         Master ! {self(), listen_port, Port},
 3289:                         ?P("[server] await continue"),
 3290:                         receive
 3291:                             {Master, continue} ->
 3292:                                 ?P("[server] received continue"),
 3293:                                 busy_send_srv(L, Master, Msg)
 3294:                         end;
 3295:                     {error, Reason} ->
 3296:                         ?P("[server] UNEXPECTED: ~w", [Reason]),
 3297:                         ?SKIPE(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 3298:                 end
 3299:         end,
 3300:     Server = spawn_link(ServerF),
 3301:     ?P("[master] server: ~p", [Server]),
 3302:     ListenPort =
 3303:         receive
 3304:             {'EXIT', Server, {skip, _} = SKIP} ->
 3305:                 ?P("[master] server issued skip: "
 3306:                    "~n      ~p", [SKIP]),
 3307:                 throw(SKIP);
 3308: 
 3309:             {'EXIT', Server, Reason} ->
 3310:                 ?P("[master] server crashed: "
 3311:                    "~n      ~p", [Reason]),
 3312:                 exit({server, Reason});
 3313: 
 3314:             {Server, listen_port, LP} ->
 3315:                 ?P("listen port: ~p", [LP]),
 3316:                 LP
 3317:         end,
 3318:     ?P("[master] start client"),
 3319:     ClientF = 
 3320:       fun () ->
 3321:               ?P("[client] await (connect) server port"),
 3322:               Port =
 3323:                   receive
 3324:                       {Master, connect, P} ->
 3325:                           P
 3326:                   end,
 3327:               ?P("[client] connect to ~w", [Port]),
 3328: 	      case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 3329:                             [binary,
 3330:                              {ip,     Addr},
 3331:                              {active, false},
 3332:                              {packet, 0},
 3333:                              {recbuf, 4096},
 3334:                              {sndbuf, 4096}]) of
 3335:                   {ok, Socket} ->
 3336:                       Master ! {self(), connected},
 3337:                       ?P("[client] connected - await recv"),
 3338:                       receive
 3339:                           {Master, recv, N} ->
 3340:                               ?P("[client] received recv:~w", [N]),
 3341:                               busy_send_client_loop(Socket, Master, Msg, N)
 3342:                       end;
 3343:                   {error, eaddrnotavail = CReason} ->
 3344:                       ?P("[client] UNEXPECTED: ~w", [CReason]),
 3345:                       ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(CReason))
 3346:               end
 3347:       end,
 3348:     Client = spawn_link(ClientF),
 3349:     ?P("[master] client: ~p", [Client]),
 3350:     Server ! {self(), continue},
 3351:     Client ! {self(), connect, ListenPort},
 3352:     receive
 3353:         {Client, connected} ->
 3354:             ?P("[master] client connected"),
 3355:             ok
 3356:     end,
 3357:     busy_send_loop(Server, Client, 0),
 3358:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFlag),
 3359:     ?P("[master] done"),
 3360:     ok.
 3361: 
 3362: busy_send_loop(Server, Client, N) ->
 3363:     %% Master
 3364:     %%
 3365:     receive
 3366:         {Server, send} ->
 3367:             busy_send_loop(Server, Client, N+1)
 3368: 
 3369:     after 2000 ->
 3370:             ?P("[master] send timeout: server send queue full (N = ~w+1)", [N]),
 3371:             %% Send queue full, sender blocked 
 3372:             %% -> stop sender and release client
 3373:             Server ! {self(), close},
 3374:             Client ! {self(), recv, N+1},
 3375:             ?P("[master] await server 'send'..."),
 3376:             receive
 3377:                 {Server, send} ->
 3378:                     busy_send_2(Server, Client, N+1)
 3379:             after 10000 ->
 3380:                     %% If this happens, see busy_send_srv
 3381:                     ?P("[master] UNEXPECTED: server send timeout"),
 3382:                     ct:fail({timeout,{server,not_send,flush([])}})
 3383:             end
 3384:     end.
 3385: 
 3386: busy_send_2(Server, Client, _N) ->
 3387:     %% Master
 3388:     %%
 3389:     ?P("[master] await (server) closed"),
 3390:     receive
 3391:         {Server, [closed]} ->
 3392:             ?P("[master] received expected (server) closed - "
 3393:                "await client closed"),
 3394:             receive
 3395:                 {Client, [0,{error,closed}]} ->
 3396:                     ?P("[master] received expected (client) closed"),
 3397:                     ok
 3398:             end
 3399:     after 10000 ->
 3400:             ?P("[master] UNEXPECTED: server closed timeout"),
 3401:             ct:fail({timeout, {server, not_closed, flush([])}})
 3402:     end.
 3403: 
 3404: busy_send_srv(L, Master, Msg) ->
 3405:     %% Server
 3406:     %% Sometimes this accept does not return, do not really know why
 3407:     %% but it causes the timeout error in busy_send_loop to be
 3408:     %% triggered. Only happens on OS X Leopard?!?
 3409:     ?P("[server] try accept"),
 3410:     case gen_tcp:accept(L) of
 3411:         {ok, Socket} ->
 3412:             ?P("[server] accepted"),
 3413:             busy_send_srv_loop(Socket, Master, Msg);
 3414:         {error, Reason} ->
 3415:             ?P("UNEXPECTED: server accept failure: ~p", [Reason]),
 3416:             ?SKIPE(accept_failed_str(Reason))
 3417:     end.
 3418: 
 3419: busy_send_srv_loop(Socket, Master, Msg) ->
 3420:     %% Server
 3421:     %%
 3422:     receive
 3423: 	{Master, close} ->
 3424:             ?P("[server] received close"),
 3425: 	    ok = gen_tcp:close(Socket),
 3426: 	    Master ! {self(),flush([closed])}
 3427:     after 0 ->
 3428: 	    ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket, Msg),
 3429: 	    Master ! {self(), send},
 3430: 	    busy_send_srv_loop(Socket, Master, Msg)
 3431:     end.
 3432: 
 3433: busy_send_client_loop(Socket, Master, Msg, N) ->
 3434:     %% Client
 3435:     %%
 3436:     Size = byte_size(Msg),
 3437:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, Size) of
 3438: 	{ok, Msg} ->
 3439: 	    busy_send_client_loop(Socket, Master, Msg, N-1);
 3440: 	Other ->
 3441:             ?P("[client] recv response: "
 3442:                "~n      ~p", [Other]),
 3443: 	    Master ! {self(), flush([Other,N])}
 3444:     end.
 3445: 
 3446: %%%
 3447: %%% Send to a socket whose other end does not read until the port gets busy.
 3448: %%% Then close the other end. The writer should get an {error,closed} error.
 3449: %%% (Passive mode.)
 3450: %%%
 3451: 
 3452: busy_disconnect_passive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3453:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3454:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3455:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3456:                             Addr;
 3457:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3458:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3459:                     end
 3460:            end,
 3461:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_busy_disconnect_passive(Config, Addr) end,
 3462:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3463:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3464: 
 3465: do_busy_disconnect_passive(Config, Addr) ->
 3466:     ?P("[passive] begin"),
 3467:     MuchoData = list_to_binary(ones(64*1024)),
 3468:     [do_busy_disconnect_passive2(Config, Addr, MuchoData, N) ||
 3469:         N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 3470:     ?P("[passive] done"),
 3471:     ok.
 3472: 
 3473: do_busy_disconnect_passive2(Config, Addr, MuchoData, N) ->
 3474:     ?P("[passive,~w] *** prepare server *** ", [N]),
 3475:     {_Server, S} = busy_disconnect_prepare_server(Config, Addr, [{active,false}]),
 3476:     ?P("[passive,~w] server prepared - start sending", [N]),
 3477:     {_OSFam, OSName} = os:type(),
 3478:     busy_disconnect_passive_send(S, MuchoData, OSName).
 3479: 
 3480: busy_disconnect_passive_send(S, Data, OS) ->
 3481:     case gen_tcp:send(S, Data) of
 3482: 	ok ->
 3483:             busy_disconnect_passive_send(S, Data, OS);
 3484: 	{error, closed} ->
 3485:             ok;
 3486: 	{error, eprototype = Reason} when (OS =:= darwin) ->
 3487: 	    ?P("send failed with ~w", [Reason]),
 3488:             ok
 3489:     end.
 3490: 
 3491: %%%
 3492: %%% Send to a socket whose other end does not read until the port gets busy.
 3493: %%% Then close the other end. The writer should get an {error,closed} error and
 3494: %%% a {tcp_closed,Socket} message. (Active mode.)
 3495: %%%
 3496: busy_disconnect_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3497:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3498:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3499:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3500:                             Addr;
 3501:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3502:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3503:                     end
 3504:            end,
 3505:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_busy_disconnect_active(Config, Addr) end,
 3506:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3507:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3508: 
 3509: do_busy_disconnect_active(Config, Addr) ->
 3510:     ?P("[active] begin"),
 3511:     MuchoData = list_to_binary(ones(64*1024)),
 3512:     [do_busy_disconnect_active2(Config, Addr, MuchoData, N) ||
 3513:         N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 3514:     ?P("[active] done"),
 3515:     ok.
 3516: 
 3517: do_busy_disconnect_active2(Config, Addr, MuchoData, N) ->
 3518:     ?P("[active,~w] *** prepare server *** ", [N]),
 3519:     {Server, S} = busy_disconnect_prepare_server(Config, Addr, [{active,true}]),
 3520:     ?P("[active,~w] server prepared - start sending", [N]),
 3521:     busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, MuchoData).
 3522: 
 3523: busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, Data) ->
 3524:     {_OSFam, OSName} = os:type(),
 3525:     busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, Data, 1, OSName).
 3526: 
 3527: busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, Data, Iter, OS) ->
 3528:     case gen_tcp:send(S, Data) of
 3529: 	ok ->
 3530:             busy_disconnect_active_send(Server, S, Data, Iter+1, OS);
 3531: 	{error, closed} ->
 3532:             ?P("[active-sender,~w] send failed with closed - await tcp-closed",
 3533: 	       [Iter]),
 3534:             busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S);
 3535: 
 3536: 	{error, eprototype = Reason} when (OS =:= darwin) ->
 3537:             ?P("[active-sender,~w] send failed with ~w - await tcp-closed",
 3538: 	       [Iter, Reason]),
 3539:             busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S);
 3540: 
 3541:         {error, einval = Reason} ->
 3542:             ?P("[active-sender,~w] UNEXPECTED send failure:"
 3543:                "~n   ~p", [Iter, Reason]),
 3544:             ?SKIPT(send_failed_str(Reason));
 3545: 
 3546:         {error, Reason} ->
 3547:             ?P("[active-sender,~w] UNEXPECTED send failure:"
 3548:                "~n   ~p", [Iter, Reason]),
 3549:             ct:fail({unexpected_send_result, Reason, Iter})
 3550:     end.
 3551: 
 3552: busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S) ->
 3553:     busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S, false, false).
 3554: busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S, Closed, Stopped) ->
 3555:     receive
 3556:         {tcp_closed, S} when (Stopped =:= true) ->
 3557:             ?P("[active-sender] received tcp-closed - done"),
 3558:             ok;
 3559: 
 3560:         {tcp_closed, S} ->
 3561:             ?P("[active-sender] received tcp-closed"),
 3562:             busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S, true, Stopped);
 3563: 
 3564:         {'EXIT', Server, normal} when (Closed =:= true) ->
 3565:             ?P("[active-sender] received server (normal) exit - done"),
 3566:             ok;
 3567: 
 3568:         {'EXIT', Server, normal} ->
 3569:             ?P("[active-sender] received server (normal) exit"),
 3570:             busy_disconnect_active_send_await_closed(Server, S, Closed, true);
 3571: 
 3572:         Other ->
 3573:             ?P("[active-sender] received UNEXPECTED message:"
 3574:                "~n   Expected tcp-close of ~p"
 3575:                "~n   Server:               ~p"
 3576:                "~n   Unexpected message:   ~p", [S, Server, Other]),
 3577:             ct:fail({unexpected, Other, S, flush([])})
 3578:     end.
 3579:     
 3580: 
 3581: busy_disconnect_prepare_server(Config, Addr, ConnectOpts) ->
 3582:     Sender = self(),
 3583:     ?P("[prep-server] create server"),
 3584:     Server = spawn_link(fun() ->
 3585:                                 busy_disconnect_server(Config, Addr, Sender)
 3586:                         end),
 3587:     ?P("[prep-server] await port (from server)"),
 3588:     receive {port, Server, Port} -> ok end,
 3589:     ?P("[prep-server] connect to ~w", [Port]),
 3590:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [{ip, Addr} | ConnectOpts]) of
 3591:         {ok, S} ->
 3592:             ?P("[prep-server] connected - order server start sending"),
 3593:             Server ! {Sender, sending},
 3594:             ?P("[prep-server] done"),
 3595:             {Server, S};
 3596:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 3597:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 3598:     end.
 3599: 
 3600: busy_disconnect_server(Config, Addr, Sender) ->
 3601:     ?P("[server] create listen socket"),
 3602:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,
 3603:                       [binary,
 3604:                        {ip,        Addr},
 3605:                        {active,    false},
 3606:                        {reuseaddr, true},
 3607:                        {packet,    0}]),
 3608:     ?P("[server] created - get port number"),
 3609:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(L),
 3610:     ?P("[server] send port ~w (to sender)", [Port]),
 3611:     Sender ! {port,self(),Port},
 3612:     ?P("[server] try accept"),
 3613:     {ok,S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 3614:     ?P("[server] connection accepted"),
 3615:     receive
 3616: 	{Sender, sending} ->
 3617:             ?P("[server] received sending (from sender)"),
 3618: 	    busy_disconnect_server_wait_for_busy(Sender, S)
 3619:     end.
 3620: 
 3621: %% Close the socket as soon as the Sender process can't send because of
 3622: %% a busy port.
 3623: busy_disconnect_server_wait_for_busy(Sender, S) ->
 3624:     case process_info(Sender, status) of
 3625: 	{status, waiting = Status} ->
 3626: 	    %% We KNOW that the sender will be in state 'waiting' only
 3627: 	    %% if the port has become busy. (Fallback solution if the
 3628: 	    %% implementation changes: Watch Sender's reduction count;
 3629: 	    %% when it stops changing, wait 2 seconds and then close.)
 3630: 	    ?P("[server] sender status ~p => close socket", [Status]),
 3631: 	    gen_tcp:close(S);
 3632: 	{status, Status} ->
 3633: 	    ?P("[server] sender status ~p", [Status]),
 3634: 	    timer:sleep(100),
 3635: 	    busy_disconnect_server_wait_for_busy(Sender, S);
 3636: 	Other ->
 3637: 	    ?P("[server] sender status ~p", [Other]),
 3638: 	    timer:sleep(100),
 3639: 	    busy_disconnect_server_wait_for_busy(Sender, S)
 3640:     end.
 3641: 
 3642: 
 3643: %%%
 3644: %%% Fill send queue
 3645: %%%
 3646: fill_sendq(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3647:     Cond = fun() ->
 3648: 		   is_windows() andalso ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) andalso
 3649: 		       skip("Unstable for 'socket on Windows'"),
 3650: 		   ok
 3651: 	   end,
 3652:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3653:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3654:                             Addr;
 3655:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3656:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3657:                     end
 3658:            end,
 3659:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_fill_sendq(Config, Addr) end,
 3660:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3661:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3662: 
 3663: do_fill_sendq(Config, Addr) ->
 3664:     OldFlag = process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 3665:     Master  = self(),
 3666:     ServerF =
 3667:         fun () ->
 3668:                 ?P("[server] try listen"),
 3669:                 case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr},
 3670:                                          {active,false},binary,
 3671:                                          {reuseaddr,true},{packet,0}]) of
 3672:                     {ok, L} ->
 3673:                         ?P("[server] try port"),
 3674:                         case inet:port(L) of
 3675:                             {ok, Port} ->
 3676:                                 Master ! {self(), listen_port, Port},
 3677:                                 fill_sendq_srv(L, Master);
 3678:                             {error, PReason} ->
 3679:                                 ?SKIPE(port_failed_str(PReason))
 3680:                         end;
 3681:                     {error, LReason} ->
 3682:                         ?SKIPE(listen_failed_str(LReason))
 3683:                 end
 3684:         end,
 3685:     Server  = spawn_link(ServerF),
 3686:     ?P("[master] server: ~p", [Server]),
 3687:     ClientF =
 3688:         fun () ->
 3689:                 ?P("[client] await server port"),
 3690:                 ServerPort =
 3691:                     receive
 3692:                         {Master, server_port, SP} ->
 3693:                             ?P("[client] server port: ~w", [SP]),
 3694:                             SP
 3695:                     end,
 3696:                 %% Just close on order
 3697:                 ?P("[client] try connect"),
 3698:                 case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, ServerPort,
 3699:                               [{ip, Addr}, {active,false},binary,{packet,0}]) of
 3700:                     {ok, S} ->
 3701:                         ?P("[client] connected"),
 3702:                         Master ! {self(), connected},
 3703:                         receive
 3704:                             {Master, close} ->
 3705:                                 ?P("[client] received close"),
 3706:                                 ok = gen_tcp:close(S)
 3707:                         end;
 3708:                     {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 3709:                         ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 3710:                 end
 3711:         end,
 3712:     Client = spawn_link(ClientF),
 3713:     ?P("[master] client: ~p", [client]),
 3714:     ListenPort =
 3715:         receive
 3716:             {Server, listen_port, LP} ->
 3717:                 ?P("[master] listen port: ~w", [LP]),
 3718:                 LP
 3719:         end,
 3720:     Client ! {self(), server_port, ListenPort},
 3721:     ?P("[master] await client connected"),
 3722:     receive {Client, connected} -> ok end,
 3723:     ?P("[master] await reader"),
 3724:     Res = receive
 3725:               {Server, reader, Reader} ->
 3726:                   ?P("[master] reader: ~p", [Reader]),
 3727:                   fill_sendq_loop(Server, Client, Reader)
 3728:           end,
 3729:     process_flag(trap_exit, OldFlag),    
 3730:     ?P("[master] done"),
 3731:     Res.
 3732: 
 3733: fill_sendq_loop(Server, Client, Reader) ->
 3734:     %% Master
 3735:     %%
 3736:     receive
 3737:         {Server, send} ->
 3738: 	    fill_sendq_loop(Server, Client, Reader)
 3739:     after 2000 ->
 3740: 	    %% Send queue full, sender blocked -> close client.
 3741: 	    ?P("[master] send timeout, closing client"),
 3742: 	    Client ! {self(), close},
 3743: 	    receive
 3744:                 {Server, [{error,closed}] = SErrors} ->
 3745:                     ?P("[master] got expected server closed"),
 3746:                     receive
 3747:                         {Reader, [{error,closed}]} ->
 3748:                             ?P("[master] got expected reader closed"),
 3749:                             ok;
 3750:                         {Reader, RErrors} when is_list(RErrors) ->
 3751:                             ct:fail([{server, SErrors}, {reader, RErrors}])
 3752:                     after 3000 ->
 3753:                             ct:fail({timeout,{closed,reader}})
 3754:                     end;
 3755: 
 3756:                 {Server, SErrors} when is_list(SErrors) ->
 3757:                     ?P("UNEXPECTED SERVER ERROR(S): "
 3758:                        "~n   ~p"
 3759:                        "~n   ~p", [SErrors, flush([])]),
 3760:                     ct:fail([{server, SErrors}, {reader, []}]);
 3761: 
 3762:                 {Reader, [{error,closed}] = RErrors} ->
 3763:                     ?P("[master] got expected reader closed"),
 3764:                     receive
 3765:                         {Server, [{error,closed}]} ->
 3766:                             ?P("[master] got expected server closed"),
 3767:                             ok;
 3768:                         {Server, SErrors} when is_list(SErrors) ->
 3769:                             ct:fail([{server, SErrors}, {reader, RErrors}])
 3770:                     after 3000 ->
 3771:                             ct:fail({timeout,{closed,server}})
 3772:                     end;
 3773: 
 3774:                 {Reader, RErrors} when is_list(RErrors) ->
 3775:                     ?P("UNEXPECTED READER ERROR(S): "
 3776:                        "~n   ~p"
 3777:                        "~n   ~p", [RErrors, flush([])]),
 3778:                     ct:fail([{server, []}, {reader, RErrors}])
 3779: 
 3780:             after 3000 ->
 3781:                     Msgs = flush([]),
 3782:                     ct:fail({timeout,{closed,[server,reader]}, Msgs})
 3783:             end
 3784:     end.
 3785: 
 3786: fill_sendq_srv(L, Master) ->
 3787:     %% Server
 3788:     %%
 3789:     ?P("[server] await accept"),
 3790:     case gen_tcp:accept(L) of
 3791: 	{ok, S} ->
 3792:             ?P("[server] accepted ~p", [S]),
 3793: 	    Master ! {self(), reader,
 3794: 		      spawn_link(fun () -> fill_sendq_read(S, Master) end)},
 3795: 	    Msg = "the quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog~n",
 3796: 	    fill_sendq_write(S, Master, [Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg,Msg]);
 3797: 	E ->
 3798:             Error = flush([E]),
 3799: 	    ?P("[server] accept error: ~p", [E]),
 3800: 	    Master ! {self(), Error}
 3801:     end.
 3802: 
 3803: fill_sendq_write(S, Master, Msg) ->
 3804:     %% Server
 3805:     %%
 3806:     %% ?P("[server,writer] sending..."),
 3807:     case gen_tcp:send(S, Msg) of
 3808: 	ok ->
 3809:             Master ! {self(), send},
 3810: 	    %% ?P("[server,writer] ok."),
 3811: 	    fill_sendq_write(S, Master, Msg);
 3812: 	{error, _} = E ->
 3813: 	    Error = flush([E]),
 3814: 	    ?P("[server,writer] send error: ~p", [Error]),
 3815: 	    Master ! {self(), Error}
 3816:     end.
 3817: 
 3818: fill_sendq_read(S, Master) ->
 3819:     %% Reader
 3820:     %%
 3821:     ?P("[server,reader] read infinity..."),
 3822:     case gen_tcp:recv(S, 0, infinity) of
 3823: 	{ok, Data} ->
 3824: 	    ?P("[server,reader] recv: ~p", [Data]),
 3825: 	    fill_sendq_read(S, Master);
 3826: 	E ->
 3827: 	    Error = flush([E]),
 3828: 	    ?P("[server,reader] recv error: ~p", [Error]),
 3829: 	    Master ! {self(), Error}
 3830:     end.
 3831: 
 3832: 
 3833: %%% Try to receive more than available number of bytes from 
 3834: %%% a closed socket.
 3835: %%%
 3836: partial_recv_and_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3837:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3838:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3839:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3840:                             Addr;
 3841:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3842:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3843:                     end
 3844:            end,
 3845:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_partial_recv_and_close(Config, Addr) end,
 3846:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3847:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3848: 
 3849: do_partial_recv_and_close(Config, Addr) ->
 3850:     Msg = "the quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789\n",
 3851:     Len = length(Msg),
 3852:     {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 3853:     {ok,P} = inet:port(L),
 3854:     Sock =
 3855:         case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, P, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]) of
 3856:             {ok, S} ->
 3857:                 S;
 3858:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 3859:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 3860:     end,
 3861:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 3862:     ok = gen_tcp:send(Sock, Msg),
 3863:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 3864:     %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, true}]),
 3865:     case gen_tcp:recv(A, Len+1) of
 3866: 	{error, closed} ->
 3867: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3868: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3869: 	    ok;
 3870: 	{error, BadReason} ->
 3871: 	    ?P("unexpected failure (should be 'closed'): "
 3872: 	       "~n   ~p", [BadReason]),
 3873: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3874: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3875: 	    error;
 3876: 	{ok, Msg} ->
 3877: 	    ?P("unexpected success (with expected message): "
 3878: 	       "~n   ~p", [Msg]),
 3879: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3880: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3881: 	    error;
 3882: 	{ok, BadMsg} ->
 3883: 	    ?P("unexpected success (with unexpected message): "
 3884: 	       "~n   ~p", [BadMsg]),
 3885: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3886: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3887: 	    error
 3888:     end.
 3889: 
 3890: 
 3891: %%% Try to receive more than available number of bytes from 
 3892: %%% a closed socket, this time waiting in the recv before closing.
 3893: %%%
 3894: partial_recv_and_close_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3895:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3896:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3897:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3898:                             Addr;
 3899:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3900:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3901:                     end
 3902:            end,
 3903:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_partial_recv_and_close_2(Config, Addr) end,
 3904:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3905:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3906: 
 3907: do_partial_recv_and_close_2(Config, Addr) ->
 3908:     Msg = "the quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog 0123456789\n",
 3909:     Len = length(Msg),
 3910:     {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 3911:     {ok,P} = inet:port(L),
 3912:     Server = self(),
 3913:     Client =
 3914: 	spawn_link(
 3915: 	  fun () ->
 3916: 		  receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 3917: 		  case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, P, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]) of
 3918:                       {ok, S} ->
 3919:                           ok = gen_tcp:send(S, Msg),
 3920:                           receive {Server,close} -> ok end,
 3921:                           receive after 2000 -> ok end,
 3922:                           ok = gen_tcp:close(S);
 3923:                       {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 3924:                           ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 3925:                   end
 3926: 	  end),
 3927:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 3928:     Client ! {Server, close},
 3929:     %% {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(A, Len+1),
 3930:     %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, true}]),
 3931:     case gen_tcp:recv(A, Len+1) of
 3932: 	{error, closed} ->
 3933: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3934: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3935: 	    ok;
 3936: 	{error, BadReason} ->
 3937: 	    ?P("unexpected failure (should be 'closed'): "
 3938: 	       "~n   ~p", [BadReason]),
 3939: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3940: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3941: 	    error;
 3942: 	{ok, Msg} ->
 3943: 	    ?P("unexpected success (with 'expected' message): "
 3944: 	       "~n   ~p", [Msg]),
 3945: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3946: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3947: 	    error;
 3948: 	{ok, BadMsg} ->
 3949: 	    ?P("unexpected success (with *unexpected* message): "
 3950: 	       "~n   ~p", [BadMsg]),
 3951: 	    %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 3952: 	    gen_tcp:close(A),
 3953: 	    error
 3954:     end.
 3955: 
 3956: %%% Here we tests that gen_tcp:recv/2 will return {error,closed} following
 3957: %%% a send operation of a huge amount data when the other end closed the socket.
 3958: %%%
 3959: partial_recv_and_close_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3960:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 3961:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 3962:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 3963:                             Addr;
 3964:                         {error, Reason} ->
 3965:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 3966:                     end
 3967:            end,
 3968:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_partial_recv_and_close_3(Config, Addr) end,
 3969:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 3970:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 3971: 
 3972: do_partial_recv_and_close_3(Config, Addr) ->
 3973:     [do_partial_recv_and_close_4(Config, Addr) || _ <- lists:seq(0, 20)],
 3974:     ok.
 3975: 
 3976: do_partial_recv_and_close_4(Config, Addr) ->
 3977:     Parent = self(),
 3978:     spawn_link(fun() ->
 3979: 		       {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0,
 3980:                                         [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 3981: 		       {ok, {_,Port}} = inet:sockname(L),
 3982: 		       Parent ! {port,Port},
 3983: 		       {ok,S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 3984: 		       gen_tcp:recv(S, 1),
 3985: 		       gen_tcp:close(S)
 3986: 	       end),
 3987:     receive
 3988: 	{port,Port} -> ok
 3989:     end,
 3990:     Much = ones(8*64*1024),
 3991:     S = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}]) of
 3992:             {ok, Sock} ->
 3993:                 Sock;
 3994:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 3995:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 3996:     end,
 3997: 
 3998:     %% Send a lot of data (most of it will be queued).
 3999:     %% The receiver will read one byte and close the connection.
 4000:     %% The write operation will fail.
 4001:     gen_tcp:send(S, Much),
 4002: 
 4003:     %% We should always get {error,closed} here.
 4004:     {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0).
 4005:

 4007: test_prio_put_get(Config, Addr) ->
 4008:     Tos = 3 bsl 5,
 4009:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> create listen socket"),
 4010:     {ok,L1} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 4011:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> set opts prio (= 3)"),
 4012:     ok = inet:setopts(L1,[{priority,3}]),
 4013:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> set opts tos (= ~p)", [Tos]),
 4014:     ok = inet:setopts(L1,[{tos,Tos}]),
 4015:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> verify opts prio and tos"),
 4016:     {ok,[{priority,3},{tos,Tos}]} = inet:getopts(L1,[priority,tos]),
 4017:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> set opts prio (= 3)"),
 4018:     ok = inet:setopts(L1,[{priority,3}]), % Dont destroy each other
 4019:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> verify opts prio and tos"),
 4020:     {ok,[{priority,3},{tos,Tos}]} = inet:getopts(L1,[priority,tos]),
 4021:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> set opts reuseaddr (= true)"),
 4022:     ok = inet:setopts(L1,[{reuseaddr,true}]), % Dont let others destroy
 4023:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> verify opts prio and tos"),
 4024:     {ok,[{priority,3},{tos,Tos}]} = inet:getopts(L1,[priority,tos]),
 4025:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> close listen socket"),
 4026:     gen_tcp:close(L1),
 4027:     ?P("test_prio_put_get -> done"),
 4028:     ok.
