 4030: test_prio_accept(Config, Addr) ->
 4031:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> create listen socket"),
 4032:     {ok, Sock} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet,0},{active,false},
 4033:                                      {reuseaddr,true},{priority,4}]),
 4034:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> get port number of listen socket"),
 4035:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Sock),
 4036:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> connect to port ~p", [Port]),
 4037:     Sock2 = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [binary,
 4038:                                                {ip, Addr},
 4039:                                                {packet,0},
 4040:                                                {active,false},
 4041:                                                {reuseaddr,true},
 4042:                                                {priority,4}]) of
 4043:                 {ok, S2} -> 
 4044:                     S2;
 4045:                 {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4046:                     ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4047:             end,
 4048:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> connected => accept connection"),
 4049:     {ok, Sock3} = gen_tcp:accept(Sock),
 4050:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> accepted => getopts prio for listen socket"),
 4051:     {ok, [{priority,4}]} = inet:getopts(Sock,  [priority]),
 4052:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> getopts prio for connected socket"),
 4053:     {ok, [{priority,4}]} = inet:getopts(Sock2, [priority]),
 4054:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> getopts prio for accepted socket"),
 4055:     {ok, [{priority,4}]} = inet:getopts(Sock3, [priority]),
 4056:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> close listen socket"),
 4057:     gen_tcp:close(Sock),
 4058:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> close connected socket"),
 4059:     gen_tcp:close(Sock2),
 4060:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> close accepted socket"),
 4061:     gen_tcp:close(Sock3),
 4062:     ?P("test_prio_accept -> done"),
 4063:     ok.
 4064:

 4143: test_prio_accept_async(Config, Addr) ->
 4144:     Tos1 = 4 bsl 5,
 4145:     Tos2 = 3 bsl 5,
 4146:     Ref = make_ref(),
 4147:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> create prio server"),
 4148:     spawn(?MODULE, priority_server, [Config, Addr, {self(),Ref}]),
 4149:     Port = receive
 4150:                {Ref,P} -> P
 4151:            after 5000 -> ct:fail({error,"helper process timeout"})
 4152:            end,
 4153:     receive
 4154:     after 3000 -> ok
 4155:     end,
 4156:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> connect to port ~p", [Port]),
 4157:     Sock2 = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [binary,
 4158: 					      {ip, Addr},
 4159: 					      {packet,0},
 4160:                                               {active,false},
 4161:                                               {reuseaddr,true},
 4162:                                               {priority,4},
 4163:                                               {tos,Tos2}]) of
 4164:                 {ok, S2} ->
 4165:                     S2;
 4166:                 {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4167:                     ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 4168:             end,
 4169:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> "
 4170:        "connected => await prio and tos for listen socket"),
 4171:     receive
 4172:         {Ref,{ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos1}]}} ->
 4173:             ok;
 4174:         {Ref,Error} ->
 4175:             ct:fail({mismatch,Error})
 4176:     after 5000 -> ct:fail({error,"helper process timeout"})
 4177:     end,
 4178:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> await prio and tos for accepted socket"),
 4179:     receive
 4180:         {Ref,{ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos1}]}} ->
 4181:             ok;
 4182:         {Ref,Error2} ->
 4183:             ct:fail({mismatch,Error2})
 4184:     after 5000 -> ct:fail({error,"helper process timeout"})
 4185:     end,
 4186: 
 4187:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> getopts prio and tos for connected socket"),
 4188:     {ok,[{priority,4},{tos,Tos2}]} = inet:getopts(Sock2, [priority,tos]),
 4189:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> close connected socket"),
 4190:     catch gen_tcp:close(Sock2),
 4191:     ?P("test_prio_accept_async -> done"),
 4192:     ok.
 4193: 
 4194: priority_server(Config, Addr, {Parent,Ref}) ->
 4195:     Tos1 = 4 bsl 5,
 4196:     {ok,Sock}=?LISTEN(Config, 0,[binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet,0},{active,false},
 4197:                                 {reuseaddr,true},{priority,4},
 4198:                                 {tos,Tos1}]),
 4199:     {ok,Port} = inet:port(Sock),
 4200:     Parent ! {Ref,Port},
 4201:     {ok,Sock3}=gen_tcp:accept(Sock),
 4202:     Parent ! {Ref, inet:getopts(Sock,[priority,tos])},
 4203:     Parent ! {Ref, inet:getopts(Sock3,[priority,tos])},
 4204:     ok.
 4205: 
 4206: test_prio_fail(Config, Addr) ->
 4207:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> create listen socket"),
 4208:     {ok,L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 4209:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> try set (and fail) opts prio (= 1000)"),
 4210:     {error,_} = inet:setopts(L,[{priority,1000}]),
 4211:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> close listen socket"),
 4212:     gen_tcp:close(L),
 4213:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> done"),
 4214:     ok.
 4215: 
 4216: test_prio_udp(Addr) ->
 4217:     Tos = 3 bsl 5,
 4218:     ?P("test_prio_udp -> create UDP socket (open)"),
 4219:     {ok,S} = gen_udp:open(0,[{ip, Addr}, {active,false},binary,{tos, Tos},
 4220:                              {priority,3}]),
 4221:     ?P("test_prio_udp -> getopts prio and tos"),
 4222:     {ok,[{priority,3},{tos,Tos}]} = inet:getopts(S,[priority,tos]),
 4223:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> close socket"),
 4224:     gen_udp:close(S),
 4225:     ?P("test_prio_fail -> done"),
 4226:     ok.
 4227: 
 4228: %% Tests the so_priority and ip_tos options on sockets when applicable.
 4229: so_priority(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4230:     Cond = fun() ->
 4231: 		   case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 4232: 		       true ->
 4233: 		           is_socket_supported(),
 4234:                            has_support_sock_priority();
 4235: 		       false ->
 4236: 			   ok
 4237: 		   end
 4238:     	 end,
 4239:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 4240:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 4241:                             Addr;
 4242:                         {error, Reason} ->
 4243:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4244:                     end
 4245:            end,
 4246:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_so_priority(Config, Addr) end,
 4247:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 4248:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 4249: 
 4250: do_so_priority(Config, Addr) ->
 4251:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 4252:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 4253:     ?P("set opts on listen socket: prio to 1"),
 4254:     ok = inet:setopts(L,[{priority,1}]),
 4255:     ?P("verify prio"),
 4256:     case inet:getopts(L,[priority]) of
 4257: 	{ok,[{priority,1}]} ->
 4258:             ?P("close listen socket"),
 4259: 	    gen_tcp:close(L),
 4260: 	    test_prio_put_get(Config, Addr),
 4261: 	    test_prio_accept(Config, Addr),
 4262: 	    test_prio_accept2(Config, Addr),
 4263: 	    test_prio_accept3(Config, Addr),
 4264: 	    test_prio_accept_async(Config, Addr),
 4265: 	    test_prio_fail(Config, Addr),
 4266: 	    test_prio_udp(Addr),
 4267:             ?P("done"),
 4268: 	    ok;
 4269: 	_X ->
 4270: 	    case os:type() of
 4271: 		{unix,linux} ->
 4272: 		    case os:version() of
 4273: 			{X,Y,_} when (X > 2) or ((X =:= 2) and (Y >= 4)) ->
 4274:                             ?P("so prio should work on this version: "
 4275:                                "~n      ~p", [_X]),
 4276: 			    ct:fail({error,
 4277: 					   "so_priority should work on this "
 4278: 					   "OS, but does not"});
 4279: 			_ ->
 4280: 			    {skip, "SO_PRIORITY not suppoorted"}
 4281: 		    end;
 4282: 		_ ->
 4283: 		   {skip, "SO_PRIORITY not suppoorted"}
 4284: 	    end
 4285:     end.
 4286: 
 4287: 
 4288: 
 4289: %% IP_RECVTOS and IP_RECVTCLASS for IP_PKTOPTIONS
 4290: %% does not seem to be implemented in Linux until kernel 3.1
 4291: %%
 4292: %% It seems pktoptions does not return valid values
 4293: %% for IPv4 connect sockets.  On the accept socket
 4294: %% we get valid values, but on the connect socket we get
 4295: %% the default values for TOS and TTL.
 4296: %%
 4297: %% Therefore the argument CheckConnect that enables
 4298: %% checking the returned values for the connect socket.
 4299: %% It is only used for recvtclass that is an IPv6 option
 4300: %% and there we get valid values from both socket ends.
 4301: 
 4302: has_support_ip_pktoptions() ->
 4303:     has_support_ip_option(pktoptions).
 4304: 
 4305: has_support_ip_recvtos() ->
 4306:     has_support_ip_option(recvtos).
 4307: 
 4308: has_support_ip_recvttl() ->
 4309:     has_support_ip_option(recvttl).
 4310: 
 4311: has_support_ipv6_pktoptions() ->
 4312:     has_support_ipv6_option(pktoptions).
 4313: 
 4314: has_support_ipv6_tclass() ->
 4315:     has_support_ipv6_option(tclass).
 4316: 
 4317: has_support_ip_option(Opt) ->
 4318:     has_support_option(ip, Opt).
 4319: 
 4320: has_support_ipv6_option(Opt) ->
 4321:     has_support_option(ipv6, Opt).
 4322: 
 4323: has_support_option(Level, Option) ->
 4324:     try socket:is_supported(options, Level, Option)
 4325:     catch
 4326: 	_:_:_ -> false % Any platform that does not support socket!
 4327:     end.
 4328: 
 4329: has_os_support_recvtos() ->
 4330:     has_os_support_recvtos(os:type(), os:version()).
 4331: 
 4332: has_os_support_recvtos({unix, linux}, Version) ->
 4333:     not semver_lt(Version, {3,1,0});
 4334: has_os_support_recvtos(_, _) ->
 4335:     true.
 4336: 
 4337: has_os_support_recvttl() ->
 4338:     has_os_support_recvttl(os:type(), os:version()).
 4339: 
 4340: has_os_support_recvttl({unix, linux}, Version) ->
 4341:     not semver_lt(Version, {2,7,0});
 4342: has_os_support_recvttl(_, _) ->
 4343:     %% We should not even get here, but just in case...
 4344:     false.
 4345: 
 4346: has_os_support_recvtclass() ->
 4347:     has_os_support_recvtclass(os:type(), os:version()).
 4348: 
 4349: has_os_support_recvtclass({unix, linux}, Version) ->
 4350:     not semver_lt(Version, {3,1,0});
 4351: has_os_support_recvtclass(_, _) ->
 4352:     true.
 4353: 
 4354: semver_lt({X1,Y1,Z1} = V1, {X2,Y2,Z2} = V2) ->
 4355:     ?P("semver_lt -> OS version check:"
 4356:        "~n   (Actual)  Version 1: ~p"
 4357:        "~n   (Request) Version 2: ~p", [V1, V2]),
 4358:     if
 4359:         X1 > X2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> X1 > X2: ~p > ~p", [X1, X2]), false;
 4360:         X1 < X2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> X1 < X2: ~p < ~p", [X1, X2]), true;
 4361:         Y1 > Y2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Y1 > Y2: ~p > ~p", [Y1, Y2]), false;
 4362:         Y1 < Y2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Y1 < Y2: ~p < ~p", [Y1, Y2]), true;
 4363:         Z1 > Z2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Z1 > Z2: ~p > ~p", [Z1, Z2]), false;
 4364:         Z1 < Z2 -> ?P("semver_lt -> Z1 < Z2: ~p < ~p", [Z1, Z2]), true;
 4365:         true    -> ?P("semver_lt -> default"), false
 4366:     end;
 4367: semver_lt(V1, {_,_,_} = V2) ->
 4368:     ?P("semver_lt -> fallback OS version check when: "
 4369:        "~n   Version 1: ~p"
 4370:        "~n   Version 2: ~p", [V1, V2]),
 4371:     false.
 4372: 
 4373: recvtos(Config) ->
 4374:     test_pktoptions(
 4375:       Config,
 4376:       inet, [{recvtos,tos,96}],
 4377:       fun() ->
 4378:               has_support_ip_recvtos() andalso
 4379:                   has_os_support_recvtos() 
 4380:      end,
 4381:       "recvtos",
 4382:       false).
 4383: 
 4384: recvtosttl(Config) ->
 4385:     test_pktoptions(
 4386:       Config,
 4387:       inet, [{recvtos,tos,96},{recvttl,ttl,33}],
 4388:       fun() ->
 4389:               has_support_ip_recvtos() andalso
 4390: 		  has_support_ip_recvttl() andalso
 4391:                   has_os_support_recvtos() andalso
 4392:                   has_os_support_recvttl()
 4393:       end,
 4394:       "recvtos and/or recvttl",
 4395:       false).
 4396: 
 4397: recvttl(Config) ->
 4398:     test_pktoptions(
 4399:       Config,
 4400:       inet, [{recvttl,ttl,33}],
 4401:       fun() ->
 4402:               has_support_ip_recvttl() andalso
 4403:                   has_os_support_recvttl()
 4404:       end,
 4405:       "recvttl",
 4406:       false).
 4407: 
 4408: recvtclass(Config) ->
 4409:     {ok,IFs} = inet:getifaddrs(),
 4410:     case
 4411:         [Name ||
 4412:             {Name,Opts} <- IFs,
 4413:             lists:member({addr,{0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}}, Opts)]
 4414:     of
 4415:         [_] ->
 4416:             test_pktoptions(
 4417:               Config,
 4418:               inet6, [{recvtclass,tclass,224}],
 4419:               fun() ->
 4420:                       has_support_ipv6_tclass() andalso
 4421:                           has_os_support_recvtclass()
 4422:               end,
 4423:               "tclass",
 4424:               true);
 4425:         [] ->
 4426:             {skip,{ipv6_not_supported,IFs}}
 4427:     end.
 4428: 
 4429: test_pktoptions(Config, Family, Spec, OptCond, OptStr, CheckConnect) ->
 4430:     ?P("test_pktoptions -> begin test with"
 4431:        "~n   Config:       ~p"
 4432:        "~n   Family:       ~p"
 4433:        "~n   Spec:         ~p"
 4434:        "~n   CheckConnect: ~p",
 4435:        [Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect]),
 4436:     PktOptsCond = fun(inet)  -> has_support_ip_pktoptions();
 4437: 		     (inet6) -> has_support_ipv6_pktoptions()
 4438: 		  end,
 4439:     try PktOptsCond(Family) of
 4440: 	true ->
 4441: 	    ?P("pktoptions supported for family ~w", [Family]),
 4442: 	    case OptCond() of
 4443: 		true ->
 4444: 		    ?P("options supported: "
 4445: 		       "~n   ~p", [Spec]),
 4446: 		    test_pktoptions(Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect);
 4447: 		false ->
 4448: 		    {skip, ?F("Option(s) ~s not supported", [OptStr])}
 4449: 	    end;
 4450:         false ->
 4451:             {skip,
 4452:              ?F("Option 'pktoptions' not supported for family ~w", [Family])}
 4453:     catch
 4454:         _:_:_ ->
 4455:             {skip,
 4456:              ?F("Option 'pktoptions' not supported for family ~w", [Family])}
 4457:     end.
 4458: %%
 4459: test_pktoptions(Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect) ->
 4460:     ?P("test_pktoptions -> begin test with"
 4461:        "~n   Config:       ~p"
 4462:        "~n   Family:       ~p"
 4463:        "~n   Spec:         ~p"
 4464:        "~n   CheckConnect: ~p",
 4465:        [Config, Family, Spec, CheckConnect]),
 4466:     Timeout = 5000,
 4467:     RecvOpts = [RecvOpt || {RecvOpt,_,_} <- Spec],
 4468:     TrueRecvOpts = [{RecvOpt,true} || {RecvOpt,_,_} <- Spec],
 4469:     FalseRecvOpts = [{RecvOpt,false} || {RecvOpt,_,_} <- Spec],
 4470:     Opts = [Opt || {_,Opt,_} <- Spec],
 4471:     OptsVals = [{Opt,Val} || {_,Opt,Val} <- Spec],
 4472:     Address =
 4473:         case Family of
 4474:             inet ->
 4475:                 {127,0,0,1};
 4476:             inet6 ->
 4477:                 {0,0,0,0,0,0,0,1}
 4478:         end,
 4479:     %%
 4480:     %% Set RecvOpts on listen socket
 4481:     ?P("try create listen socket with: ~p", [TrueRecvOpts]),
 4482:     {ok, L} =
 4483:         ?LISTEN(Config, 
 4484:                 0,
 4485:                 [Family,binary,{active,false},{send_timeout,Timeout}
 4486:                  |TrueRecvOpts]),
 4487:     {ok, P} = inet:port(L),
 4488:     ?P("get (recv) options for listen socket: "
 4489:        "~n   ~p", [RecvOpts]),
 4490:     {ok, TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(L, RecvOpts),
 4491:     ?P("get options for listen socket: "
 4492:        "~n   ~p", [Opts]),
 4493:     {ok, OptsValsDefault} = inet:getopts(L, Opts),
 4494: 
 4495:     %%
 4496:     %% Set RecvOpts and Option values on connect socket
 4497:     ?P("create connect socket with"
 4498:        "~n   ~p", [TrueRecvOpts ++ OptsVals]),
 4499:     {ok, S2} =
 4500:         ?CONNECT(Config,
 4501:                  Address, P,
 4502:                  [Family,binary,{active,false},{send_timeout,Timeout}
 4503:                   |TrueRecvOpts ++ OptsVals],
 4504:                  Timeout),
 4505:     ?P("get (recv) options for connect socket: "
 4506:        "~n   ~p", [RecvOpts]),
 4507:     {ok, TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S2, RecvOpts),
 4508:     ?P("get options for connect socket: "
 4509:        "~n   ~p", [Opts]),
 4510:     {ok, OptsVals} = inet:getopts(S2, Opts),
 4511: 
 4512:     %%
 4513:     %% Accept socket inherits the options from listen socket
 4514:     ?P("try create accept socket"),
 4515:     {ok, S1} = gen_tcp:accept(L, Timeout),
 4516:     ?P("get (recv) options for accept socket: "
 4517:        "~n   ~p", [RecvOpts]),
 4518:     {ok, TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S1, RecvOpts),
 4519: 
 4520:     ?P("get options for accept socket: "
 4521:        "~n   ~p", [Opts]),
 4522:     {ok, OptsValsDefault} = inet:getopts(S1, Opts),
 4523:     ?P("accept socket option values: "
 4524:        "~n   ~p", [OptsValsDefault]),
 4525: 
 4526: %%%    %%
 4527: %%%    %% Handshake
 4528: %%%    ok = gen_tcp:send(S1, <<"hello">>),
 4529: %%%    {ok,<<"hello">>} = gen_tcp:recv(S2, 5, Timeout),
 4530: %%%    ok = gen_tcp:send(S2, <<"hi">>),
 4531: %%%    {ok,<<"hi">>} = gen_tcp:recv(S1, 2, Timeout),
 4532: 
 4533:     %%
 4534:     %% Verify returned remote options
 4535:     VerifyRemOpts =
 4536:         fun(S, Role) ->
 4537:                 case inet:getopts(S, [pktoptions]) of
 4538:                     {ok, []} ->
 4539:                         ?SKIPT("pktoptions not supported");
 4540:                     {ok, [{pktoptions, PktOpts1}]} ->
 4541:                         ?P("PktOptions (~w): "
 4542:                            "~n      ~p", [Role, PktOpts1]),
 4543:                         PktOpts1;
 4544:                     {ok, UnexpOK1} ->
 4545:                         ?P("Unexpected OK (~w): "
 4546:                            "~n   ~p"
 4547:                            "~n", [Role, UnexpOK1]),
 4548:                         exit({unexpected_getopts_ok,
 4549:                               Role,
 4550:                               Spec,
 4551:                               TrueRecvOpts,
 4552:                               OptsVals,
 4553:                               OptsValsDefault,
 4554:                               UnexpOK1});
 4555:                     {error, UnexpERR1} ->
 4556:                         ?P("Unexpected ERROR (~w): "
 4557:                            "~n   ~p"
 4558:                            "~n", [Role, UnexpERR1]),
 4559:                         exit({unexpected_getopts_failure,
 4560:                               Role,
 4561:                               Spec,
 4562:                               TrueRecvOpts,
 4563:                               OptsVals,
 4564:                               OptsValsDefault,
 4565:                               UnexpERR1})
 4566:                 end
 4567:         end,
 4568:     ?P("verify dest (accept)"),
 4569:     OptsVals1 = VerifyRemOpts(S1, dest),
 4570:     ?P("verify orig (connect)"),
 4571:     OptsVals2 = VerifyRemOpts(S2, orig),
 4572:     %% {ok,[{pktoptions,OptsVals1}]} = inet:getopts(S1, [pktoptions]),
 4573:     %% {ok,[{pktoptions,OptsVals2}]} = inet:getopts(S2, [pktoptions]),
 4574:     (Result1 = sets_eq(OptsVals1, OptsVals))
 4575:         orelse ?P("Accept differs: ~p neq ~p", [OptsVals1,OptsVals]),
 4576:     (Result2 = sets_eq(OptsVals2, OptsValsDefault))
 4577:         orelse ?P("Connect differs: ~p neq ~p",
 4578:                   [OptsVals2, OptsValsDefault]),
 4579:     %%
 4580:     ?P("close connect socket"),
 4581:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S2),
 4582:     ?P("close accept socket"),
 4583:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S1),
 4584:     %%
 4585:     %%
 4586:     %% Clear RecvOpts on listen socket and set Option values
 4587:     ?P("clear (recv) options on listen socket"),
 4588:     ok = inet:setopts(L, FalseRecvOpts ++ OptsVals),
 4589:     {ok,FalseRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(L, RecvOpts),
 4590:     ?P("set  options on listen socket"),
 4591:     {ok,OptsVals} = inet:getopts(L, Opts),
 4592: 
 4593:     %%
 4594:     %% Set RecvOpts on connecting socket
 4595:     %%
 4596:     ?P("create connect socket with"
 4597:        "~n   ~p", [TrueRecvOpts]),
 4598:     {ok,S4} =
 4599:         ?CONNECT(Config, 
 4600:           Address, P,
 4601:           [Family,binary,{active,false},{send_timeout,Timeout}
 4602:           |TrueRecvOpts],
 4603:           Timeout),
 4604:     ?P("get (recv) options on connect socket"),
 4605:     {ok,TrueRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S4, RecvOpts),
 4606:     ?P("get options on connect socket"),
 4607:     {ok,OptsValsDefault} = inet:getopts(S4, Opts),
 4608: 
 4609:     %%
 4610:     %% Accept socket inherits the options from listen socket
 4611:     ?P("create accept socket"),
 4612:     {ok,S3} = gen_tcp:accept(L, Timeout),
 4613:     ?P("get (recv) options on accept socket"),
 4614:     {ok,FalseRecvOpts} = inet:getopts(S3, RecvOpts),
 4615:     {ok,OptsVals} = inet:getopts(S3, Opts),
 4616:     %%
 4617:     %% Verify returned remote options
 4618:     ?P("verify pktoptions on accept socket"),
 4619:     {ok,[{pktoptions,[]}]} = inet:getopts(S3, [pktoptions]),
 4620:     ?P("verify pktoptions on connect socket"),
 4621:     {ok,[{pktoptions,OptsVals4}]} = inet:getopts(S4, [pktoptions]),
 4622:     ?P("verify options set"),
 4623:     (Result3 = sets_eq(OptsVals4, OptsVals))
 4624:         orelse ?P("Accept2 differs: ~p neq ~p", [OptsVals4, OptsVals]),
 4625:     %%
 4626:     ?P("close connect socket"),
 4627:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S4),
 4628:     ?P("close accept socket"),
 4629:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S3),
 4630:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 4631:     ok = gen_tcp:close(L),
 4632:     ?P("verify final result"
 4633:        "~n   Result1:       ~p"
 4634:        "~n   Check Connect: ~p"
 4635:        "~n   Result2:       ~p"
 4636:        "~n   Result3:       ~p",
 4637:       [Result1, CheckConnect, Result2, Result3]),
 4638:     (Result1 and ((not CheckConnect) or (Result2 and Result3)))
 4639:         orelse
 4640:         exit({failed,
 4641:               [{OptsVals1,OptsVals4,OptsVals},
 4642:                {OptsVals2,OptsValsDefault}]}),
 4643:     ?P("done"),
 4644:     ok.
 4645: 
 4646: sets_eq(L1, L2) ->
 4647:     lists:sort(L1) == lists:sort(L2).
 4648: 
 4649: 
 4650: 
 4651: %% Accept test utilities (suites are below)
 4652: 
 4653: millis() ->
 4654:     erlang:monotonic_time(millisecond).
 4655: 	
 4656: collect_accepts(0, _) -> [];
 4657: collect_accepts(N, Tmo) ->
 4658:     A = millis(),
 4659:     receive
 4660: 	{accepted, P, {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason}} ->
 4661:             ?P("~p Failed accept: ~p", [P, Reason]),
 4662:             ?SKIPT(accept_failed_str(Reason));
 4663: 
 4664:         {accepted, P, Msg} ->
 4665:             ?P("received 'accepted' from ~p: "
 4666:                "~n      ~p", [P, Msg]),
 4667:             NextN = if N =:= infinity -> N; true -> N - 1 end,
 4668: 	    [{P,Msg}] ++ collect_accepts(NextN, Tmo - (millis()-A))
 4669: 
 4670:     after Tmo ->
 4671:             ?P("accept timeout (~w)", [Tmo]),
 4672: 	    []
 4673:     end.
 4674: 
 4675: -define(EXPECT_ACCEPTS(Pattern,N,Timeout),
 4676: 	(fun() ->
 4677:                  case collect_accepts((N), (Timeout)) of
 4678: 		     Pattern ->
 4679: 			 ok;
 4680: 		     Other__ ->
 4681: 			 {error, {unexpected, {Other__, messages()}}}
 4682: 		 end
 4683: 	 end)()).
 4684: 	
 4685: collect_connects(Tmo) ->
 4686:     A = millis(),
 4687:     receive
 4688: 	{connected, P, {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason}} ->
 4689:             ?P("~p Failed connect: ~p", [P, Reason]),
 4690:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason));
 4691: 
 4692: 	{connected,P,Msg} ->
 4693:             ?P("received connected from ~p: "
 4694:                "~n      ~p", [P, Msg]),
 4695: 	    [{P,Msg}] ++ collect_connects(Tmo-(millis() - A))
 4696: 
 4697:     after Tmo ->
 4698: 	    []
 4699:     end.
 4700:    
 4701: -define(EXPECT_CONNECTS(Pattern,Timeout),
 4702: 	(fun() ->
 4703: 		 case collect_connects(Timeout) of
 4704: 		     Pattern ->
 4705: 			 ok;
 4706: 		     Other ->
 4707: 			 {error,{unexpected,Other}}
 4708: 		 end
 4709: 	 end)()).
 4710: 
 4711: mktmofun(Tmo,Parent,LS) ->
 4712:     fun() ->
 4713:             ?P("[acceptor] mktmofun:fun -> try accept"),
 4714:             AcceptResult = catch gen_tcp:accept(LS, Tmo),            
 4715:             ?P("[acceptor] mktmofun:fun -> accepted: "
 4716:                "~n   ~p", [AcceptResult]),
 4717:             Parent ! {accepted,self(), AcceptResult}
 4718:     end.
 4719: 
 4720: %% Accept tests
 4721: %% Test singular accept.
 4722: primitive_accept(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4723:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 4724:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 4725:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 4726:                             Addr;
 4727:                         {error, Reason} ->
 4728:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4729:                     end
 4730:            end,
 4731:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_primitive_accept(Config, Addr) end,
 4732:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 4733:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 4734: 
 4735: do_primitive_accept(Config, Addr) ->
 4736:     LSock =
 4737:         case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 4738:             {ok, LS} ->
 4739:                 LS;
 4740:             {error, LReason} ->
 4741:                 ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(LReason))
 4742:         end,
 4743:     {ok, PortNo} = inet:port(LSock),
 4744:     Parent = self(),
 4745:     F = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LSock)} end,
 4746:     P = spawn(F),
 4747:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 4748:         {ok, _} ->
 4749:             ok;
 4750:         {error, eaddrnotavail = CReason} ->
 4751:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(CReason))
 4752:     end,        
 4753:     receive
 4754:         {accepted,P,{ok,P0}} when is_port(P0) ->
 4755:             ok;
 4756:         {accepted,P,Other0} ->
 4757:             {error,Other0}
 4758:     after 500 ->
 4759:               {error,timeout}
 4760:     end.
 4761: 
 4762: 	
 4763: %% Closing listen socket when multi-accepting.
 4764: multi_accept_close_listen(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4765:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 4766:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 4767:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 4768:                             Addr;
 4769:                         {error, Reason} ->
 4770:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 4771:                     end
 4772:            end,
 4773:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_multi_accept_close_listen(Config, Addr) end,
 4774:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 4775:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 4776: 
 4777: do_multi_accept_close_listen(Config, Addr) ->
 4778:     ?P("try create listen socket"),
 4779:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 4780:              {ok, LSocket} ->
 4781:                  LSocket;
 4782:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4783:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 4784:          end,
 4785:     Parent = self(),
 4786:     F = fun() ->
 4787:                 ?P("started"),
 4788:                 Accepted = gen_tcp:accept(LS),
 4789:                 ?P("accept result: ~p", [Accepted]),
 4790:                 Parent ! {accepted,self(),Accepted}
 4791:         end,
 4792:     ?P("create acceptor processes"),
 4793:     spawn(F),
 4794:     spawn(F),
 4795:     spawn(F),
 4796:     spawn(F),
 4797:     ?P("sleep some"),
 4798:     ct:sleep(?SECS(2)),
 4799:     ?P("close (listen) socket"),
 4800:     gen_tcp:close(LS),
 4801:     ?P("await accepts"),
 4802:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{_,{error,closed}},{_,{error,closed}},
 4803:                           {_,{error,closed}},{_,{error,closed}}],4,500),
 4804:     ?P("done"),
 4805:     ok.
 4806:

 4980: %% Check that multi-accept timeouts happen in the correct order after
 4981: %% mixing millsec and sec timeouts (even more).
 4982: accept_timeouts_in_order6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 4983:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 4984:     Pre  = fun() ->
 4985: 		   ?P("try get local address"),
 4986: 		   {ok, Addr} = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 4987: 		   ?P("try create listen socket"), 
 4988: 		   case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 4989: 		       {ok, LSocket} ->
 4990: 			   #{socket => LSocket};
 4991: 		       {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 4992: 			   ?P("failed creating socket: ~p", [Reason]),
 4993: 			   {skip, listen_failed_str(Reason)}
 4994: 		   end
 4995: 	   end,
 4996:     TC   = fun(I) -> do_accept_timeouts_in_order6(I) end,
 4997:     Post = fun(#{socket := LSock}) ->
 4998: 		   gen_tcp:close(LSock)
 4999: 	   end,
 5000:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5001: 
 5002: do_accept_timeouts_in_order6(#{socket := LS}) ->    
 5003:     Parent = self(),
 5004: 
 5005:     ?P("create acceptor 1 with timeout 1000"),
 5006:     P1 = spawn(mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS)),
 5007: 
 5008:     ?P("create acceptor 2 with timeout 400"),
 5009:     P2 = spawn(mktmofun(400,Parent,LS)),
 5010: 
 5011:     ?P("create acceptor 3 with timeout 600"),
 5012:     P3 = spawn(mktmofun(600,Parent,LS)),
 5013: 
 5014:     ?P("create acceptor 4 with timeout 200"),
 5015:     P4 = spawn(mktmofun(200,Parent,LS)),
 5016: 
 5017:     ?P("await accept timeouts from (in order): "
 5018:        "~n   Acceptor 4: ~p"
 5019:        "~n   Acceptor 2: ~p"
 5020:        "~n   Acceptor 3: ~p"
 5021:        "~n   Acceptor 1: ~p", [P4, P2, P3, P1]),
 5022:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P4,{error,timeout}},
 5023:                           {P2,{error,timeout}},
 5024: 			  {P3,{error,timeout}},
 5025:                           {P1,{error,timeout}}],
 5026:                          infinity, 2000).

 5063: 
 5064: %% Check that multi-accept timeouts behave correctly when
 5065: %% mixed with successful timeouts.
 5066: %% Note that on Windows with inet_backend = socket we 
 5067: %% have *no* control over the accept order!
 5068: accept_timeouts_mixed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5069:     Cond = fun() ->
 5070: 		   is_windows() andalso
 5071: 		       ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) andalso
 5072: 		       ?SKIPT("Not compat with 'socket of Windows'"),
 5073: 		   ok
 5074: 	   end,
 5075:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5076:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5077:                             Addr;
 5078:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5079:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5080:                     end
 5081:            end,
 5082:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_accept_timeouts_mixed(Config, Addr) end,
 5083:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5084:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5085: 
 5086: do_accept_timeouts_mixed(Config, Addr) ->
 5087:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5088:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5089:              {ok, LSocket} ->
 5090:                  LSocket;
 5091:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5092:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5093:          end,
 5094:     Parent = self(),
 5095:     {ok, PortNo} = inet:port(LS),
 5096: 
 5097:     ?P("listen socket"
 5098:        "~n   ~p"
 5099:        "~n   Port: ~p", [LS, PortNo]),
 5100: 
 5101:     ?P("create acceptor process 1 (with timeout 1000)"),
 5102:     P1 = spawn(mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS)),
 5103: 
 5104:     ?P("await 1 (~p) accepting", [P1]),
 5105:     wait_until_accepting(P1,500),
 5106: 
 5107:     ?P("create acceptor process 2 (with timeout 2000)"),
 5108:     P2 = spawn(mktmofun(2000,Parent,LS)),
 5109: 
 5110:     ?P("await 2 (~p) accepting", [P2]),
 5111:     wait_until_accepting(P2,500),
 5112: 
 5113:     ?P("create acceptor process 3 (with timeout 3000)"),
 5114:     P3 = spawn(mktmofun(3000,Parent,LS)),
 5115: 
 5116:     ?P("await 3 (~p) accepting", [P3]),
 5117:     wait_until_accepting(P3,500),
 5118: 
 5119:     ?P("create acceptor process 4 (with timeout 4000)"),
 5120:     P4 = spawn(mktmofun(4000,Parent,LS)),
 5121: 
 5122:     ?P("await 4 (~p) accepting", [P4]),
 5123:     wait_until_accepting(P4,500),
 5124: 
 5125:     ?P("expect accept from 1 (~p) with timeout", [P1]),
 5126:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P1,{error,timeout}}],infinity,1500),
 5127: 
 5128:     ?P("connect"),
 5129:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5130:         {ok, _} ->
 5131:             ok;
 5132:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason1} ->
 5133:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason1))
 5134:     end,
 5135: 
 5136:     ?P("expect accept from 2 (~p) with success", [P2]),
 5137:     if is_port(LS) ->
 5138:             ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P2,{ok,Port0}}] when is_port(Port0),
 5139:                                                         infinity,100);
 5140:        true ->
 5141:             case ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P2,{ok,_}}],infinity,100) of
 5142: 		ok ->
 5143: 		    ok;
 5144: 		{error, Reason2} ->
 5145: 		    ?P("Failed accept: "
 5146: 		       "~n   P2:     ~p"
 5147: 		       "~n   Reason: ~p", [P2, Reason2]),
 5148: 		    ct:fail(unexpected_accepts)
 5149: 	    end
 5150:     end,
 5151: 
 5152:     ?P("expect accept from 3 (~p) with timeout", [P3]),
 5153:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P3,{error,timeout}}],infinity,2000),
 5154: 
 5155:     ?P("connect"),
 5156:     case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5157:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason3} ->
 5158:             ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(Reason3));
 5159:         _  ->
 5160:             ok
 5161:     end,
 5162: 
 5163:     ?P("expect accept from 4 (~p) with success", [P4]),
 5164:     if is_port(LS) ->
 5165:             ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P4,{ok,Port1}}] when is_port(Port1),
 5166:                                                         infinity,100);
 5167:        true ->
 5168:             ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{P4,{ok,_Port1}}],infinity,100)
 5169:     end,
 5170: 
 5171:     ?P("done"),
 5172:     ok.
 5173: 
 5174: %% Check that single acceptor behaves as expected when killed.
 5175: killing_acceptor(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5176:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5177:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5178:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5179:                             Addr;
 5180:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5181:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5182:                     end
 5183:            end,
 5184:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_killing_acceptor(Config, Addr) end,
 5185:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5186:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5187: 
 5188: do_killing_acceptor(Config, Addr) ->
 5189:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5190:     case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5191:         {ok, LSocket} when is_port(LSocket) ->
 5192:             do_killing_acceptor_inet(LSocket);
 5193:         {ok, LSocket} ->
 5194:             do_killing_acceptor_socket(LSocket);
 5195:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5196:             ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5197:     end,
 5198:     ?P("done"),
 5199:     ok.
 5200: 
 5201: do_killing_acceptor_inet(LS) ->
 5202:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5203:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], []),
 5204: 
 5205:     ?P("create acceptor process"),
 5206:     Pid = spawn(
 5207:             fun() ->
 5208:                     erlang:display({accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)})
 5209:             end),
 5210:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5211:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5212:     end,
 5213: 
 5214:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5215:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5216: 
 5217:     ?P("kill acceptor"),
 5218:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5219:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5220:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5221:     end,
 5222: 
 5223:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5224:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5225: 
 5226:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5227:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5228:     ok.
 5229: 
 5230: do_killing_acceptor_socket(LS) ->
 5231:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5232:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], []),
 5233: 
 5234:     ?P("create acceptor process"),
 5235:     Pid = spawn(
 5236:             fun() ->
 5237:                     erlang:display({accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)})
 5238:             end),
 5239:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5240:     ct:sleep(100),
 5241: 
 5242:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5243:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 1, [accepting], []),
 5244: 
 5245:     ?P("kill acceptor"),
 5246:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5247:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5248:     ct:sleep(1000),
 5249: 
 5250:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5251:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], [accepting]),
 5252: 
 5253:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5254:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5255:     ok.
 5256:     
 5257: validate_acceptor_state(LS, ExpStates, ExpNotStates) when is_port(LS) ->
 5258:     case inet:info(LS) of
 5259:         #{states := States} ->
 5260: 
 5261:             ?P("try validate (listen socket) state when: "
 5262:                "~n   Exp States:     ~p"
 5263:                "~n   Exp Not States: ~p"
 5264:                "~n   States:         ~p", [ExpStates, ExpNotStates, States]),
 5265: 
 5266:             %% State *shall* contain ExpStates => States1 =/= States
 5267:             States1 = States -- ExpStates,
 5268: 
 5269:             %% State shall *not* contain ExpNotStates => States2 =:= States
 5270:             States2 = States -- ExpNotStates,
 5271: 
 5272:             if
 5273:                 (States1 =/= States) andalso
 5274:                 (States2 =:= States) ->
 5275:                     ?P("validated: "
 5276:                        "~n    Expected States:     ~p"
 5277:                        "~n    Expected Not States: ~p",
 5278:                        [ExpStates, ExpNotStates]),
 5279:                     ok;
 5280:                true ->
 5281:                     ?P("invalid states: "
 5282:                        "~n   Expected States:     ~p"
 5283:                        "~n   Expected Not States: ~p"
 5284:                        "~n   States:              ~p",
 5285:                        [ExpStates, ExpNotStates, States]),
 5286:                     ct:fail("Invalid state(s)")
 5287:             end;
 5288: 
 5289:         InvalidInfo ->
 5290:             ?P("invalid info: "
 5291:                "~n   Expected States:     ~p"
 5292:                "~n   Expected Not States: ~p"
 5293:                "~n   Invalid Info:        ~p",
 5294:                [ExpStates, ExpNotStates, InvalidInfo]),
 5295:             ct:fail("Invalid state")
 5296:     end.
 5297: 
 5298: validate_acceptor_state(LS, ExpNumAcc, ExpState, ExpNotState) ->
 5299:     case inet:info(LS) of
 5300:         #{num_acceptors := ExpNumAcc, rstates := States} ->
 5301:             ?P("try validate state when: "
 5302:                "~n   Expected State:     ~p"
 5303:                "~n   Expected Not State: ~p"
 5304:                "~n   RStates:            ~p", [ExpState, ExpNotState, States]),
 5305: 
 5306:             %% States *shall* contain ExpState => States1 =/= States
 5307:             States1 = States -- ExpState,
 5308:             
 5309:             %% States shall *not* contain ExpNotState => States2 =:= States
 5310:             States2 = States -- ExpNotState,
 5311: 
 5312:             if
 5313:                 (States1 =/= States) andalso
 5314:                 (States2 =:= States) ->
 5315:                     ?P("validated: "
 5316:                        "~n    Expected States:     ~p"
 5317:                        "~n    Expected Not States: ~p",
 5318:                        [ExpState, ExpNotState]),
 5319:                     ok;
 5320:                true ->
 5321:                     ?P("invalid states: "
 5322:                        "~n   Expected State:     ~p"
 5323:                        "~n   Expected Not State: ~p"
 5324:                        "~n   States:             ~p",
 5325:                        [ExpState, ExpNotState, States]),
 5326:                     ct:fail("Invalid state(s)")
 5327:             end;
 5328: 
 5329:         #{num_acceptors := NumAcc, rstates := RStates, wstates := WStates} ->
 5330:             ?P("invalid state: "
 5331:                "~n   Expected Num Acceptors: ~w"
 5332:                "~n   Num Acceptors:          ~w"
 5333:                "~n   Expected State:         ~p"
 5334:                "~n   Expected Not State:     ~p"
 5335:                "~n   RStates:                ~p"
 5336:                "~n   WStates:                ~p",
 5337:                [ExpNumAcc, NumAcc, ExpState, RStates, WStates]),
 5338:             ct:fail("Invalid state");
 5339: 
 5340:         InvalidInfo ->
 5341:             ?P("invalid info: "
 5342:                "~n   Expected Num Acceptors: ~w"
 5343:                "~n   Expected State:         ~p"
 5344:                "~n   Expected Not State:     ~p"
 5345:                "~n   Invalid Info:           ~p",
 5346:                [ExpNumAcc, ExpNumAcc, ExpState, InvalidInfo]),
 5347:             ct:fail("Invalid state")
 5348:     end.
 5349:     
 5350: 
 5351: %% Check that multi acceptors behaves as expected when killed.
 5352: killing_multi_acceptors(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5353:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5354:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5355:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5356:                             Addr;
 5357:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5358:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5359:                     end
 5360:            end,
 5361:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_killing_multi_acceptors(Config, Addr) end,
 5362:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5363:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5364: 
 5365: do_killing_multi_acceptors(Config, Addr) ->
 5366:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5367:     case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}]) of
 5368:         {ok, LSocket} when is_port(LSocket) ->
 5369:             do_killing_multi_acceptors_inet(LSocket);
 5370:         {ok, LSocket} ->
 5371:             do_killing_multi_acceptors_socket(LSocket);
 5372:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5373:             ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5374:     end,
 5375:     ?P("done"),
 5376:     ok.
 5377: 
 5378: do_killing_multi_acceptors_inet(LS) ->
 5379:     ?P("validate state - listen"),
 5380:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], []),
 5381: 
 5382:     Parent = self(),
 5383:     F1  = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)} end,
 5384:     Tmo = 1000,
 5385:     F2  = mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS),
 5386:     ?P("create first acceptor"),
 5387:     Pid1 = spawn(F1),
 5388:     ?P("create second acceptor - with timeout"),
 5389:     Pid2 = spawn(F2),
 5390: 
 5391:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5392:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 5393: 
 5394:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5395:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5396: 
 5397:     ?P("kill first acceptor"),
 5398:     exit(Pid1, kill),
 5399: 
 5400:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5401:     receive after 100 -> ok end,
 5402: 
 5403:     ?P("validate state - still accepting"),
 5404:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5405: 
 5406:     ?P("await second acceptor exit (timeout)"),
 5407:     %% In order to avoid race condition, double the time
 5408:     case ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{Pid2, {error,timeout}}], 1, 2 * Tmo) of
 5409: 	ok ->
 5410: 	    ?P("second acceptor - expected result"),
 5411: 	    ok;
 5412: 	Any ->
 5413: 	    ?P("second acceptor - failed:"
 5414: 	       "~n      ~p", [Any]),
 5415: 	    %% Check what Pid2 is doing
 5416: 	    Pid2Info1 = process_info(Pid2),
 5417: 	    Pid2Msgs1 = process_info(Pid2, messages),
 5418: 	    %% Check if this is just a race...
 5419: 	    ?SLEEP(?SECS(1)),
 5420: 	    Pid2Info2 = process_info(Pid2),
 5421: 	    Pid2Msgs2 = process_info(Pid2, messages),
 5422: 	    ?P("second acceptor failed - check ~p"
 5423: 	       "~n      Info 1: ~p"
 5424: 	       "~n      Msgs 1: ~p"
 5425: 	       "~n   After 1 sec sleep:"
 5426: 	       "~n      Info 2: ~p"
 5427: 	       "~n      Msgs 2: ~p",
 5428: 	       [Pid2, Pid2Info1, Pid2Msgs1, Pid2Info2, Pid2Msgs2]),
 5429: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_accepts, Any})
 5430:     end,
 5431: 
 5432:     ?P("validate state - *not* accepting"),
 5433:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5434: 
 5435:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5436:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5437:     ok.
 5438: 
 5439: do_killing_multi_acceptors_socket(LS) ->
 5440:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5441:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], []),
 5442: 
 5443:     Parent = self(),
 5444:     F = fun() -> Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)} end,
 5445:     F2 = mktmofun(1000,Parent,LS),
 5446:     ?P("create first acceptor"),
 5447:     Pid = spawn(F),
 5448:     ?P("create second acceptor - with timeout"),
 5449:     Pid2 = spawn(F2),
 5450: 
 5451:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5452:     ct:sleep(100),
 5453: 
 5454:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5455:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 2, [accepting], []),
 5456: 
 5457:     ?P("kill first acceptor"),
 5458:     exit(Pid, kill),
 5459:     ?P("sleep some"),
 5460:     ct:sleep(100),
 5461: 
 5462:     ?P("validate state - (still) accepting"),
 5463:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 1, [accepting], []),
 5464: 
 5465:     ?P("await second acceptor exit - timeout"),
 5466:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{Pid2,{error,timeout}}],1,1000),
 5467: 
 5468:     ?P("validate state - listening"),
 5469:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, 0, [listening], [accepting]),
 5470:

 5472:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5473:     ok.

 5502:

 5506: 
 5507:     Parent = self(),

 5509:     {ok, {Addr, PortNo}} = inet:sockname(LS),
 5510:

 5527:

 5529:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5530:     end,

 5534:     true  = lists:member(accepting, L2),
 5535:

 5546:     ?P("create acceptor 3"),
 5547:     Pid3 = spawn(F2),
 5548: 
 5549:     ?P("wait some"),
 5550:     receive after 100 -> ok
 5551:     end,
 5552: 
 5553:     ?P("validate state - accepting"),
 5554:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [accepting], []),
 5555: 
 5556:     ?P("connect to port ~p", [PortNo]),
 5557:     ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}]),
 5558: 
 5559:     ?P("await accept"),
 5560:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{Pid3,{ok,CSock}}] when is_port(CSock),1,100),
 5561:

 5563:     validate_acceptor_state(LS, [listen], [accepting]),
 5564: 
 5565:     ?P("cleanup"),
 5566:     (catch gen_tcp:close(LS)),
 5567:     ok.

 5632: 
 5633: %% Checks that multi-accept works when more than one accept can be
 5634: %% done at once (wb test of inet_driver).
 5635: several_accepts_in_one_go(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5636:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5637:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5638:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5639:                             Addr;
 5640:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5641:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5642:                     end
 5643:            end,
 5644:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_several_accepts_in_one_go(Config, Addr) end,
 5645:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5646:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5647: 
 5648: do_several_accepts_in_one_go(Config, Addr) ->
 5649:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5650:     NumActors = 8,
 5651:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {backlog, NumActors}]) of
 5652:              {ok, LSock} ->
 5653:                  LSock;
 5654:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5655:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5656:          end,
 5657:     Parent = self(),
 5658:     {ok, PortNo} = inet:port(LS),
 5659:     F1 = fun() ->
 5660: 		 ?P("acceptor starting"),
 5661: 		 Parent ! {accepted,self(),gen_tcp:accept(LS)}
 5662:          end,
 5663:     F2 = fun() ->
 5664: 		 ?P("connector starting"),
 5665: 		 Parent ! {connected,self(),
 5666:                            ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNo, [{ip, Addr}])}
 5667:          end,
 5668:     Ns = lists:seq(1, NumActors),
 5669:     ?P("start acceptors"),
 5670:     _  = [spawn(F1) || _ <- Ns],
 5671:     ?P("await accept timeouts"),
 5672:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([],1,500), % wait for tmo
 5673:     ?P("start connectors"),
 5674:     _  = [spawn(F2) || _ <- Ns],
 5675:     ?P("await accepts"),
 5676:     ok = ?EXPECT_ACCEPTS([{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}}],NumActors,15000),
 5677:     ?P("await connects"),
 5678:     ok = ?EXPECT_CONNECTS([{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}},{_,{ok,_}}],1000),
 5679:     ?P("done"),
 5680:     ok.
 5681: 
 5682: flush(Msgs) ->
 5683:     erlang:yield(),
 5684:     receive Msg -> flush([Msg|Msgs])
 5685:     after     0 -> lists:reverse(Msgs)
 5686:     end.
 5687: 
 5688: wait_until_accepting(Proc,0) ->
 5689:     exit({timeout_waiting_for_accepting,Proc});
 5690: wait_until_accepting(Proc,N) ->
 5691:     case process_info(Proc,current_function) of
 5692:         {current_function, {prim_inet, accept0, 3}} ->
 5693:             case process_info(Proc, status) of
 5694:                 {status,waiting} ->
 5695: 		    ?P("[prim_inet] ~p accepting when n = ~w", [Proc, N]),
 5696:                     ok;
 5697:                 _O1 ->
 5698:                     receive 
 5699:                     after 5 ->
 5700:                             wait_until_accepting(Proc, N-1)
 5701:                     end
 5702:             end;
 5703:         {current_function, {gen, do_call, 4}} ->
 5704:             case process_info(Proc, status) of
 5705:                 {status,waiting} -> 
 5706: 		    ?P("[gen] ~p accepting when n = ~w", [Proc, N]),
 5707:                     ok;
 5708:                 _O1 ->
 5709:                     receive 
 5710:                     after 5 ->
 5711:                             wait_until_accepting(Proc, N-1)
 5712:                     end
 5713:             end;
 5714:         _O2 ->
 5715:             receive 
 5716:             after 5 ->
 5717:                     wait_until_accepting(Proc, N-1)
 5718:             end
 5719:     end.
 5720: 
 5721: 
 5722: %% Check that accept returns {error, system_limit}
 5723: %% (and not {error, enfile}) when running out of ports.
 5724: accept_system_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5725:     Cond = fun() ->
 5726: 		   case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 5727: 		       true ->
 5728: 			   {skip, "Not compliant with socket"};
 5729: 		       false ->
 5730: 			   ok
 5731: 		   end
 5732: 	   end,
 5733:     TC   = fun() -> do_accept_system_limit(Config) end,
 5734:     ?TC_TRY(accept_system_limit, Cond, TC).
 5735: 
 5736: do_accept_system_limit(Config) ->
 5737:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5738:     LS = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, []) of
 5739:              {ok, LSocket} ->
 5740:                  LSocket;
 5741:              {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5742:                  ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(Reason))
 5743:         end,             
 5744:     {ok, {Addr, Port}} = inet:sockname(LS),
 5745:     ?P("listen socket \"bound\" to:"
 5746:        "~n      Address: ~p"
 5747:        "~n      Port:    ~p", [Addr, Port]),
 5748:     Me = self(),
 5749:     ?P("create connector"),
 5750:     Connector = spawn_link(fun() ->
 5751:                                    connector(Config, Port, Me)
 5752:                            end),
 5753:     ?P("sync with connector (~p)", [Connector]),
 5754:     receive {Connector, sync} -> Connector ! {self(), continue} end,
 5755:     ?P("begin accepting"),
 5756:     ok = acceptor(Connector, LS, false, []),
 5757:     ?P("stop connector (~p)", [Connector]),
 5758:     Connector ! stop,
 5759:     ?P("done"),
 5760:     ok.
 5761: 
 5762: acceptor(Connector, LS, GotSL, A) ->
 5763:     case gen_tcp:accept(LS, 1000) of
 5764:         {ok, S} ->
 5765:             acceptor(Connector, LS, GotSL, [S|A]);
 5766:         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5767:             ?SKIPE(accept_failed_str(Reason));
 5768:         {error, system_limit} ->
 5769:             ?P("acceptor: "
 5770:                "system limit => *almost* done (~w)", [length(A)]),
 5771:             acceptor(Connector, LS, true, A);
 5772:         {error, timeout} when GotSL ->
 5773:             ?P("acceptor: timeout (with system limit) => done (~w)",
 5774:                [length(A)]),
 5775:             ok;
 5776:         {error, timeout} ->
 5777:             ?P("acceptor: timeout *without* system limit => failure"
 5778:                "~n     Number of Accepted: ~w",
 5779:                [length(A)]),
 5780:             error
 5781:     end.
 5782: 
 5783: connector(Config, AccPort, Tester) ->
 5784:     ?P("[connector] start"),
 5785:     ManyPorts = open_ports([]),
 5786:     ?P("[connector] length(ManyPorts): ~p", [length(ManyPorts)]),
 5787:     Tester ! {self(), sync},
 5788:     ?P("[connector] await continute from tester (~p)", [Tester]),
 5789:     receive {Tester, continue} -> timer:sleep(100) end,
 5790:     ?P("[connector] begin connecting"),
 5791:     ConnF =
 5792:         fun(Port) ->
 5793:                 case (catch ?CONNECT(Config, {127,0,0,1}, AccPort)) of
 5794:                     {ok, Sock} ->
 5795:                         ?P("[connector] success: "
 5796:                            "~n      ~p", [Sock]),
 5797:                         Sock;
 5798:                     {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5799:                         ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(Reason));
 5800:                     _Error ->
 5801:                         ?P("[connector] failure: "
 5802:                            "~n      ~p", [_Error]),
 5803:                         port_close(Port)
 5804:                 end
 5805:         end,
 5806:     R = [ConnF(Port) || Port <- lists:sublist(ManyPorts, 10)],
 5807:     ?P("[connector] await stop"),
 5808:     receive stop -> ?P("[connector] stop (~w)", [length(R)]), R end.
 5809: 
 5810: open_ports(L) ->
 5811:     case catch open_port({spawn_driver, "ram_file_drv"}, []) of
 5812: 	Port when is_port(Port) ->
 5813: 	    open_ports([Port|L]);
 5814: 	{'EXIT', {system_limit, _}} ->
 5815: 	    {L1, L2} = lists:split(5, L),
 5816: 	    [port_close(Port) || Port <- L1],
 5817: 	    L2
 5818:     end.
 5819: 
 5820: 
 5821: %% Check that active once and tcp_close messages behave as expected.
 5822: active_once_closed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5823:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5824:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5825:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5826:                             Addr;
 5827:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5828:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5829:                     end
 5830:            end,
 5831:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_active_once_closed(Config, Addr) end,
 5832:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5833:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5834: 
 5835: do_active_once_closed(Config, Addr) ->
 5836:     Send = fun(Socket, Data) ->
 5837:                    case gen_tcp:send(Socket, Data) of
 5838:                        {error, #{info := econnaborted}} ->
 5839:                            {error, econnaborted};
 5840:                        X ->
 5841:                            X
 5842:                    end
 5843:            end,
 5844:     ?P("stage 1"),
 5845:     (fun() ->
 5846: 	     ?P("[stage1] begin setup"),
 5847: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5848: 	     ?P("[stage1] begin send"),
 5849: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5850:                   fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 5851: 	     ?P("[stage1] try set active:once => expect success"),
 5852: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A, [{active,once}]),
 5853: 	     ?P("[stage1] await socket closed"),
 5854: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 5855: 	     ?P("[stage1] try set active:once => expect failure (einval)"),
 5856: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 5857: 	     ?P("[stage1] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 5858: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 5859: 	     ?P("[stage1] done"),
 5860: 	     ok
 5861:      end)(),
 5862:     ?P("stage 2"),
 5863:     (fun() ->
 5864: 	     ?P("[stage2] begin setup"),
 5865: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5866: 	     ?P("[stage2] begin send"),
 5867: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5868:                   fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 5869: 	     ?P("[stage2] try set active:true => expect success"),
 5870: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 5871: 	     ?P("[stage2] await socket closed"),
 5872: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 5873: 	     ?P("[stage2] try set active:true => expect failure (einval)"),
 5874: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 5875: 	     ?P("[stage2] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 5876: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 5877: 	     ?P("[stage2] done"),
 5878: 	     ok
 5879:      end)(),
 5880:     ?P("stage 3"),
 5881:     (fun() ->
 5882: 	     ?P("[stage3] begin setup"),
 5883: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5884: 	     ?P("[stage3] begin send"),
 5885: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5886:                   fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 5887: 	     ?P("[stage3] try set active:true => expect success"),
 5888: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 5889: 	     ?P("[stage3] await socket closed"),
 5890: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 5891: 	     ?P("[stage3] try set active:once => expect failure (einval)"),
 5892: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 5893: 	     ?P("[stage3] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 5894: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 5895: 	     ?P("[stage3] done"),
 5896: 	     ok
 5897:      end)(),
 5898:     ?P("stage 4"),
 5899:     (fun() ->
 5900: 	     ?P("[stage4] begin setup"),
 5901: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5902: 	     ?P("[stage4] begin send"),
 5903: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5904: 			fun() -> Send(A, "Hello") end),
 5905: 	     ?P("[stage1] try set active:once => expect success"),
 5906: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 5907: 	     ?P("[stage4] await socket closed"),
 5908: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 5909: 	     ?P("[stage4] try set active:true => expect failure (einval)"),
 5910: 	     {error,einval} = inet:setopts(A,[{active,true}]),
 5911: 	     ?P("[stage4] await socket closed - expect timeout"),
 5912: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 5913: 	     ?P("[stage4] done"),
 5914: 	     ok
 5915:      end)(),
 5916:     ?P("stage 5"),
 5917:     (fun() ->
 5918: 	     ?P("[stage5] begin setup"),
 5919: 	     {Loop,A} = setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr),
 5920: 	     ?P("[stage5] begin send"),
 5921: 	     Loop({{error,closed},{error,econnaborted}},
 5922: 			fun() -> Send(A,"Hello") end),
 5923: 	     ?P("[stage5] try set active:false => expect success"),
 5924: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,false}]),
 5925: 	     ?P("[stage5] await socket closed => expect timeout"),
 5926: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> error after 1000 -> ok end,
 5927: 	     ?P("[stage5] try set active:once => expect success"),
 5928: 	     ok = inet:setopts(A,[{active,once}]),
 5929: 	     ?P("[stage5] await socket closed"),
 5930: 	     ok = receive {tcp_closed, A} -> ok after 1000 -> error end,
 5931: 	     ?P("[stage5] done"),
 5932: 	     ok
 5933:      end)(),
 5934:     ?P("done"),
 5935:     ok.

 5937: %% Check that active n and tcp_close messages behave as expected.
 5938: active_n_closed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5939:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 5940:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 5941:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 5942:                             Addr;
 5943:                         {error, Reason} ->
 5944:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 5945:                     end
 5946:            end,
 5947:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_active_n_closed(Config, Addr) end,
 5948:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 5949:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 5950: 
 5951: do_active_n_closed(Config, Addr) ->
 5952:     ?P("create listen socket"),
 5953:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {active, false}]),
 5954: 
 5955:     P = self(),
 5956: 
 5957:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 5958: 
 5959:     ClientF =
 5960:         fun() ->
 5961:                 ?P("[client] started"),
 5962:                 Payload = <<0:50000/unit:8>>,
 5963:                 Cnt = 10000,
 5964:                 ?P("[client] send size"),
 5965:                 P ! {size, Cnt * byte_size(Payload)},
 5966:                 ?P("[client] try connect"),
 5967:                 S = case ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 5968:                                   [binary, {ip, Addr}, {active, false}]) of
 5969:                         {ok, CS} ->
 5970:                             ?P("[client] connected"),
 5971:                             P ! {continue, self()},
 5972:                             CS;
 5973:                         {error, eaddrnotavail = Reason} ->
 5974:                             ?SKIPE(connect_failed_str(Reason))
 5975:                     end,
 5976:                 ?P("[client] send payload"),
 5977:                 _ = [gen_tcp:send(S, Payload) || _ <- lists:seq(1, Cnt)],
 5978:                 ?P("[client] close socket"),
 5979:                 gen_tcp:close(S),
 5980:                 ?P("[client] done"),
 5981:                 exit(ok)
 5982:         end,
 5983:     ?P("create client process"),
 5984:     {Pid, MRef} = spawn_monitor(ClientF),
 5985: 
 5986:     ?P("await size"),
 5987:     receive {size, SendSize} -> SendSize end,
 5988:     ?P("await continue or down"),
 5989:     receive
 5990:         {continue, Pid} ->
 5991:             ?P("got continue"),
 5992:             ok;
 5993:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, {skip, _} = SKIP} ->
 5994:             ?P("got *unexpected* skip"),
 5995:             gen_tcp:close(L),
 5996:             throw(SKIP);
 5997:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, ConnectRes} ->
 5998:             ?P("got *unexpected* crash: "
 5999:               "~n   ~p", [ConnectRes]),
 6000:             exit({unexpected, connect, ConnectRes})
 6001:     end,
 6002:     {ok, S} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 6003:     inet:setopts(S, [{active, 10}]),
 6004:     ?P("start collecting data"),
 6005:     RecvSize = anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef),
 6006: 
 6007:     ?P("close listen socket"),
 6008:     gen_tcp:close(L),
 6009: 
 6010:     ?P("validate size"),
 6011:     if SendSize =:= RecvSize ->
 6012:             ?P("done"),
 6013:             ok;
 6014:        true ->
 6015:             ct:fail("Send and Recv size not equal: ~p ~p", [SendSize, RecvSize])
 6016:     end.
 6017: 
 6018: 
 6019: anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef) ->
 6020:     anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, 0, false, false).
 6021: 
 6022: anc_await_closed_and_down(_S, _Pid, _MRef, Size, true, true) ->
 6023:     Size;
 6024: anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, Down) ->
 6025:     receive
 6026:         {tcp, S, Bin} ->
 6027:             %% ?P("got a chunk (~w) of data", [byte_size(Bin)]),
 6028:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef,
 6029:                                       byte_size(Bin) + Size, Closed, Down);
 6030:         {tcp_closed, S} ->
 6031:             ?P("got closed -> we are done: ~w", [Size]),
 6032:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, true, Down);
 6033:         {tcp_passive, S} ->
 6034:             %% ?P("got passive -> active"),
 6035:             inet:setopts(S, [{active, 10}]),
 6036:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, true);
 6037:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, ok} ->
 6038:             ?P("Received expected down message regarding client"),
 6039:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, true);
 6040: 
 6041:         {'DOWN', MRef, process, Pid, Reason} ->
 6042:             ?P("Received UNEXPECTED down message regarding client:"
 6043:                "~n   Reason:    ~p"
 6044:                "~n   Port Info: ~p",
 6045:                [Reason, (catch erlang:port_info(S))]),
 6046:             ct:fail({unexpected_client_down, Reason}); 
 6047: 
 6048:        Msg ->
 6049:             ?P("ignore: ~p", [Msg]),
 6050:             anc_await_closed_and_down(S, Pid, MRef, Size, Closed, Down)
 6051:     end.
 6052: 
 6053: 
 6054: send_timeout_cfg(Config) ->
 6055:     send_timeout_cfg(Config, default).
 6056: 
 6057: send_timeout_cfg(Config, Case) ->
 6058:     case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 6059:         true when (Case =:= send_timeout_check_length) ->
 6060:             {100, 3000, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>, 1*1024),   5*1024};
 6061:         true ->
 6062:             {100, 3000, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>, 10*1024),  5*1024};
 6063:         false ->
 6064:             {1,   1000, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>, 1*1024),   16*1024}
 6065:     end.

 6067: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6068: send_timeout_basic_wo_autoclose(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6069:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6070:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6071:                    ?P("create node"),
 6072:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6073: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6074:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6075:            end,
 6076:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6077:                    do_send_timeout_basic_wo_autoclose(Config, Addr, Node)
 6078:            end,
 6079:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6080:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6081:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6082:            end,
 6083:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
 6084: 
 6085: do_send_timeout_basic_wo_autoclose(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6086:     ?P("begin"),
 6087:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} = send_timeout_cfg(Config),
 6088:     send_timeout_basic(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6089: 		       false, RNode),
 6090:     ?P("done"),
 6091:     ok.
 6092: 
 6093: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6094: send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6095:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6096:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6097:                    ?P("create node"),
 6098:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6099: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6100:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6101:            end,
 6102:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->

 6105:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6106:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6107:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6108:            end,
 6109:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
 6110: 
 6111: do_send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6112:     ?P("begin"),
 6113:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} =
 6114:         send_timeout_cfg(Config, send_timeout_basic_w_autoclose),
 6115:     send_timeout_basic(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6116: 		       true, RNode),
 6117:     ?P("done"),
 6118:     ok.
 6119: 
 6120: send_timeout_basic(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6121: 		   AutoClose, RNode) ->
 6122:     ?P("[basic] sink"),
 6123:     {A, Pid}              = setup_timeout_sink(Config, RNode,
 6124:                                                Addr, SndTimeout,
 6125:                                                AutoClose, SndBuf),
 6126:     Send                  = fun() -> gen_tcp:send(A, BinData) end,
 6127:     {{error, timeout}, _} = timeout_sink_loop(Send, TslTimeout),
 6128: 
 6129:     %% Check that the socket is not busy/closed...
 6130:     ?P("[basic] verify socket not busy/closed"),
 6131:     case gen_tcp:send(A, BinData) of
 6132: 	{error, Reason} ->
 6133: 	    ?P("[basic] (expected) send failure"),
 6134: 	    after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Reason),
 6135: 	    (catch gen_tcp:close(A)),
 6136: 	    exit(Pid, kill),
 6137: 	    ok;
 6138: 	ok ->
 6139:             %% Note that there is no active reader on the other end,
 6140:             %% so a 'channel' has been filled, should remain filled.
 6141: 	    ?P("[basic] UNEXPECTED send success"),
 6142: 	    (catch gen_tcp:close(A)),
 6143: 	    exit(Pid, kill),
 6144: 	    ct:fail("Unexpected send success")
 6145:     end.
 6146:

 6148: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6149: send_timeout_check_length(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6150:     Cond = fun() ->
 6151:                    Key = kernel_factor,
 6152:                    case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
 6153:                        {value, {Key, Factor}} when (Factor > 6) ->
 6154:                            {skip, ?F("Too slow (factor = ~w)", [Factor])};
 6155:                        _ ->
 6156:                            ok
 6157:                    end
 6158:            end,
 6159:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6160:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6161:                    ?P("create node"),
 6162:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6163: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6164:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6165:            end,
 6166:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6167:                    do_send_timeout_check_length(Config, Addr, Node)
 6168:            end,
 6169:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6170:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6171:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6172:            end,
 6173:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 6174: 
 6175: do_send_timeout_check_length(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6176:     ?P("begin"),
 6177:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} =
 6178:         send_timeout_cfg(Config, send_timeout_check_length),
 6179: 
 6180:     %% Check timeout length.
 6181:     ?P("spawn sink process (check timeout length)"),
 6182:     Self = self(),
 6183:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(
 6184:                    fun() ->
 6185:                            {A, _} = setup_timeout_sink(Config, RNode,
 6186: 						       Addr, SndTimeout,
 6187:                                                        true, SndBuf),
 6188:                            Send = fun() ->
 6189:                                           %% <TMP>
 6190:                                           %% snmp:enable_trace(),
 6191:                                           %% snmp:set_trace([{gen_tcp_socket,
 6192:                                           %%                  [{scope, send}]},
 6193:                                           %%                 {socket, [{scope,getopt}]},
 6194:                                           %%                 {socket, [{scope,send}]}],
 6195:                                           %%                [{timestamp, true},
 6196:                                           %%                 {return_trace, true}]),
 6197:                                           %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, true}]),
 6198:                                           Res = gen_tcp:send(A, BinData),
 6199:                                           %% inet:setopts(A, [{debug, false}]),
 6200:                                           %% snmp:disable_trace(),
 6201:                                           %% </TMP>
 6202:                                           Self ! Res,
 6203:                                           Res
 6204:                                   end,
 6205:                            {{error, timeout}, _} =
 6206: 			       timeout_sink_loop(Send, TslTimeout)
 6207:                    end),
 6208:     Diff = get_max_diff(Pid),
 6209:     ?P("Max time for send: ~p", [Diff]),
 6210:     true = (Diff > (SndTimeout - 500)) and (Diff < (SndTimeout + 500)),
 6211: 
 6212:     %% Wait for the process to die.
 6213:     ?P("await (timeout checker) process death"),
 6214:     receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, _} -> ok end,
 6215: 
 6216:     ?P("done"),
 6217:     ok.
