 6258: %% Test the send_timeout socket option.
 6259: %% send_timeout/send_timeout_close behaves differently on 
 6260: %% inet_backend 'socket' (compared to inet), so we skip
 6261: %% this test case (until we can re-write).
 6262: send_timeout_para_w_autoclose(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6263:     Cond = fun() ->
 6264:                    case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 6265:                        true ->
 6266:                            {skip, "Unstable with 'socket' backend"};
 6267:                        false ->
 6268:                            Key = kernel_factor,
 6269:                            case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
 6270:                                {value, {Key, Factor}} when (Factor > 6) ->
 6271:                                    {skip,
 6272:                                     ?F("Too slow (factor = ~w)", [Factor])};
 6273:                                _ ->
 6274:                                    ok
 6275:                            end
 6276:                    end
 6277:            end,
 6278:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6279:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6280:                    ?P("create node"),
 6281:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6282: 		   {ok, Addr}  = ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet),
 6283:                    #{addr => Addr, rnode => RNode}
 6284:            end,
 6285:     Case = fun(#{addr := Addr, rnode := Node}) ->
 6286:                    do_send_timeout_para_w_autoclose(Config, Addr, Node)
 6287:            end,
 6288:     Post = fun(#{rnode := Node}) ->
 6289:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6290:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6291:            end,
 6292:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 6293: 
 6294: do_send_timeout_para_w_autoclose(Config, Addr, RNode) ->
 6295:     ?P("begin"),
 6296:     {TslTimeout, SndTimeout, BinData, SndBuf} =
 6297:         send_timeout_cfg(Config, send_timeout_para_w_autoclose),
 6298: 
 6299:     %% Check that parallel writers do not hang forever
 6300:     ?P("check parallel writers wo autoclose"),
 6301:     send_timeout_para(Config, Addr, BinData, SndBuf, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6302: 		      true, RNode),
 6303: 
 6304:     ?P("done"),
 6305:     ok.
 6306: 
 6307: send_timeout_para(Config, Addr, BinData, BufSz, TslTimeout, SndTimeout,
 6308: 		  AutoClose, RNode) ->
 6309:     ?P("[para] sink -> entry with"
 6310:        "~n      size(BinData): ~p"
 6311:        "~n      BufSz:         ~p"
 6312:        "~n      SndTimeout:    ~p"
 6313:        "~n      AutoClose:     ~p",
 6314:        [byte_size(BinData), BufSz, SndTimeout, AutoClose]),
 6315:     {A, Pid} = setup_timeout_sink(Config, RNode,
 6316:                                   Addr, SndTimeout, AutoClose, BufSz),
 6317:     Self = self(),
 6318:     SenderFun = fun() ->
 6319:                         ?P("[para:sender] starting"),
 6320: 			Send = fun() -> gen_tcp:send(A, BinData) end,
 6321: 			Self ! {self(), timeout_sink_loop(Send, TslTimeout)}
 6322: 		end,
 6323:     ?P("[para] spawn sender process 1"),
 6324:     Snd1 = spawn_link(SenderFun),
 6325:     ?P("[para] spawn sender process 2"),
 6326:     Snd2 = spawn_link(SenderFun),
 6327: 
 6328:     SockInfo    = fun() -> (catch inet:info(A)) end,
 6329:     SockTimeout = fun() ->
 6330:                           try inet:getopts(A, [send_timeout]) of
 6331:                               {ok, [V2]} ->
 6332:                                   V2;
 6333:                               {error, R2} ->
 6334:                                   ?F("ERROR: ~p", [R2]);
 6335:                               X2 ->
 6336:                                   ?F("UNKNOWN: ~p", [X2])
 6337:                           catch
 6338:                               C2:E2:S2 ->
 6339:                                   ?F("CAUGHT: ~p, ~p, ~p", [C2, E2, S2])
 6340:                           end
 6341:                   end,
 6342: 
 6343:     ?P("[para] await first sender timeout when"
 6344:        "~n   Sender 1: ~p"
 6345:        "~n   Sender 2: ~p", [Snd1, Snd2]),
 6346:     First =
 6347:         receive
 6348:             {Snd1, {{error, timeout}, N}} ->
 6349:                 ?P("[para] timeout received from sender 1 (~p, ~p)", [Snd1, N]),
 6350:                 1;
 6351:             {Snd2, {{error, timeout}, N}} ->
 6352:                 ?P("[para] timeout received from sender 2 (~p, ~p)", [Snd2, N]),
 6353:                 2;
 6354: 
 6355:             {'EXIT', _Pid, {timetrap_timeout, _Timeout, _Stack}} ->
 6356:                 %% The test case (timetrap) has timed out, which either means
 6357:                 %% we are running on very slow hw or some system functions
 6358:                 %% are slowing us down (this test case should never normally
 6359:                 %% time out like this).
 6360:                 ?P("Test case timetrap timeout - check for system events"),
 6361:                 case kernel_test_global_sys_monitor:events(?SECS(5)) of
 6362:                     SysEvs when (SysEvs =/= []) ->
 6363:                         ?P("timetrap timeout with system events: "
 6364:                            "~n   System Events: ~p"
 6365:                            "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6366:                            "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6367:                            "~n   Socket Info:   ~p",
 6368:                            [SysEvs,
 6369:                             process_info(Snd1), process_info(Snd2),
 6370:                             SockInfo()]),
 6371:                         ?SKIPT(?F("TC system ~w events", [length(SysEvs)]));
 6372:                     {error, Reason} ->
 6373:                         ?P("TC timetrap timeout but failed get system events: "
 6374:                            "~n   Reason:        ~p"
 6375:                            "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6376:                            "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6377:                            "~n   Socket Info:   ~p",
 6378:                            [Reason,
 6379:                             process_info(Snd1), process_info(Snd2),
 6380:                             SockInfo()]),
 6381:                         exit({timetrap, {failed_get_sys_evs, Reason}});
 6382:                     [] ->
 6383:                         ?P("TC timetrap *without* system events: "
 6384:                            "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6385:                            "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6386:                            "~n   Socket Info:   ~p",
 6387:                            [process_info(Snd1), process_info(Snd2),
 6388:                             SockInfo()]),
 6389:                         exit(timetrap)
 6390:                 end
 6391: 
 6392:         after 20000 ->
 6393:                 SockInfo1 = SockInfo(),
 6394:                 SockTo1   = SockTimeout(),
 6395:                 ?P("[para] UNEXPECTED timeout(1,~w) when:"
 6396:                    "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6397:                    "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6398:                    "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 6399:                    "~n   Send Timeout:  ~p"
 6400:                    "~n   Message Queue: ~p",
 6401:                    [AutoClose,
 6402:                     (catch process_info(Snd1)),
 6403:                     (catch process_info(Snd2)),
 6404:                     SockInfo1, SockTo1,
 6405:                     flush([])]),
 6406:                 Snd1 ! {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout},
 6407:                 Snd2 ! {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout},
 6408:                 ct:sleep(?SECS(1)),
 6409:                 exit({timeout, AutoClose})
 6410:         end,
 6411: 
 6412:     Second = if (First =:= 1) -> 2; true -> 1 end,
 6413:     ?P("[para] await second sender ~w error", [Second]),
 6414:     receive
 6415: 	{Snd1, {{error, Error_1}, N_1}} ->
 6416:             ?P("[para] error (~p) received from sender 1 (~p, ~p)",
 6417:                [Error_1, Snd1, N_1]),
 6418:             after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Error_1);
 6419: 	{Snd2, {{error, Error_1}, N_1}} ->
 6420:             ?P("[para] error (~p) received from sender 2 (~p, ~p)",
 6421:                [Error_1, Snd2, N_1]),
 6422:             after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Error_1)
 6423:     after 10000 ->
 6424:             if (Second =:= 1) ->
 6425:                     SockInfo21 = SockInfo(),
 6426:                     SockTo21   = SockTimeout(),
 6427:                     ?P("[para] UNEXPECTED timeout(2, ~w):"
 6428:                        "~n   Sender 1 Info: ~p"
 6429:                        "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 6430:                        "~n   Send Timeout:  ~p"
 6431:                        "~n   Message Queue: ~p",
 6432:                        [AutoClose,
 6433:                         (catch process_info(Snd1)),
 6434:                         SockInfo21, SockTo21,
 6435:                         flush([])]),
 6436:                 Snd1 ! {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout};
 6437:                true ->
 6438:                     SockInfo22 = SockInfo(),
 6439:                     SockTo22   = SockTimeout(),
 6440:                     ?P("[para] UNEXPECTED timeout(2, ~w):"
 6441:                        "~n   Sender 2 Info: ~p"
 6442:                        "~n   Socket Info:   ~p"
 6443:                        "~n   Send Timeout:  ~p"
 6444:                        "~n   Message Queue: ~p",
 6445:                        [AutoClose,
 6446:                         (catch process_info(Snd2)),
 6447:                         SockInfo22, SockTo22,
 6448:                         flush([])]),
 6449:                     Snd2 ! {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout}
 6450:             end,
 6451:             ct:sleep(?SECS(1)),
 6452: 	    exit({timeout, AutoClose, Second})
 6453:     end,
 6454: 
 6455:     ?P("[para] socket info: "
 6456:        "~n   ~p", [SockInfo()]),
 6457:     {error, Error_2} = gen_tcp:send(A, BinData),
 6458:     after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Error_2),
 6459:     ?P("[para] cleanup - await sender terminations"),
 6460:     st_await_sender_termination(Snd1, Snd2),
 6461:     ?P("[para] cleanup - close socket"),
 6462:     send_timeout_close(A),
 6463:     ?P("[para] cleanup - kill sink"),
 6464:     exit(Pid, kill),
 6465:     ?P("[para] done"),
 6466:     ok.
 6467: 
 6468: %% Spawn a closer process, transfer "ownership" of the socket
 6469: %% to it and then send it the socket (to close) at its leisure.
 6470: send_timeout_close(Sock) ->
 6471:     F = fun() ->
 6472:                 receive
 6473:                     {close, S} ->
 6474:                         (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 6475:                         exit(normal)
 6476:                 end
 6477:         end,
 6478:     Pid = spawn_link(F),
 6479:     case gen_tcp:controlling_process(Sock, Pid) of
 6480:         ok ->
 6481:             Pid ! {close, Sock},
 6482:             ok;
 6483:         {error, Reason} ->
 6484:             ?P("failed transfering ownership to closer process: "
 6485:                "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
 6486:             exit(Pid, kill),
 6487:             (catch gen_tcp:close(Sock))
 6488:     end.
 6489:     
 6490: st_await_sender_termination(undefined, undefined) ->
 6491:     ok;
 6492: st_await_sender_termination(Sender1, Sender2) ->
 6493:     receive
 6494:         {'EXIT', Pid, Reason} when (Pid =:= Sender1) ->
 6495:             ?P("sender 1 (~p) terminated: "
 6496:                "~n   ~p", [Pid, Reason]),
 6497:             st_await_sender_termination(undefined, Sender2);
 6498:         {'EXIT', Pid, Reason} when (Pid =:= Sender2) ->
 6499:             ?P("sender 2 (~p) terminated: "
 6500:                "~n   ~p", [Pid, Reason]),
 6501:             st_await_sender_termination(Sender1, undefined)
 6502:     end.
 6503:             
 6504: get_max_diff(Pid) when is_pid(Pid) ->
 6505:     receive
 6506: 	ok ->
 6507: 	    get_max_diff2(0)
 6508:     after 10000 ->
 6509:             ?P("timeout awaiting first send result (ok) from sender ~p:"
 6510:                "~n   Sender process info: ~p",
 6511:                [Pid, pi(Pid)]),
 6512: 	    exit(timeout)
 6513:     end.
 6514: 
 6515: get_max_diff2(Max) ->
 6516:     T1 = millis(),
 6517:     receive
 6518: 	ok ->
 6519: 	    Diff = millis() - T1,
 6520: 	    if
 6521: 		Diff > Max ->
 6522: 		    ?P("new max send time: ~w", [Diff]),
 6523: 		    get_max_diff2(Diff);
 6524: 		true ->
 6525: 		    get_max_diff2(Max)
 6526: 	    end;
 6527: 	{error, timeout} ->
 6528: 	    Diff = millis() - T1,
 6529: 	    if
 6530: 		Diff > Max ->
 6531: 		    ?P("timeout diff (> prev max send to): ~w", [Diff]),
 6532: 		    Diff;
 6533: 		true ->
 6534: 		    Max
 6535: 	    end
 6536:     after 10000 ->
 6537:               exit(timeout)
 6538:     end.
 6539: 	    
 6540: after_send_timeout(AutoClose, Reason) ->
 6541:     case Reason of
 6542:         timeout              when AutoClose =:= false -> ok;
 6543:         {timeout, _RestData} when AutoClose =:= false -> ok;
 6544:         enotconn             when AutoClose =:= true  -> ok;
 6545: 	closed               when AutoClose           -> ok;
 6546:         _ ->
 6547:             ?P("after_send_timeout -> "
 6548:                "~n      AutoClose: ~w"
 6549:                "~n      Reason:    ~p", [AutoClose, Reason]),
 6550:             exit({after_send_timeout, AutoClose, Reason})
 6551:     end.
 6552: 
 6553: 
 6554: %% Test the send_timeout socket option for active sockets.
 6555: send_timeout_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6556:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 6557:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 6558:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 6559:                             Addr;
 6560:                         {error, Reason} ->
 6561:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 6562:                     end
 6563:            end,
 6564:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr) end,
 6565:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 6566:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 6567: 
 6568: do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr) ->
 6569:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6570:     {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6571:     do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr, false, RNode),
 6572:     do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr, true, RNode),
 6573:     ?STOP_NODE(RNode),
 6574:     ok.
 6575: 
 6576: do_send_timeout_active(Config, Addr, AutoClose, RNode) ->
 6577:     {A,C} = setup_active_timeout_sink(Config, RNode, Addr, 1, AutoClose),
 6578:     inet:setopts(A, [{active, once}]),
 6579:     Mad = spawn_link(RNode, fun() -> mad_sender(C) end),
 6580:     ListData = lists:duplicate(1000, $a),
 6581:     F = fun() ->
 6582:                 ?P("[sink action] await data"),
 6583: 		receive
 6584: 		    {tcp, _Sock, _Data} ->
 6585:                         ?P("[sink action] active -> once"),
 6586: 			inet:setopts(A, [{active, once}]),
 6587:                         ?P("[sink action] send payload"),
 6588: 			Res = gen_tcp:send(A, ListData),
 6589: 			Res;
 6590: 		    Unexpected ->
 6591: 			?P("[sink action] unexpected message: "
 6592:                            "~n      ~p", [Unexpected]),
 6593: 			Unexpected
 6594: 		end
 6595: 	end,
 6596:     {{error, timeout}, _} = timeout_sink_loop(F, 1),
 6597:     unlink(Mad),
 6598:     exit(Mad, kill),
 6599:     flush(),
 6600:     ok.
 6601: 
 6602: mad_sender(S) ->
 6603:     put(action,  nothing),
 6604:     put(sent,    0),
 6605:     put(elapsed, 0),
 6606:     mad_sender(S, 0).
 6607: 
 6608: mad_sender(S, N) ->
 6609:     U = rand:uniform(1000000),
 6610:     put(action, send),
 6611:     Start   = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 6612:     Ret     = gen_tcp:send(S, integer_to_list(U)),
 6613:     Stop    = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 6614:     Elapsed = get(elapsed),
 6615:     put(elapsed, Elapsed + (Stop - Start)),
 6616:     put(action, sent),
 6617:     N2 = N + 1,
 6618:     put(sent,   N2),
 6619:     case Ret of
 6620:         ok ->
 6621:             mad_sender(S, N + 1);
 6622:         {error, timeout} = ERROR1 ->
 6623:             ?P("mad_sender -> send failed: timeout"
 6624:                "~n   Number of sends:     ~w"
 6625:                "~n   Elapsed (send) time: ~w msec",
 6626:                [N2,
 6627:                 erlang:convert_time_unit(get(elapsed), native, millisecond)]),
 6628:             ERROR1;
 6629:         {error, {timeout, RestData}} = ERROR2 ->
 6630:             ?P("mad_sender -> "
 6631:                "send failed: timeout with ~w bytes of rest data"
 6632:                "~n   Number of sends:     ~w"
 6633:                "~n   Elapsed (send) time: ~w msec",
 6634:                [byte_size(RestData),
 6635:                 N2,
 6636:                 erlang:convert_time_unit(get(elapsed), native, millisecond)]),
 6637:             ERROR2;
 6638:         {error, Reason} = ERROR3 ->
 6639:             ?P("mad_sender -> send failed: "
 6640:                "~n   ~p"
 6641:                "~n   Number of sends:     ~w"
 6642:                "~n   Elapsed (send) time: ~w msec",
 6643:                [Reason,
 6644:                 N2,
 6645:                 erlang:convert_time_unit(get(elapsed), native, millisecond)]),
 6646:             ERROR3;
 6647:         ERROR4 ->
 6648:             ?P("mad_sender -> send failed: "
 6649:                "~n   ~p"
 6650:                "~n   Number of sends:     ~w"
 6651:                "~n   Elapsed (send) time: ~w msec",
 6652:                [ERROR4,
 6653:                 N2,
 6654:                 erlang:convert_time_unit(get(elapsed), native, millisecond)]),
 6655:             ERROR4
 6656:     end.
 6657: 
 6658: flush() ->
 6659:     receive
 6660: 	_X ->
 6661: 	    flush()
 6662:     after 0 ->
 6663: 	    ok
 6664:     end.
 6665: 
 6666: setup_closed_ao(Config, Addr) ->
 6667:     Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6668:     ?P("[setup] start node"),
 6669:     R = case ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir) of
 6670:             {ok, Node} ->
 6671:                 Node;
 6672:             {error, Reason} ->
 6673:                 ?SKIPT(?F("failed starting node: ~p", [Reason]))
 6674:         end,
 6675:     ?P("[setup] get (\"proper\")local address"),
 6676:     {ok, Addr} = ?LIB:which_local_addr(inet),
 6677: %%%     Host = get_hostname(node()),
 6678:     ?P("[setup] create listen socket (with ~p)", [Addr]),
 6679:     L = case ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false},{packet,2}]) of
 6680:             {ok, LSock} ->
 6681:                 LSock;
 6682:             {error, eaddrnotavail = LReason} ->
 6683:                 (catch ?STOP_NODE(R)),
 6684:                 ?SKIPT(listen_failed_str(LReason))
 6685:         end,
 6686:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 6687:     ?P("[setup] listen socket port: "
 6688:        "~n   Port: ~p", [Port]),
 6689:     Fun = fun(F) ->
 6690:                   receive
 6691:                       {From,X} when is_function(X) ->
 6692:                           From ! {self(),X()}, F(F);
 6693:                       die -> ok
 6694:                   end
 6695:           end,
 6696:     ?P("[setup] create remote runner"),
 6697:     Pid = rpc:call(R,erlang,spawn,[fun() -> Fun(Fun) end]),
 6698:     Remote = fun(Fu) ->
 6699:                      Pid ! {self(), Fu},
 6700:                      receive {Pid,X} -> X end
 6701:              end,
 6702:     Connect = fun() -> 
 6703:                       ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 6704:                                [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}, {packet, 2}]) 
 6705:               end,
 6706:     ?P("[setup] create (remote) connection"),
 6707:     C = case Remote(Connect) of
 6708:             {ok, CSock} ->
 6709:                 CSock;
 6710:             {error, eaddrnotavail = CReason} ->
 6711:                 (catch ?STOP_NODE(R)),
 6712:                 ?SKIPT(connect_failed_str(CReason))
 6713:         end,
 6714:     ?P("[setup] accept (local) connection"),
 6715:     A = case gen_tcp:accept(L) of
 6716:             {ok, ASock} ->
 6717:                 ASock;
 6718:             {error, eaddrnotavail = AReason} ->
 6719:                 (catch ?STOP_NODE(R)),
 6720:                 ?SKIPT(accept_failed_str(AReason))
 6721:         end,
 6722:     ?P("[setup] send (local) and receive (remote) message"),
 6723:     gen_tcp:send(A,"Hello"),
 6724:     {ok, "Hello"} = Remote(fun() -> gen_tcp:recv(C,0) end),
 6725:     ?P("[setup] close (remote) connection"),
 6726:     ok =  Remote(fun() -> gen_tcp:close(C) end),
 6727:     Loop2 = fun(_,_,_,0) ->
 6728: 		    {failure, timeout}; 
 6729: 	       (L2,{MA,MB},F2,N) ->
 6730: 		    case F2() of
 6731: 			MA -> ?P("[setup] action result (MA): ~p", [MA] ), MA;
 6732: 			MB -> ?P("[setup] action result (MB): ~p", [MB] ), MB;
 6733: 			Other -> ?P("[setup] Loop2: ~p",[Other]),
 6734: 				 receive after 1000 -> ok end,
 6735: 				 L2(L2,{MA,MB},F2,N-1)
 6736: 		    end
 6737: 	    end,
 6738:     Loop = fun(Match2,F3) ->  Loop2(Loop2,Match2,F3,10) end,
 6739:     ?P("[setup] stop node"),
 6740:     ?STOP_NODE(R),
 6741:     ?P("[setup] done"),
 6742:     {Loop,A}.
 6743:     
 6744: setup_timeout_sink(Config, RNode, Addr, Timeout, AutoClose, BufSz) ->
 6745:     ?P("[sink setup] create listen socket"),
 6746:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ifaddr,             Addr},
 6747:                                   {active,             false},
 6748: 				  {packet,             4},
 6749: 				  {sndbuf,             BufSz},
 6750: 				  {send_timeout,       Timeout},
 6751: 				  {send_timeout_close, AutoClose}]),
 6752: 
 6753:     ?P("listen socket created with: "
 6754:        "~n   Send Timeout Opts: ~p",
 6755:        [oki(inet:getopts(L, [send_timeout, send_timeout_close]))]),
 6756:     Fun = fun(N, F) ->
 6757: 		  receive
 6758: 		      {From,X} when is_function(X) ->
 6759: 			  From ! {self(),X()}, F(N+1,F);
 6760:                       {From, iterations} ->
 6761:                           From ! {self(), N}, F(N, F);
 6762: 		      die ->
 6763:                           ok
 6764: 		  end
 6765: 	  end,
 6766:     ?P("[sink setup] start remote runner process (on ~p)", [RNode]),
 6767:     Pid =  rpc:call(RNode, erlang, spawn, [fun() -> Fun(0,Fun) end]),
 6768:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 6769:     Remote = fun(Fu) ->
 6770: 		     Pid ! {self(), Fu},
 6771: 		     receive
 6772:                          {Pid,X} -> X
 6773: 		     end
 6774: 	     end,
 6775:     ?P("[sink setup] connect from remote node (~p)", [RNode]),
 6776:     {ok, C} = Remote(fun() ->
 6777: 			     ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 6778: 				      [{ifaddr, Addr},
 6779:                                        {active, false},
 6780: 				       {packet, 4},
 6781: 				       {recbuf, BufSz div 2},
 6782: 				       {sndbuf, BufSz div 2}])
 6783: 		     end),
 6784:     ?P("[sink setup] accept"),
 6785:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 6786:     ?P("[sink setup] accepted with options: "
 6787:        "~n   Send Timeout Opts: ~p"
 6788:        "~n   => send 'test' message",
 6789:        [oki(inet:getopts(A, [send_timeout, send_timeout_close]))]),
 6790:     gen_tcp:send(A, "Hello"),
 6791:     ?P("[sink setup] 'test' message sent - "
 6792:        "recv 'test' message on remote node (~p)", [RNode]),
 6793:     {ok, "Hello"} = Remote(fun() -> gen_tcp:recv(C,0) end),
 6794:     ?P("[sink setup] cleanup - close listen socket"),
 6795:     (catch gen_tcp:close(L)),
 6796: 
 6797:     ?P("[sink setup] done when: "
 6798:        "~n   Accepted socket: ~p"
 6799:        "~n      Buffer Info: ~p"
 6800:        "~n      SockName:    ~p"
 6801:        "~n      PeerName:    ~p"
 6802:        "~n   Connected socket: ~p"
 6803:        "~n      Buffer Info: ~p"
 6804:        "~n      SockName:    ~p"
 6805:        "~n      PeerName:    ~p",
 6806:        [A,
 6807:         oki(inet:getopts(A, [buffer, recbuf, sndbuf])),
 6808:         oki(inet:sockname(A)),
 6809:         oki(inet:peername(A)),
 6810:         C,
 6811:         oki(Remote(fun() -> inet:getopts(C, [buffer, recbuf, sndbuf]) end)),
 6812:         oki(Remote(fun() -> inet:sockname(C) end)),
 6813:         oki(Remote(fun() -> inet:peername(C) end))]),
 6814: 
 6815:     ?P("[sink setup] done"),
 6816: 
 6817:     {A, Pid}.
 6818: 
 6819: oki({ok, V}) -> V;
 6820: oki(E)       -> E.
 6821: 
 6822: setup_active_timeout_sink(Config, RNode, Addr, Timeout, AutoClose) ->
 6823:     ListenOpts =  [binary,
 6824:                    {ifaddr,             Addr},
 6825: 		   {active,             false},
 6826: 		   {packet,             0},
 6827: 		   {nodelay,            true},
 6828: 		   {keepalive,          true},
 6829: 		   {send_timeout,       Timeout},
 6830: 		   {send_timeout_close, AutoClose}],
 6831:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, ListenOpts),
 6832:     Fun = fun(F) ->
 6833: 		  receive
 6834: 		      {From,X} when is_function(X) ->
 6835: 			  From ! {self(),X()},
 6836: 			  F(F);
 6837: 		      die -> ok
 6838: 		  end
 6839: 	  end,
 6840:     Pid = rpc:call(RNode, erlang, spawn, [fun() -> Fun(Fun) end]),
 6841:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(L),
 6842:     Remote = fun(Fu) ->
 6843: 		     Pid ! {self(), Fu},
 6844: 		     receive {Pid,X} -> X
 6845: 		     end
 6846: 	     end,
 6847:     {ok, C} = Remote(fun() ->
 6848: 			     ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port, [{ip,     Addr},
 6849: 			                                   {active, false}])
 6850: 		     end),
 6851:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L),
 6852:     gen_tcp:send(A, "Hello"),
 6853:     {ok, "H"++_} = Remote(fun() -> gen_tcp:recv(C, 0) end),
 6854:     {A, C}.
 6855: 
 6856: %% timeout_sink_loop(Action) ->
 6857: %%     timeout_sink_loop(Action, 1).
 6858: 
 6859: timeout_sink_loop(Action, To) ->
 6860:     put(action,   nothing),
 6861:     put(sent,     0),
 6862:     put(elapsed,  0),
 6863:     put(send_max, 0),
 6864:     put(lsendts,  "-"), % Last Send TS (time stamp)
 6865:     timeout_sink_loop(Action, To, 0).
 6866: 
 6867: timeout_sink_loop(Action, To, N) ->
 6868:     put(action, send),
 6869:     Start   = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 6870:     Ret     = Action(),
 6871:     Stop    = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 6872:     LSendTS = ?FTS(),
 6873:     SendT   = Stop - Start,
 6874:     Elapsed = get(elapsed),
 6875:     put(elapsed, Elapsed + SendT),
 6876:     SendMax = get(send_max),
 6877:     if (SendT > SendMax) -> put(send_max, SendT);
 6878:        true              -> ok
 6879:     end,
 6880:     put(action, sent),
 6881:     put(lsendts, LSendTS),
 6882:     N2 = N + 1,
 6883:     put(sent,   N2),
 6884:     case Ret of
 6885: 	ok ->
 6886: 	    receive
 6887:                 {info_and_die, SockInfo, SockTimeout} ->
 6888:                     ?P("[sink-loop] info and die: "
 6889:                        "~n   Socket Info:  ~p"
 6890:                        "~n   Send Timeout: ~p",
 6891:                        [SockInfo(), SockTimeout()]),
 6892:                     exit(normal)
 6893:             after To -> ok end,
 6894: 	    timeout_sink_loop(Action, To, N+1);
 6895: 	{error, {timeout, RestData}} ->
 6896:             ?P("[sink-loop] action result: "
 6897:                "~n   Number of actions: ~p"
 6898:                "~n   Elapsed time:      ~p msec"
 6899:                "~n   Result:            timeout with ~w bytes of rest data",
 6900:                [N2,
 6901:                 erlang:convert_time_unit(get(elapsed), native, millisecond),
 6902:                 byte_size(RestData)]),
 6903: 	    {{error, timeout}, N2};
 6904: 	Other ->
 6905:             ?P("[sink-loop] action result: "
 6906:                "~n   Number of actions: ~p"
 6907:                "~n   Elapsed time:      ~p msec"
 6908:                "~n   Result:            ~p",
 6909:                [N2,
 6910:                 erlang:convert_time_unit(get(elapsed), native, millisecond),
 6911:                 Other]),
 6912: 	    {Other, N2}
 6913:     end.
 6914: 
 6915: 
 6916: %% =========================================================================
 6917: 
 6918: send_timeout_resume(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6919:     ct:timetrap(?SECS(16)),
 6920:     Cond = fun() ->
 6921:                    case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 6922:                        true ->
 6923:                            {skip, "Unstable with 'socket' backend"};
 6924:                        false ->
 6925:                            Key = kernel_factor,
 6926:                            case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
 6927:                                {value, {Key, Factor}} when (Factor > 6) ->
 6928:                                    {skip,
 6929:                                     ?F("Too slow (factor = ~w)", [Factor])};
 6930:                                _ ->
 6931:                                    ok
 6932:                            end
 6933:                    end
 6934:            end,
 6935:     Pre  = fun() ->
 6936:                    Dir = filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)),
 6937:                    ?P("create node"),
 6938:                    {ok, RNode} = ?START_NODE(?UNIQ_NODE_NAME, "-pa " ++ Dir),
 6939:                    RNode
 6940:            end,
 6941:     Case = fun(Node) -> do_send_timeout_resume(Config, Node, 13) end,
 6942:     Post = fun(Node) ->
 6943:                    ?P("stop node ~p", [Node]),
 6944:                    ?STOP_NODE(Node)
 6945:            end,
 6946:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
 6947: 
 6948: do_send_timeout_resume(Config, RNode, BlockPow) ->
 6949:     BlockSize = 1 bsl BlockPow,
 6950:     1         = rand:uniform(1),
 6951:     Seed      = rand:export_seed(),
 6952:     ListenOpts =
 6953:         [inet,
 6954:          binary,
 6955:          {backlog, 2},
 6956:          {active,  false}],
 6957:     ConnectOpts =
 6958:         [inet,
 6959:          {send_timeout, 0},
 6960:          {active,       false},
 6961:          binary],
 6962:     StreamOpts =
 6963:         [{high_watermark, BlockSize},
 6964:          {low_watermark,  BlockSize bsr 1},
 6965:          {sndbuf,         BlockSize},
 6966:          {recbuf,         BlockSize},
 6967:          {buffer,         BlockSize bsl 1}],
 6968:     Client = self(),
 6969:     Tag = make_ref(),
 6970:     {Server, Mref} =
 6971:         spawn_opt(
 6972:           RNode,
 6973:           fun () ->
 6974:                   send_timeout_resume_srv(
 6975:                     Config, Seed, Client, Tag, ListenOpts, StreamOpts)
 6976:           end, [monitor, link]),
 6977:     ?P("Client=~p Server=~p Tag=~p~n", [Client, Server, Tag]),
 6978:     receive
 6979:         {Tag, port, Port} ->
 6980:             ok;
 6981:         {'DOWN', Mref, _, _, Port} ->
 6982:             %% Use variable Port just to get export from case
 6983:             ct:fail(Port)
 6984:     end,
 6985:     ?P("connecting to ~p~n", [Port]),
 6986:     {ok, C} = ?CONNECT(Config, localhost, Port, ConnectOpts, 2000),
 6987:     try
 6988:         ok = inet:setopts(C, StreamOpts),
 6989:         ?P("client StreamOpts: ~p~n",
 6990:            [inet:getopts(C, optnames(StreamOpts))]),
 6991:         receive
 6992:             {Tag, send} ->
 6993:                 ok;
 6994:             {'DOWN', Mref, _, _, Error2} ->
 6995:                 ct:fail(Error2)
 6996:         end,
 6997:         RetryTimeout = str_which_retry_timeout(),
 6998:         ?P("send"),
 6999:         {N, Timeouts} =
 7000:             do_send_timeout_resume_send(C, Server, Tag,
 7001:                                         RetryTimeout, BlockSize),
 7002:         ?P("await server (~p) reply (DOWN)", [Server]),
 7003:         receive
 7004:             {'DOWN', Mref, _, _, Result} ->
 7005:                 ?P("received DOWN message from server:"
 7006:                    "~n   N:        ~p"
 7007:                    "~n   Timeouts: ~p"
 7008:                    "~n   Result:   ~p", [N, Timeouts, Result]),
 7009:                 case Result of
 7010:                     {Tag, ok, Count}
 7011:                       when Count =:= N * BlockSize,
 7012:                            %% We should get 10 time-outs.
 7013:                            %% If we do not get more than one, it seems
 7014:                            %% we get stuck when trying to poll the
 7015:                            %% send buffer with send_timeout = 0,
 7016:                            %% so that did not work
 7017:                            1 < Timeouts ->
 7018:                         ?P("count checked out"),
 7019:                         ok;
 7020:                     {Tag, ok, Count} when Count =:= N * BlockSize ->
 7021:                         ?P("Unexpected number of timeouts: ~w", [Timeouts]),
 7022:                         ct:fail(Result);
 7023:                     {Tag, ok, Count} ->
 7024:                         ?P("Unexpected counts: "
 7025:                            "~n      Got:      ~p"
 7026:                            "~n      Expected: ~p", [Count, N*BlockSize]),
 7027:                         ct:fail(Result);
 7028:                     {Tag, Res, _Count} ->
 7029:                         ?P("Unexpected res: "
 7030:                            "~n      Res: ~p", [Res]),
 7031:                         ct:fail(Result);
 7032:                     _ ->
 7033:                         ct:fail(Result)
 7034:                 end
 7035:         end
 7036:     after
 7037:         ?P("after: kill (failsafe) server"),
 7038:         exit(Server, failsafe),
 7039:         ?P("after: close socket"),
 7040:         gen_tcp:close(C),
 7041:         ?P("after: done"),
 7042:         ok
 7043:     end.
 7044: 
 7045: optnames(Opts) ->
 7046:     [Name || {Name, _} <- Opts].
 7047: 
 7048: str_which_retry_timeout() ->
 7049:     case os:type() of
 7050:         {unix, darwin} ->
 7051:             %% This is really sketchy, but it seems to "work"...
 7052:             %% Don't know if its the processor (M1) or if its the
 7053:             %% OS/darwin version (darwin 21.x).
 7054:             %% But since we don't have any intel macs running 21...
 7055:             case os:version() of
 7056:                 {Major, _, _} when (Major >= 20) ->
 7057:                     25;
 7058:                 _ ->
 7059:                     100
 7060:             end;
 7061:         {unix, freebsd} ->
 7062:             %% Has seen this on FreeBSD 12.2 and later.
 7063:             case os:version() of
 7064:                 {Major, _, _} when (Major >= 13) ->
 7065:                     25;
 7066:                 {Major, Minor, _} when (Major =:= 12) andalso
 7067:                                        (Minor >= 2) ->
 7068:                     25;
 7069:                 _ ->
 7070:                     100
 7071:             end;
 7072:         _ ->
 7073:             100
 7074:     end.
 7075:     
 7076: %% Fill buffers
 7077: do_send_timeout_resume_send(S, Server, Tag, RetryTimeout, BlockSize) ->
 7078:     ?P("try send-timeout-resume with"
 7079:        "~n   RetryTimeout: ~w ms"
 7080:        "~n   BlockSize:    ~w", [RetryTimeout, BlockSize]),
 7081:     do_send_timeout_resume_send(S, Server, Tag, 0, RetryTimeout, BlockSize).
 7082: 
 7083: do_send_timeout_resume_send(S, Server, Tag, N, RetryTimeout, BlockSize) ->
 7084:     Bin = random_data(BlockSize),
 7085:     case send_timeout_repeat(S, Server, Tag, N, Bin, RetryTimeout, 0) of
 7086:         0 ->
 7087:             do_send_timeout_resume_send(S, Server, Tag,
 7088:                                         N + 1, RetryTimeout, BlockSize);
 7089:         Timeouts ->
 7090:             ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 7091:             {N + 1, Timeouts}
 7092:     end.
 7093: 
 7094: send_timeout_repeat(S, Server, Tag, N, Bin, RetryTimeout, Timeouts) ->
 7095:     case gen_tcp:send(S, Bin) of
 7096:         ok ->
 7097:             ?P("send_timeout_repeat -> success => done when"
 7098:                "~n      N:           ~p"
 7099:                "~n      Timeouts:    ~p"
 7100:                "~n      Socket Info: ~p", [N, Timeouts, (catch inet:info(S))]),
 7101:             Timeouts;
 7102:         {error, Reason} ->
 7103:             case Reason of
 7104:                 timeout ->
 7105:                     ?P("send_timeout_repeat -> timeout:"
 7106:                        "~n      S:           ~p"
 7107:                        "~n      N:           ~p"
 7108:                        "~n      Timeouts:    ~p"
 7109:                        "~n      Socket Info: ~p",
 7110:                        [S, N, Timeouts, (catch inet:info(S))]),
 7111:                     Server ! {Tag, rec},
 7112:                     receive after RetryTimeout -> ok end,
 7113:                     send_timeout_repeat(
 7114:                       S, Server, Tag, N, <<>>, RetryTimeout, Timeouts + 1);
 7115:                 {timeout, RestData} ->
 7116:                     ?P("send_timeout_repeat -> timeout with RestData: "
 7117:                        "~n      S:           ~p"
 7118:                        "~n      N:           ~p"
 7119:                        "~n      Timeouts:    ~p"
 7120:                        "~n      Socket Info: ~p",
 7121:                        [S, N, Timeouts, (catch inet:info(S))]),
 7122:                     Server ! {Tag, rec},
 7123:                     receive after RetryTimeout -> ok end,
 7124:                     send_timeout_repeat(
 7125:                       S, Server, Tag, N, RestData, RetryTimeout, Timeouts + 1);
 7126:                 _ ->
 7127:                     ?P("send_timeout_repeat -> unexpected send failure: "
 7128:                        "~n      Reason:      ~p"
 7129:                        "~n   when"
 7130:                        "~n      N:           ~p"
 7131:                        "~n      Timeouts:    ~p"
 7132:                        "~n      Socket Info: ~p",
 7133:                        [Reason, N, Timeouts, (catch inet:info(S))]),
 7134:                     error({Reason, N, Timeouts})
 7135:             end
 7136:     end.
 7137: 
 7138: random_data(0) ->
 7139:     <<>>;
 7140: random_data(Size) ->
 7141:     <<(rand:uniform(256) - 1), (random_data(Size - 1))/binary>>.
 7142: 
 7143: compare_data(<<>>, Count) ->
 7144:     Count;
 7145: compare_data(<<Byte, Bin/binary>>, Count) ->
 7146:     case rand:uniform(256) - 1 of
 7147:         Byte ->
 7148:             compare_data(Bin, Count + 1);
 7149:         _ ->
 7150:             error({diff, Count})
 7151:     end.
 7152: 
 7153: send_timeout_resume_srv(Config, Seed, Client, Tag, ListenOpts, StreamOpts) ->
 7154:     rand:seed(Seed),
 7155:     {ok, L} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, ListenOpts),
 7156:     ?P("[server] get listen StreamOpts -> ~p",
 7157:        [inet:getopts(L, optnames(StreamOpts))]),
 7158:     {ok, P} = inet:port(L),
 7159:     Client ! {Tag, port, P},
 7160:     %%
 7161:     {ok, A} = gen_tcp:accept(L, 2000),
 7162:     ?P("[server] accept success ~p", [A]),
 7163:     ok = inet:setopts(A, StreamOpts),
 7164:     ?P("[server] get accept StreamOpts -> ~p",
 7165:        [inet:getopts(A, optnames(StreamOpts))]),
 7166:     Client ! {Tag, send},
 7167:     %%
 7168:     receive
 7169:         {Tag, rec} ->
 7170:             ?P("[server] received recv command - now wait some time"),
 7171:             receive after 5000 -> ok end,
 7172:             ?P("[server] begin receiving (on ~p)", [A]),
 7173:             exit({Tag, ok, send_timeout_resume_srv(A, 0)})
 7174:     end.
 7175: 
 7176: send_timeout_resume_srv(S, Count) ->
 7177:     case gen_tcp:recv(S, 0) of
 7178:         {ok, Data} ->
 7179:             Count_1 = compare_data(Data, Count),
 7180:             send_timeout_resume_srv(S, Count_1);
 7181:         {error, closed} ->
 7182:             Count;
 7183:         {error, Reason} ->
 7184:             error({Reason, Count})
 7185:     end.
 7186: 
 7187: 
 7188: 
 7189: has_superfluous_schedulers() ->
 7190:     case {erlang:system_info(schedulers),
 7191: 	  erlang:system_info(logical_processors)} of
 7192: 	{S, unknown} when S > 1 -> true;
 7193: 	{S, P} when S > P -> true;
 7194: 	_ -> false
 7195:     end.
 7196: 
 7197: 
 7198: %% Leaking message from inet_drv {inet_reply,P,ok}
 7199: %% when a socket sending resumes working after a send_timeout.
 7200: %% Should we even bother testing this if 'inet_backend = socket'?
 7201: otp_7731(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7202:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 7203:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7204:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7205:                             Addr;
 7206:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7207:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7208:                     end
 7209:            end,
 7210:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_otp_7731(Config, Addr) end,
 7211:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7212:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7213: 
 7214: do_otp_7731(Config, Addr) ->
 7215:     ?P("[ctrl] create server"),
 7216:     ME = self(),
 7217:     ServerPid = spawn_link(fun() -> otp_7731_server(Config, Addr, ME) end),
 7218:     ?P("[ctrl] await listening port (number) from server"),
 7219:     receive {ServerPid, ready, PortNum} -> ok end,
 7220: 
 7221:     ?P("[ctrl] connect to server on port ~w", [PortNum]),
 7222:     {ok, Socket} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum,
 7223:                             [binary,
 7224:                              {ip,           Addr},
 7225:                              {active,       false},
 7226:                              {packet,       raw},
 7227:                              {send_timeout, 1000}]),
 7228: 
 7229:     ?P("[ctrl] send data"),
 7230:     otp_7731_send(Socket),
 7231:     ?P("[ctrl] sending complete - order server to recv"),
 7232:     ServerPid ! {self(), recv},
 7233:     ?P("[ctrl] await 'recv complete' from server"),
 7234:     receive {ServerPid, ok} -> ?P("[ctrl] received 'recv complete'"), ok end,
 7235: 
 7236:     %% Now make sure inet_drv does not leak any internal messages.
 7237:     ?P("[ctrl] waiting for leaking messages..."),
 7238:     receive Msg ->
 7239:             ?P("[ctrl] got unexpected message: "
 7240:                "~n      ~p", [Msg]),
 7241: 	    ct:fail({unexpected, Msg})
 7242:     after 1000 ->
 7243: 	    ok
 7244:     end,
 7245:     ?P("[ctrl] no leaking messages - cleanup"),
 7246:     (catch gen_tcp:close(Socket)),
 7247:     ServerPid ! {self(), die},
 7248:     ?P("[ctrl] done."),
 7249:     ok.
 7250:     
 7251: otp_7731_send(Socket) ->
 7252:     Bin = <<1:10000>>,
 7253:     ?P("[client] sending ~p bytes...", [byte_size(Bin)]),
 7254:     case gen_tcp:send(Socket, Bin) of
 7255:         ok ->
 7256:             otp_7731_send(Socket);
 7257:         {error, {timeout, RestData}} ->
 7258:             ?P("[client] send timeout with ~w bytes of rest data",
 7259:                [byte_size(RestData)]),
 7260:             ok;
 7261:         {error, timeout} ->
 7262:             ?P("[client] send timeout"),
 7263:             ok
 7264:     end.
 7265: 
 7266: otp_7731_server(Config, Addr, Ctrl) ->
 7267:     ?P("[server] create listen socket"),
 7268:     {ok, LSocket} =
 7269:         ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet, raw}, {active, false}]),
 7270:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LSocket),
 7271:     ?P("[server] listening on port number ~p", [PortNum]),
 7272:     Ctrl ! {self(), ready, PortNum},
 7273: 
 7274:     ?P("[server] accept"),
 7275:     {ok, CSocket} = gen_tcp:accept(LSocket),
 7276:     ?P("[server] accepted - close listen socket"),
 7277:     gen_tcp:close(LSocket),
 7278: 
 7279:     ?P("[server] await recv order"),
 7280:     receive {Ctrl, recv} -> ok end,
 7281:     
 7282:     ?P("[server] start receiving..."),
 7283:     otp_7731_recv(CSocket),
 7284: 
 7285:     ?P("[server] announce recv done"),
 7286:     Ctrl ! {self(), ok},
 7287: 
 7288:     ?P("[server] finished, (connection) closing..."),
 7289:     gen_tcp:close(CSocket),
 7290:     receive {Ctrl, die} -> ok end,
 7291:     ?P("[server] done"),
 7292:     exit(normal).
 7293: 
 7294: 
 7295: otp_7731_recv(Socket) ->
 7296:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0, 1000) of
 7297:         {ok, Bin} ->
 7298:             ?P("[server] received ~p bytes", [size(Bin)]),
 7299:             otp_7731_recv(Socket);
 7300:         {error, timeout} ->
 7301:             ?P("[server] receive timeout - done recv"),
 7302:             ok
 7303:     end.
 7304: 
 7305: 
 7306: %% OTP-7615: TCP-ports hanging in CLOSING state when sending large
 7307: %% buffer followed by a recv() that returns error due to closed
 7308: %% connection.
 7309: %% OTP-7615 Leaking closed ports.
 7310: %% This is a specific inet-driver bug, skip this when using 'socket'
 7311: zombie_sockets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7312:     Cond = fun() ->
 7313:                    case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 7314:                        true ->
 7315:                            {skip, "Inet driver specific test"};
 7316:                        false ->
 7317:                            ok
 7318:                    end
 7319:            end,
 7320:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7321:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7322:                             Addr;
 7323:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7324:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7325:                     end
 7326:            end,
 7327:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_zombie_sockets(Config, Addr) end,
 7328:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7329:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7330: 
 7331: do_zombie_sockets(Config, Addr) ->
 7332:     register(zombie_collector,self()),
 7333:     Calls = 10,
 7334:     ?P("create zombie server"),
 7335:     Server = spawn_link(?MODULE, zombie_server, [Config, Addr, self(), Calls]),
 7336:     {Server, ready, PortNum} = receive Msg -> Msg  end,
 7337:     ?P("Ports before = ~p",[lists:sort(erlang:ports())]),
 7338:     zombie_client_loop(Config, Calls, Addr, PortNum),
 7339:     Ports = lists:sort(zombie_collector(Calls, [])),
 7340:     Server ! terminate,
 7341:     ?P("Collected ports = ~p", [Ports]),
 7342:     [] = zombies_alive(Ports, 10),
 7343:     timer:sleep(1000),
 7344:     ?P("done"),
 7345:     ok.
 7346: 
 7347: zombie_client_loop(_Config, 0, _, _) ->
 7348:     ?P("[zombie client] done"),
 7349:     ok;
 7350: zombie_client_loop(Config, N, Addr, PortNum) when is_integer(PortNum) ->
 7351:     ?P("[zombie client][~w] try connect", [N]),
 7352:     {ok, Socket} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum,
 7353:                             [binary,
 7354:                              {ip,     Addr},
 7355:                              {active, false},
 7356:                              {packet, raw}]),
 7357:     ?P("[zombie client] connected - now close ~p", [Socket]),
 7358:     gen_tcp:close(Socket), % to make server recv fail
 7359:     zombie_client_loop(Config, N-1, Addr, PortNum).
 7360: 
 7361: 
 7362: zombie_collector(0, Acc) ->
 7363:     ?P("[zombie collector] done: "
 7364:        "~n   ~p", [Acc]),
 7365:     Acc;
 7366: zombie_collector(N, Acc) ->
 7367:     receive 
 7368: 	{closed, Socket} -> 
 7369:             ?P("[zombie collector] ~p closed", [Socket]),
 7370: 	    zombie_collector(N-1, [Socket|Acc]);
 7371: 	E -> 
 7372: 	    {unexpected, E, Acc}
 7373:     end.
 7374: 	    
 7375: zombies_alive(Ports, WaitSec) ->
 7376:     Alive = lists:sort(erlang:ports()),
 7377:     ?P("[zombies alive][~w] Alive: ~p", [WaitSec, Alive]),
 7378:     Zombies = lists:filter(fun(P) -> lists:member(P, Alive) end, Ports),
 7379:     case Zombies of
 7380: 	[] -> [];
 7381: 	_ ->
 7382: 	    case WaitSec of
 7383: 		0 -> Zombies;
 7384: 		_ -> timer:sleep(1000), % Wait some more for zombies to die
 7385: 		     zombies_alive(Zombies, WaitSec-1)
 7386: 	    end
 7387:     end.
 7388: 
 7389: zombie_server(Config, Addr, Pid, Calls) ->
 7390:     ?P("[zombie server] try create listen socket with backlog: ~w", [Calls]),
 7391:     {ok, LSock} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary, {ip, Addr}, {packet, raw},
 7392:                                       {active, false}, {backlog, Calls}]),
 7393:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LSock),
 7394:     ?P("[zombie server] Listening on ~w with port number ~p", [LSock, PortNum]),
 7395:     BigBin = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(100*1024, 77)),
 7396:     ?P("[zombie server] send ready"),
 7397:     Pid ! {self(), ready, PortNum},
 7398:     zombie_accept_loop(LSock, BigBin, Calls),
 7399:     ?P("[zombie server] await terminate"),
 7400:     terminate = receive Msg -> Msg end,
 7401:     ?P("[zombie server] terminating"),
 7402:     ok.
 7403: 
 7404: zombie_accept_loop(_, _, 0) ->
 7405:     ?P("[zombie server] accept loop done"),
 7406:     ok;
 7407: zombie_accept_loop(Socket, BigBin, Calls) ->
 7408:     ?P("[zombie server][~w] try accept", [Calls]),
 7409:     case gen_tcp:accept(Socket) of
 7410: 	{ok, NewSocket} ->
 7411:             ?P("[zombie server][~w] accepted ~p - create handler",
 7412:                [Calls, NewSocket]),
 7413: 	    spawn_link(fun() -> zombie_server_handler(NewSocket, BigBin) end),
 7414: 	    zombie_accept_loop(Socket, BigBin, Calls-1);
 7415: 	E ->
 7416: 	    E
 7417:     end.
 7418: 
 7419: zombie_server_handler(Socket, Bin) ->
 7420:     ?P("[zombie server handler] got connection on ~p - attempt send", [Socket]),
 7421:     gen_tcp:send(Socket, Bin),
 7422:     ?P("[zombie server handler] Sent data, waiting for reply on ~p", [Socket]),
 7423:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 4) of
 7424:         {error, closed} ->
 7425:             ?P("[zombie server handler] recv: closed (expected)"),
 7426:             ok;
 7427:         {error, econnaborted} -> % may be returned on Windows
 7428:             ?P("[zombie server handler] recv: econnaborted (expected)"),
 7429:             ok;
 7430:         {error, Reason} ->
 7431:             ?P("[zombie server handler] UNEXPECTED recv failure reason: ~p",
 7432:                [Reason]),
 7433:             exit({unexpected_recv_error_reason, Reason});
 7434:         {ok, _} ->
 7435:             ?P("[zombie server handler] UNEXPECTED recv success"),
 7436:             exit(unexpected_recv_success)
 7437: 	  end,
 7438:     ?P("[zombie server handler] close socket ~p", [Socket]),
 7439:     gen_tcp:close(Socket),
 7440:     ?P("[zombie server handler] socket closed: inform collector"),
 7441:     zombie_collector ! {closed, Socket}.
 7442: 
 7443: 
 7444: %% Hanging send on windows when sending iolist with more than 16 binaries.
 7445: otp_7816(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7446:     ct:timetrap(?MINS(2)),
 7447:     Cond = fun() ->
 7448: 		   %% With 'socket on Windows' we have actually no way to
 7449: 		   %% actually *know* that nothing is sent even after a timeout
 7450: 		   %% (and the send cancel that socket issues). The I/O 
 7451: 		   %% Completion Port framework may well have buffers still
 7452: 		   %% handle the data and send it as soon as it can.
 7453: 		   %% Basically, data is "out of our hands" as soon as we
 7454: 		   %% give it to the framework. Cancel may have "no effect"
 7455: 		   %% even if the completion operation is reported as
 7456: 		   %% 'aborted'.
 7457: 		   %% So, this test case simply does not work.
 7458: 		   case os:type() of
 7459: 		        {win32, nt} ->
 7460: 			   case ?IS_SOCKET_BACKEND(Config) of
 7461: 			       true ->
 7462: 				   {skip,
 7463: 				    "Not compatible with 'socket on Windows'"};
 7464: 			       false ->
 7465: 				   ok
 7466: 				       end;
 7467: 		       _ ->
 7468: 			   ok
 7469: 		   end
 7470: 	   end,
 7471:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7472:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7473:                             Addr;
 7474:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7475:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7476:                     end
 7477:            end,
 7478:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_otp_7816(Config, Addr) end,
 7479:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7480:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7481: 
 7482: do_otp_7816(Config, Addr) ->
 7483:     Ctrl = self(),
 7484:     ?P("[ctrl] create server process..."),
 7485:     Server = spawn_link(fun() -> otp_7816_server(Config, Addr, Ctrl) end),
 7486:     ?P("[ctrl] await server process ready..."),
 7487:     receive {Server, ready, PortNum} -> ok end,
 7488: 
 7489:     ?P("[ctrl] connect to server..."),
 7490:     {ok, Socket} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum,
 7491:                             [binary,
 7492:                              {ip,           Addr},
 7493:                              {active,       false},
 7494:                              {packet,       4},
 7495:                              {send_timeout, 10}]),
 7496: 
 7497:     %% We use the undocumented feature that sending can be resumed after
 7498:     %% a send_timeout without any data loss if the peer starts to receive data.
 7499:     %% Unless of course the 7816-bug is in affect, in which case the write event
 7500:     %% for the socket is lost on windows and not all data is sent.
 7501: 
 7502:     ?P("[ctrl] begin sending..."),
 7503: 
 7504:     [otp_7816_ctrl(Socket, 18, BinSize, Server) ||
 7505: 	BinSize <- lists:seq(1000, 2000, 123)],
 7506: 
 7507:     ?P("[ctrl] sending complete - close socket"),
 7508: 
 7509:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Socket),
 7510:     ?P("[ctrl] stop server"),
 7511:     Server ! {self(), closed},
 7512:     ?P("[ctrl] await server stopped"),
 7513:     {Server, closed} = receive M -> M end,
 7514:     ?P("[ctrl] done"),
 7515:     ok.
 7516: 
 7517: 
 7518: otp_7816_ctrl(Socket, BinNr, BinSize, Server) ->
 7519:     ?P("[ctrl] create payload (BinSz: ~w)...", [BinSize]),
 7520:     Data = lists:duplicate(BinNr, <<1:(BinSize*8)>>),
 7521:     ?P("[ctrl] socket info prior to start sending: "
 7522:        "~n      ~p", [inet:info(Socket)]),
 7523:     Ctrl   = self(),
 7524:     Client = spawn_link(fun() -> otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data) end),
 7525:     SentBytes =
 7526: 	receive
 7527: 	    {Client, continue, Loops} ->
 7528: 		?P("[ctrl] received continue from client: ~p", [Loops]),
 7529: 		SB = Loops * BinNr * BinSize,
 7530: 		Server ! {self(), recv, SB},
 7531: 		SB
 7532: 	end,
 7533:     ct:sleep(1000),
 7534:     ?P("[ctrl] socket info after sending ~w bytes: "
 7535:        "~n      ~p", [SentBytes, inet:info(Socket)]),
 7536:     ?P("[ctrl] await server result..."),
 7537:     ok = receive
 7538: 	     {Server, SR} ->
 7539: 		 ?P("[ctrl] server result: ~p", [SR]),
 7540: 		 SR
 7541: 	 end,
 7542:     ?P("[ctrl] await client termination..."),
 7543:     ok = receive
 7544: 	     {'EXIT', Client, normal} ->
 7545: 		 ?P("[ctrl] client normal exit"),
 7546: 		 ok;
 7547: 	     {'EXIT', Client, CR} ->
 7548: 		 ?P("[ctrl] client unexpected exit reason: ~p", [CR]),
 7549: 		 CR
 7550: 	 end,
 7551:     ?P("[ctrl] done with BinSz: ~p", [BinSize]),
 7552:     ok.
 7553:     
 7554: 
 7555: otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data) ->
 7556:     otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data, 0).
 7557: 
 7558: otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data, Loops) ->
 7559:     ?P("[client] sending data (~w bytes, ~w)...", [iolist_size(Data), Loops]),
 7560:     case gen_tcp:send(Socket, Data) of
 7561: 	ok ->
 7562: 	    otp_7816_send_data(Ctrl, Socket, Data, Loops+1);
 7563: 
 7564: 	{error, timeout} when is_port(Socket) ->
 7565: 	    %% For the 'classic' sockets, when the OS buffers are
 7566: 	    %% full, the rest data are put into the (inet driver)
 7567: 	    %% internal, for later sending. SO, it can be counted
 7568: 	    %% as sent.
 7569: 	    ?P("[client] send timeout when Loops: ~p (+1)", [Loops]),
 7570: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), continue, Loops + 1},
 7571: 	    exit(normal);
 7572: 
 7573: 	{error, timeout} ->
 7574: 	    %% For inet_backend = 'socket' when we nothing of the
 7575: 	    %% message was sent.
 7576: 	    ?P("[client] send timeout when Loops: ~p", [Loops]),
 7577: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), continue, Loops},
 7578: 	    exit(normal);
 7579: 
 7580: 	{error, {timeout, RestData}} ->
 7581: 	    %% A timeout means that **some** of the data was not sent,
 7582: 	    %% currently there is no way to know how much.
 7583: 	    %% NOTE THAT THIS MEANS THAT WE MAY HAVE A PARTIAL PACKAGE
 7584: 	    %% WRITTEN, INCLUDING A HEADER THAT INDICATES A DATA
 7585: 	    %% SIZE THAT IS **NOT** PRESENT!!
 7586: 	    %% So for this trest case to work, we need to write the rest.
 7587: 	    %% But we cannot do that without first setting the package to raw.
 7588: 	    %%
 7589: 	    ?P("[client] send timeout"
 7590: 	       "~n      with ~w bytes of rest data"
 7591: 	       "~n      when Loops: ~p", [byte_size(RestData), Loops]),
 7592: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), continue, Loops + 1},
 7593: 	    ?P("[client] packet to 'raw'..."),
 7594: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket, [{packet, raw}, {send_timeout, 1000}]),
 7595: 	    ?P("[client] send ~w bytes of rest data...",
 7596: 	       [byte_size(RestData)]),
 7597: 	    ok = gen_tcp:send(Socket, RestData),
 7598: 	    ?P("[client] packet (back) to '4'..."),
 7599: 	    ok = inet:setopts(Socket, [{packet, 4}, {send_timeout, 10}]),
 7600: 	    ?P("[client] done"),
 7601: 	    exit(normal)
 7602: 
 7603:     end.
 7604:     
 7605:     
 7606: otp_7816_server(Config, Addr, Ctrl) ->
 7607:     ?P("[server] create listening socket"),
 7608:     {ok, LSocket} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [binary,  {ip, Addr},
 7609:                                         {packet, 4},
 7610:                                         {active, false}]),
 7611:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LSocket),
 7612:     ?P("[server] listening on ~w with port number ~p", [LSocket, PortNum]),
 7613:     Ctrl ! {self(), ready, PortNum},
 7614: 
 7615:     ?P("[server] accept connection..."),
 7616:     {ok, ASocket} = gen_tcp:accept(LSocket),
 7617:     ?P("[server] connection accepted..."),
 7618:     gen_tcp:close(LSocket),
 7619: 
 7620:     otp_7816_server_loop(ASocket, Ctrl),
 7621: 
 7622:     ?P("[server] terminating").
 7623: 
 7624: 
 7625: otp_7816_server_loop(Socket, Ctrl) ->
 7626:     ?P("[server] waiting for order..."),
 7627:     receive 
 7628: 	{Ctrl, recv, RecvBytes} -> 
 7629: 	    ?P("[server] start receiving (~w bytes)...", [RecvBytes]),
 7630: 
 7631: 	    ok = otp_7816_recv(Socket, RecvBytes),
 7632: 	    
 7633: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), ok},
 7634: 	    otp_7816_server_loop(Socket, Ctrl);
 7635: 	
 7636: 	{Ctrl, closed} ->
 7637: 	    {error, closed} = gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0, 1000),
 7638: 	    Ctrl ! {self(), closed}
 7639:     end.
 7640: 
 7641: otp_7816_recv(Socket, BytesLeft) ->
 7642:     otp_7816_recv(Socket, BytesLeft, 1).
 7643: 
 7644: otp_7816_recv(_, 0, _) ->
 7645:     ?P("[server] got all data"),
 7646:     ok;
 7647: otp_7816_recv(Socket, BytesLeft, N) ->
 7648:     ?P("[server,~w] try recv (~p bytes left)", [N, BytesLeft]),
 7649:     case gen_tcp:recv(Socket, 0, 1000) of
 7650: 	{ok, Bin} when (byte_size(Bin) =< BytesLeft) andalso
 7651: 		       (byte_size(Bin) > 0) -> 
 7652: 	    ?P("[server,~w] received ~p of ~p bytes",
 7653: 	       [N, size(Bin), BytesLeft]),
 7654: 	    otp_7816_recv(Socket, BytesLeft - byte_size(Bin), N+1);
 7655: 	{ok, Bin} ->
 7656: 	    ?P("[server,~w] received unexpected data: "
 7657: 	       "~n   Expected:    ~p bytes"
 7658: 	       "~n   Received:    ~p bytes"
 7659: 	       "~n   Socket Info: ~p",
 7660: 	       [N, BytesLeft, byte_size(Bin), inet:info(Socket)]),
 7661: 	    {error, {unexpected_data, BytesLeft, byte_size(Bin)}};
 7662: 	{error, timeout} ->
 7663: 	    ?P("[server,~w] got receive timeout when expecting more data:"
 7664: 	       "~n      Socket Info: ~p", [N,inet:info(Socket)]),
 7665: 	    {error, timeout}
 7666:     end.
 7667: 
 7668: 
 7669: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 7670: 
 7671: %% Receive a packet with a faulty packet header.
 7672: otp_8102(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7673:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 7674:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7675:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7676:                             Addr;
 7677:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7678:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7679:                     end
 7680:            end,
 7681:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_otp_8102(Config, Addr) end,
 7682:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7683:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7684: 
 7685: do_otp_8102(Config, Addr) ->
 7686:     {ok, LSocket} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}]),
 7687:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LSocket),
 7688:     ?P("Listening on ~w with port number ~p", [LSocket, PortNum]),
 7689: 
 7690:     [otp_8102_do(Config, LSocket, Addr, PortNum, otp_8102_packet(Type, Size))
 7691:      || Size <- lists:seq(-10,-1), 
 7692: 	Type <- [4, {cdr,big}, {cdr,little}]],
 7693:     
 7694:     gen_tcp:close(LSocket),
 7695:     ok.
 7696: 
 7697: otp_8102_packet(4, Size) ->
 7698:     {<<Size:32/big>>, 4};
 7699: otp_8102_packet({cdr,big}, Size) ->
 7700:     {<<"GIOP",0,0,0,0,Size:32/big>>, cdr};
 7701: otp_8102_packet({cdr,little}, Size) ->
 7702:     {<<"GIOP",0,0,1,0,Size:32/little>>, cdr}.
 7703: 
 7704: otp_8102_do(Config, LSocket, Addr, PortNum, {Bin,PType}) ->
 7705: 
 7706:     ?P("Connect with packet option ~p ...",[PType]),
 7707:     {ok, RSocket} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum, [binary,
 7708:                                                      {ip,     Addr},
 7709:                                                      {packet, PType},
 7710:                                                      {active, true}]),
 7711:     {ok, SSocket} = gen_tcp:accept(LSocket),
 7712: 
 7713:     ?P("Got connection, sending ~p...",[Bin]),
 7714: 
 7715:     ok = gen_tcp:send(SSocket, Bin),
 7716: 
 7717:     ?P("Sending complete...",[]),
 7718: 
 7719:     {tcp_error,RSocket,emsgsize} = receive M -> M end,
 7720: 
 7721:     ?P("Got error msg, ok."),
 7722:     gen_tcp:close(SSocket),    
 7723:     gen_tcp:close(RSocket).
 7724: 
 7725: %% Verify packet_size handles long HTTP header lines.
 7726: otp_9389(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7727:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 7728:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7729:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7730:                             Addr;
 7731:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7732:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7733:                     end
 7734:            end,
 7735:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_otp_9389(Config, Addr) end,
 7736:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7737:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7738: 
 7739: do_otp_9389(Config, Addr) ->
 7740:     {ok, LS} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false}]),
 7741:     {ok, {_, PortNum}} = inet:sockname(LS),
 7742:     ?P("Listening on ~w with port number ~p", [LS, PortNum]),
 7743:     OrigLinkHdr = "/" ++ string:chars($S, 8192),
 7744:     _Server = spawn_link(
 7745:                 fun() ->
 7746:                         {ok, S} = gen_tcp:accept(LS),
 7747:                         ok = inet:setopts(S, [{packet_size, 16384}]),
 7748:                         ok = otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr),
 7749:                         ok = gen_tcp:close(S)
 7750:                 end),
 7751:     {ok, S} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, PortNum,
 7752:                        [binary, {ip, Addr}, {active, false}]),
 7753:     Req = "GET / HTTP/1.1\r\n"
 7754:         ++ "Host: " ++ inet_parse:ntoa(Addr) ++ "\r\n"
 7755:         ++ "Link: " ++ OrigLinkHdr ++ "\r\n\r\n",
 7756:     ok = gen_tcp:send(S, Req),
 7757:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{packet, http}]),
 7758:     {ok, {http_response, {1,1}, 200, "OK"}} = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0),
 7759:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{packet, httph}, {packet_size, 16384}]),
 7760:     {ok, {http_header, _, 'Content-Length', _, "0"}} = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0),
 7761:     {ok, {http_header, _, "Link", _, LinkHdr}} = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0),
 7762:     true = (LinkHdr == OrigLinkHdr),
 7763:     ok = gen_tcp:close(S),
 7764:     ok = gen_tcp:close(LS),
 7765:     ok.
 7766: 
 7767: otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr) ->
 7768:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{active,once},{packet,http}]),
 7769:     receive
 7770:         {http, S, {http_request, 'GET', _, _}} ->
 7771:             ok = otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, undefined)
 7772:     after
 7773:         3000 ->
 7774:             error({timeout,request_line})
 7775:     end.
 7776: otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, ok) ->
 7777:     Resp = "HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\nContent-length: 0\r\n" ++
 7778:         "Link: " ++ OrigLinkHdr ++ "\r\n\r\n",
 7779:     ok = gen_tcp:send(S, Resp);
 7780: otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, State) ->
 7781:     ok = inet:setopts(S, [{active,once}, {packet,httph}]),
 7782:     receive
 7783:         {http, S, http_eoh} ->
 7784:             otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, ok);
 7785:         {http, S, {http_header, _, "Link", _, LinkHdr}} ->
 7786:             LinkHdr = OrigLinkHdr,
 7787:             otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, State);
 7788:         {http, S, {http_header, _, _Hdr, _, _Val}} ->
 7789:             otp_9389_loop(S, OrigLinkHdr, State);
 7790:         {http, S, {http_error, Err}} ->
 7791:             error({error, Err})
 7792:     after
 7793:         3000 ->
 7794:             error({timeout,header})
 7795:     end.
 7796: 
 7797: wrapping_oct() ->
 7798:     [{timetrap, {minutes,20}}].
 7799: 
 7800: %% Check that 64bit octet counters work.
 7801: wrapping_oct(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7802:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
 7803:     Pre  = fun() -> case ?WHICH_LOCAL_ADDR(inet) of
 7804:                         {ok, Addr} ->
 7805:                             Addr;
 7806:                         {error, Reason} ->
 7807:                             throw({skip, Reason})
 7808:                     end
 7809:            end,
 7810:     TC   = fun(Addr) -> do_wrapping_oct(Config, Addr) end,
 7811:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
 7812:     ?TC_TRY(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, TC, Post).
 7813: 
 7814: %% {recbuf, 8192}, {sndbuf, 8192}
 7815: do_wrapping_oct(Config, Addr) ->
 7816:     ?P("[ctrl] create listen socket"),
 7817:     Ctrl = self(),
 7818:     {ok, LSock} = ?LISTEN(Config, 0, [{ip, Addr}, {active,false},{mode,binary}]),
 7819:     {ok, LPort} = inet:port(LSock),
 7820:     ?P("[ctrl] spawn acceptor"),
 7821:     Acceptor = spawn_link(fun() -> oct_acceptor(Ctrl, LSock) end),
 7822:     ?P("[ctrl] spawn pump"),
 7823:     Pump     = spawn_link(fun() -> 
 7824:                                   oct_datapump(Ctrl,
 7825:                                                Config, Addr, LPort, 16#10000FFFF)
 7826:                           end),
 7827:     ?P("[ctrl] await acceptor socket"),
 7828:     ASock = wc_await_socket("acceptor", Acceptor),
 7829:     ?P("[ctrl] await pump socket"),
 7830:     PSock = wc_await_socket("pump", Pump),
 7831:     ?P("[ctrl] await completion (from pump)"),
 7832:     Res = wc_await_completion(Acceptor, ASock, Pump, PSock),
 7833:     ?P("[ctrl] close listen socket"),
 7834:     gen_tcp:close(LSock),
 7835:     ?P("[ctrl] verify result"),
 7836:     ok = Res,
 7837:     ?P("[ctrl] done"),
 7838:     ok.
 7839: 
 7840: wc_await_socket(Tag, Pid) ->
 7841:     receive
 7842:         {Pid, socket, AS} ->
 7843:             ?P("received ~s socket: "
 7844:                "~n      ~p", [Tag, AS]),
 7845:             AS
 7846:     end.
 7847: 
 7848: wc_await_completion(Acceptor, ASock, Pump, PSock) ->
 7849:     wc_await_completion(Acceptor, ASock, Pump, PSock, 1, undefined).
 7850: 
 7851: wc_await_completion(undefined = _Acceptor, _ASock,
 7852:                     undefined = _Pump,     _PSock, 
 7853:                     Loops, Res) ->
 7854:     ?P("completed after ~w loops", [Loops]),
 7855:     Res;
 7856: wc_await_completion(Acceptor, ASock, Pump, PSock, Loops, CRes) ->
 7857:     receive
 7858:         {'EXIT', Pump, Res} ->
 7859:             ?P("[ctrl] Received pump exit: "
 7860:                "~n   Loops:  ~w"
 7861:                "~n   Reason: ~p", [Loops, Res]),
 7862:             wc_await_completion(Acceptor,  ASock,
 7863:                                 undefined, PSock,
 7864:                                 Loops + 1, Res);
 7865:         {'EXIT', Acceptor, Res} ->
 7866:             ?P("[ctrl] Received acceptor exit: "
 7867:                "~n   Loops:  ~w"
 7868:                "~n   Reason: ~p", [Loops, Res]),
 7869:             wc_await_completion(undefined, ASock,
 7870:                                 Pump,      PSock,
 7871:                                 Loops + 1, CRes)
 7872:                 
 7873:     after 10000 ->
 7874:             ASockInfo = wc_sock_info(ASock),
 7875:             AccInfo   = wc_proc_info(Acceptor),
 7876:             PSockInfo = wc_sock_info(PSock),
 7877:             PumpInfo  = wc_proc_info(Pump),
 7878:             ?P("Info ~w while waiting for clompletion: "
 7879:                "~n   Acceptor Socket Info: ~p"
 7880:                "~n   Acceptor Info:        ~p"
 7881:                "~n   Pump Socket Info:     ~p"
 7882:                "~n   Pump Info:            ~p",
 7883:                [Loops, ASockInfo, AccInfo, PSockInfo, PumpInfo]),
 7884:             wc_await_completion(Acceptor,  ASock,
 7885:                                 Pump,      PSock,
 7886:                                 Loops + 1, CRes)
 7887:     end.
 7888:             
 7889: wc_sock_info(S) ->
 7890:     try inet:info(S)
 7891:     catch
 7892:         _:_:_ ->
 7893:             undefined
 7894:     end.
 7895: 
 7896: wc_proc_info(P) when is_pid(P) ->
 7897:     try erlang:process_info(P)
 7898:     catch
 7899:         _:_:_ ->
 7900:             undefined
 7901:     end;
 7902: wc_proc_info(_) ->
 7903:     undefined.
 7904: 
 7905: %% {recbuf, 16*1024}, {sndbuf, 16*1024}
 7906: oct_datapump(Ctrl, Config, Addr, Port, N) ->
 7907:     ?P("[pump] connect to listener"),
 7908:     {ok, CSock} = ?CONNECT(Config, Addr, Port,
 7909: 			   [{ip, Addr}, {active, false}, {mode, binary}]),
 7910:     ?P("[pump] announce to ctrl"),
 7911:     Ctrl ! {self(), socket, CSock},
 7912:     {ok, [{sndbuf,SndBuf}]} = inet:getopts(CSock, [sndbuf]),
 7913:     ?P("[pump] connected - start 'pumping' with"
 7914:        "~n      SndBuf: ~w", [SndBuf]),
 7915:     put(action,  nothing),
 7916:     put(sent,    0),
 7917:     put(elapsed, 0),
 7918:     put(rem_bytes, N),
 7919:     oct_pump(CSock, N, binary:copy(<<$a:8>>,100000), 0, 0).
 7920: 
 7921: oct_pump(S, N, _, _, _Sent) when N =< 0 ->
 7922:     ?P("[pump] done"),
 7923:     (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 7924:     exit(ok);
 7925: oct_pump(S, N, Bin, Last, Sent) ->
 7926:     put(action, send),
 7927:     Start   = erlang:monotonic_time(nanosecond),
 7928:     Res     = gen_tcp:send(S, Bin),
 7929:     Stop    = erlang:monotonic_time(nanosecond),
 7930:     Elapsed = get(elapsed),
 7931:     put(elapsed, Elapsed + (Stop - Start)),
 7932:     put(action,  sent),
 7933:     put(sent,    Sent+1),
 7934:     case Res of
 7935: 	ok ->
 7936: 	    case inet:getstat(S) of
 7937: 		{ok, Stat} ->
 7938: 		    {_, R} = lists:keyfind(send_oct, 1, Stat),
 7939: 		    case (R < Last) of
 7940: 			true ->
 7941: 			    ?P("[pump] send counter error ~p < ~p", [R, Last]),
 7942:                             (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 7943: 			    exit({error, {output_counter, R, Last, N}});
 7944: 			false ->
 7945:                             put(rem_bytes, N - byte_size(Bin)),
 7946: 			    oct_pump(S, N-byte_size(Bin), Bin, R, Sent+1)
 7947: 		    end;
 7948: 		{error, StatReason} ->
 7949: 		    ?P("[pump] get stat failed:"
 7950: 		       "~n      Reason:    ~p"
 7951: 		       "~n   when"
 7952: 		       "~n      Remaining: ~p"
 7953: 		       "~n      Last:      ~p", [StatReason, N, Last]),
 7954: 		    (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 7955: 		    exit({error, {stat_failure, StatReason, N, Last}})
 7956: 	    end;
 7957: 	{error, SendReason} ->
 7958: 	    ?P("[pump] send failed:"
 7959: 	       "~n      Reason:    ~p"
 7960: 	       "~n   when"
 7961: 	       "~n      Remaining: ~p"
 7962: 	       "~n      Last:      ~p", [SendReason, N, Last]),
 7963: 	    (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 7964: 	    exit({error, {send_failure, SendReason, N, Last}})
 7965:     end.
 7966:     
 7967: 
 7968: oct_acceptor(Ctrl, LSock) ->
 7969:     ?P("[acceptor] accept connection"),
 7970:     {ok, ASock} = gen_tcp:accept(LSock),
 7971:     ?P("[acceptor] announce to ctrl"),
 7972:     Ctrl ! {self(), socket, ASock},
 7973:     {ok, [{recbuf,RecBuf}]} = inet:getopts(ASock, [recbuf]),
 7974:     ?P("[acceptor] connection accepted - start receiving with: "
 7975:        "~n      RecBuf: ~w", [RecBuf]),
 7976:     put(action,  nothing),
 7977:     put(recv,    0),
 7978:     put(elapsed, 0),
 7979:     oct_aloop(ASock, inet:info(ASock), 0, 0).
 7980: 
 7981: oct_aloop(S, LastInfo, Received, Times) ->
 7982:     put(action, recv),
 7983:     Start   = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 7984:     Res     = gen_tcp:recv(S, 0),
 7985:     Stop    = erlang:monotonic_time(),
 7986:     Elapsed = get(elapsed),
 7987:     put(elapsed, Elapsed + (Stop - Start)),
 7988:     put(action,  received),
 7989:     put(recv,    Times+1),
 7990:     case Res of
 7991: 	{ok, _} ->
 7992:             #{counters := #{recv_oct := R} = _Stat} = Info = inet:info(S),
 7993:             case (R < Received) of
 7994:                 true ->
 7995:                     ?P("[acceptor] recv counter error:"
 7996:                        "~n      Recv Cnt:  ~p"
 7997:                        "~n      Received:  ~p"
 7998:                        "~n      Times:     ~p"
 7999:                        "~n      Info:      ~p"
 8000:                        "~n      Last Info: ~p",
 8001:                        [R, Received, Times, Info, LastInfo]),
 8002:                     (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 8003:                     {error, {output_counter, R, Received, Times}};
 8004:                 false ->
 8005:                     case Times rem 16#FFFFF of
 8006:                         0 ->
 8007:                             ?P("[acceptor] read: ~p"
 8008:                                "~n      Times: ~w"
 8009:                                "~n      Info:  ~p",
 8010:                                [R, Times, Info]);
 8011:                         _ ->
 8012:                             ok
 8013:                     end,
 8014:                     oct_aloop(S, Info, R, Times+1)
 8015:             end;
 8016: 
 8017: 	{error, RecvReason} ->
 8018: 	    ?P("[acceptor] receive failed:"
 8019: 	       "~n      Reason:   ~p"
 8020: 	       "~n   when"
 8021: 	       "~n      Received: ~p"
 8022: 	       "~n      Times:    ~p", [RecvReason, Received, Times]),
 8023: 	    (catch gen_tcp:close(S)),
 8024:             ct:sleep(1000), % Just give the 'pump' a chance to get there first
 8025: 	    exit(closed)
 8026:     end.
 8027: 
 8028: ok({ok,V}) -> V.
 8029:
